Scn WillowHouseHarvestXanderRootScript
short Harvested float HarvestDay float Today
Begin OnActivate
If Harvested == 0 && GetActionRef == Player player.additem XanderRoot 1 playGroup Backward 1 setdestroyed 1 Set HarvestDay to GameDaysPassed Set Harvested to 1 endif
END
Begin OnLoad If Harvested Set Today to GameDaysPassed If Today - HarvestDay > 3 playgroup Forward 1 setdestroyed 0 Set Harvested to 0 endif endif END

Scn WillowHouseHarvestCaveFungusScript
short Harvested float HarvestDay float Today
Begin OnActivate
If Harvested == 0 && GetActionRef == Player Player.AddItem CaveFungus 1 WillowHouseCFtoPickREF.Disable 0 Set Harvested to 1 Set HarvestDay to GameDaysPassed SetDestroyed 1 endif
END
Begin GameMode If Harvested Set Today to GameDaysPassed If Today - HarvestDay > 3 WillowHouseCFtoPickREF.Enable 0 setdestroyed 0 Set Harvested to 0 endif endif END

Player.RewardXP 150 Player.AddItem WillowPlayerPresentFedora 1 Player.AddItem WillowMoraelinWeapLaserPistol 1 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowTeddyChallengeEndMsg Set WillowChallengeTeddyAnnouncement to 2
END

Scn WillowChallengeTeddyOnAddScript
Begin OnAdd
If GetContainer == Player If WillowChallengeTeddyAnnouncement == 0 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowTeddyChallengeMsg Set WillowChallengeTeddyAnnouncement to 1 endif endif
END

Scn Willow1cScript
short WillowThirsty short WillowThirstyChatter short DoOnce float ThirstyTimer
Begin GameMode
;;Timer to give Willow a chance to drink her soda/water from eat script package and then puts her back onto follow with evp
If WillowThirstyChatter If ThirstyTimer <= 25 Set ThirstyTimer to ThirstyTimer + GetSecondsPassed
Else
If AWillow1.OnTheGoSSFull == 1 Set AWillow1.OnTheGoSSFull to 0 WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerFollowDrinkSSFull Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp ElseIf AWillow1.OnTheGoNukaCola == 1 Set AWillow1.OnTheGoNukaCola to 0 WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerFollowDrinkNukaCola Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp ElseIf AWillow1.OnTheGoWater == 1 Set AWillow1.OnTheGoWater to 0 WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerFollowDrinkWater Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp ElseIf AWillow1.OnTheGoWaterUP == 1 Set AWillow1.OnTheGoWaterUP to 0 WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerFollowDrinkWillowsCoffee Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp Else Set AWillow1.OnTheGoEat to 0 Set AWillow1.OnTheGoNukaCola to 0 Set AWillow1.OnTheGoWhiskey to 0 Set AWillow1.OnTheGoSSFull to 0 Set AWillow1.OnTheGoWater to 0 Set AWillow1.OnTheGoWaterUP to 0 WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp endif
; implementing timer to simulate that she's full and won't ask for food or talk about food for awhile Set WillowThirstyChatter to 0 Set ThirstyTimer to 0 Set AWillow1l.NoFoodTalk to 1 Set AWillow1l.WillowFull to GameDaysPassed StartQuest AWillow1l StopQuest AWillow1c endif endif END

Scn WillowHouseLightSwitchBedroom
short LightsOn
Begin OnActivate
If LightsOn == 0 WHbedhanginglightREF.Enable 0 WHbedroomlightREF.Enable 0 WHbedroomshelvesREF.Enable 0 Set LightsOn to 1 SetOpenState 1
Elseif LightsOn WHbedhanginglightREF.Disable WHbedroomlightREF.Disable WHbedroomshelvesREF.Disable Set LightsOn to 0 SetOpenState 0 Endif
Activate
END

Scn Willow4cScript
short DoOnce; msg perk short DoOnce1;redlucychattercomment short DoOnce2;redlucychattercomment short DoOnce3; veronica trng short DoOnce4;moira lie short TalkAgainChet short TalkAgainEttienne short TalkAgainBlake short DoOnce5;redlucychattercomment short DoOnce6;caesar tent short DoOnce7;burial site short WantsCoffee short PlayerLikesSinging short PlayerHeardSinging short DoOnce8; post ftb short DoOnce9; tent chatter short HoldMe short DoOnce10 short DoOnce11; msg sleep short ToldStory short IsBuying short IsBuyingChet short IsBuyingBlake short DoOnce12;msg campfire short Cooking short Flirting short BurialSite short NewVegas short GonnaAskVeronica short VeronicaChatter short WtoVchatter short GoShopping short BFFkiss short TalkCaesarsTent short JTpresent short DoOnce13;benny asshole short DoOnce14;benny seduction short BennyNovac short BennyVegas short DeadAsshole short DoOnce15;eat out note short DoOnce16 short DoOnce17; hc msg short DoOnce18;shopping leave short DoOnce19; fiend helmet float TalkChance short DoOnce20 short SloanDeathclaws short WeaponTalk short BennyCoat short AskedAboutJT short VeronicaDress short GiveTrinket short EyeLasers short PlayerWantsMoreSinging short SingingDiscussed short ImDone short DoOnce21; boomers helmet short GimmeMoira short PLiesHasMoira short FGPlayerMoira short PCgivesMoira short TalkedAboutChester short PCTakesJournal short BackgroundPolitics short NiptonChatter short McCarranChatter short TookCS short CaesarsTentInside; WillowseesCaesar short DeathclawChatter short FreezerCompanion short CFHMedCtrTalk short VeronicaEyeLasers short V22chatter short LessSinging short HCSleep short NCRisON short GoldPlated
Begin GameMode
If DoOnce == 0 If WillowREF.WillowL38 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowPerkRemove Set DoOnce to 1 endif endif If DoOnce12 == 0 If AWillow1.CampfireOut If WillowREF.WillowCanComment ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowCampfire Set DoOnce12 to 1 endif endif endif If DoOnce11 == 0 If AWillow1.SleepOnBedroll If WillowREF.WillowCanComment ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowSleeping Set DoOnce11 to 1 endif endif endif If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.FriendsWithBenefits == 0 && AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 130 If AWillow4a.BFFPresent == 3 AddTopic AWDPresent140 endif endif If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.FriendsWithBenefits && AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 140 If AWillow4a.BFFPresent == 3 AddTopic AWDPresent140 endif endif If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerAsksAboutClint If Player.GetInCell NovacGiftShop AddTopic AWNPCCliffBriscoe2 endif endif If AWillow4a.FixedLeg == 0 && AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowIsBFF If Player.GetAV Medicine >= 30 && (GetStageDone VMS30 120 == 1 || VFreeformSloan.SnufflesHealed) AddTopic AWDFixMyLeg Set AWillow4a.FixedLeg to 1 Elseif Player.GetAV Medicine >= 60 AddTopic AWDFixMyLeg Set AWillow4a.FixedLeg to 1 endif endif If AWillow1.OnTheGoEat && DoOnce == 15 AddNote WillowsEatingOut Set DoOnce to 15 endif If DoOnce17 == 0 If WillowREF.HasBeenHired || WillowREF.Fired If Player.IsHardcore ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowIsHardcoreEssential Set DoOnce17 to 1 endif endif endif ;;;;Willow "picks up" helmets in two places in the gameworld one time during gameplay If DoOnce19 == 0 If SouthVegasRuinsEastEntranceMapMarker.GetDistance Player <= 5000 If WillowREF.WillowCanComment If WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem WillowsArmorFiendHelmet03 1 Set DoOnce19 to 1 endif endif endif endif If DoOnce21 == 0 If NellisMainGateREF.GetDistance Player <= 2000 If WillowREF.WillowCanComment If WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem OutfitBoomersHelmet 1 Set DoOnce21 to 1 endif endif endif endif ;;;;;Reset variable for greeting at various locations so Willow will ask to do pkg there each time player enters it If AWillow4a.TOPSrestaurantGreeting If Player.GetInCell TOPSRestaurant == 0 && Player.GetInCell BCSaloonInterior == 0 && Player.GetInCell GSProspectorSaloonInterior == 0 && Player.GetInCell FreesideAtomicWrangler == 0 && Player.GetInCell ULGourmand == 0 Set AWillow4a.TOPSrestaurantGreeting to 0 endif endif If DoOnce8 == 0 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PostFTBchat && HoldMe == 0 If WillowREF.WillowCanComment If Player.IsTalking == 0 && WillowREF.IsTalking == 0 If Player.IsInCombat == 0 && WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0 WillowREF.StartConversation Player AWDftbPostChat Set DoOnce8 to 1 endif endif endif endif endif If GimmeMoira == 0 If WillowREF.WillowCanComment If PLiesHasMoira == 0 && PCgivesMoira == 0 If WillowREF.GetItemCount WillowsRifle >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemCount WillowVoodooDoll == 0 If Player.IsTalking == 0 && WillowREF.IsTalking == 0 If Player.IsInCombat == 0 && WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0 If WillowREF.GetDistance Player <= 250 Set FGPlayerMoira to 1 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerFGMoira Set GimmeMoira to 1 endif endif endif endif endif endif endif If BurialSite && DoOnce7 == 0 If WillowGSCemetaryMarkerREF.GetDistance Player <= 2000 If WillowREF.WillowCanComment && WillowREF.Waiting == 0 If Player.IsTalking == 0 && WillowREF.IsTalking == 0 If Player.IsInCombat == 0 && WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0 WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDBurialSite Set DoOnce7 to 1 endif endif endif endif endif If DoOnce6 == 0 && TalkCaesarsTent == 0 If WillowREF.WillowCanComment && WillowREF.Waiting == 0 If Player.IsInCombat == 0 && WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0 If FortPraetorianTentGuardREF.GetDistance Player <= 1000 Set TalkCaesarsTent to 1 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerCaesarsTentFG WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem HelmetNVCLVeteranDecanus 1 Set DoOnce6 to 1 endif endif endif endif If DoOnce13 == 0 If BennyNovac || BennyVegas || BennyCoat If Player.GetInCell TOPSCasino If WillowREF.WillowCanComment If Player.IsTalking == 0 && WillowREF.IsTalking == 0 If Player.IsInCombat == 0 && WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0 If WillowREF.GetLOS BennyREF WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDBennyAsshole Set DoOnce13 to 1 endif endif endif endif endif endif endif If DoOnce14 == 0 If BennyNovac || BennyVegas || BennyCoat If VMQTops.BennySeduce If Player.GetInCell 2ETopsPresidentialSuite || Player.GetInCell 2ETopsBennysFloor If WillowREF.WillowCanComment If Player.IsTalking == 0 && WillowREF.IsTalking == 0 If Player.IsInCombat == 0 && WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0 WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDBennySeduction Set DoOnce14 to 1 endif endif endif endif endif endif endif If ImDone && DoOnce18 == 0 If Player.GetInCell GSGeneralStore || Player.GetInCell WestsideCoop || Player.GetDistance NVBlakeREF <= 2500 If WillowREF.WillowCanComment && WillowREF.Waiting == 0 If Player.IsTalking == 0 && WillowREF.IsTalking == 0 If Player.IsInCombat == 0 && WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0 WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDShoppingLeave Set DoOnce18 to 1 Set ImDone to 0 endif endif endif endif endif endif ;;;;;If Player lies and keeps Moira then Willow gets mad and penalizes the player If DoOnce4 == 0 If PLiesHasMoira && AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PreBFFs == 0; Set in dialogue with player when Willow has accused player of lying and having doll If Player.GetItemCount WillowVoodooDoll >= 1 If WillowsFourthContainerREF.GetItemCount WillowVoodooDoll == 0 If Player.IsTalking == 0 && WillowREF.IsTalking == 0 If Player.IsInCombat == 0 && WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0 Player.RemoveItem WillowVoodooDoll 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem WillowVoodooDoll 1 WillowREF.SayTo Player AWillowDGrabsMoira Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer -5) ;Player earns -5 for lying and stealing Moira and gets no +20 for retrieving Moira since Willow had to steal from PC to get her PlaySound WillowPlayerBad WillowREF.evp Set DoOnce4 to 1 endif endif endif endif endif endif ;;;;moves Willow into reward room at SSHQ so she can talk to player If WillowSSGnomePickup == 1 If WillowREF.GetInCell SSHQ01 WillowREF.MoveTo WillowSSHQMarkerRoomREF Set WillowSSGnomePickup to 2 endif endif ;;;;Hands over badge If WillowSSGnomePickup == 4 If Player.IsTalking == 0 && WillowREF.IsTalking == 0 If Player.IsInCombat == 0 && WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0 If WillowREF.GetDistance Player < 1000 RemoveImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX WillowREF.StartConversation Player AWFStarBottleCapsSSHQBadges2 Set WillowSSGnomePickup to 5 endif endif endif endif END

Scn Willow1iScript
short MeleeFightin short MeleeCombat short MeleeFightinEnd ref WillowsCombatTarget short PoisonTreated short PoisonTimer short Stung ;;chatter variable short CombatChatWait float CombatChatTimer short Checked short WillowWeaponType short NewWillowWeaponType short PHCombatOngoing ref CombatTarget short CheckedOutsideCombat float HPtimer short MeleeFightinStart
Begin GameMode ;;;Launches out of her Object Script in the OnStartCombat/OnCombatEnd blocks ;;;Manages a few different things over course of the mod If MeleeFightinStart == 0 If WillowREF.CombatStyleMelee == 1 ;;;;Melee Fightin stuff is keeping her on melee weapons only when on melee combat style Set MeleeFightin to 1 ;;;;so she doesn't do ranged/melee weapon switching Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set MeleeCombat to 1 WillowREF.evp Set MeleeFightinStart to 1 endif endif
;;;;End of combat ;;;;Willow waits awhile after combat ends until she starts to chatter If CombatChatWait If CombatChatTimer <= 25 Set CombatChatTimer to CombatChatTimer + GetSecondsPassed Else Set CombatChatTimer to 0 Set CombatChatWait to 0 StopQuest AWillow1i endif endif
If MeleeFightinEnd If MeleeFightin If AWillow1.WillowFollowFar Set MeleeFightin to 0 Set MeleeCombat to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 1 WillowREF.evp Set MeleeFightinEnd to 0
Else Set MeleeFightin to 0 Set MeleeCombat to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp Set MeleeFightinEnd to 0 endif endif endif END

Scn WillowJTsSqueakyBaseballScript
Begin OnEquip Player
Set JTref.Waiting to 0 Set JTref.StayNOAttack to 0 Set JTref.GoHome to 0 Set JTref.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set JTref.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set JTref.IsFollowingDefault to 1 JTref.evp JTref.MoveTo player 50, 0, 0 Player.UnequipItem WillowsJTBaseball 1
END

Scn WillowLPTimer2Script
float Timer
short KissPlayer short Kissing short KissingSequence float PPosX float PPosY float PPosZ short Stage
;;Willow give player present for becoming BFFs
Begin GameMode
If Timer >= 0 Set Timer to Timer - GetSecondsPassed
Elseif Stage == 0 If KissPlayer Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 1 WillowREF.evp Set Stage to 1 Set Timer to 1 endif
Elseif Stage == 1 Set AWillowLPTimer3.Kissing to 1 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerKissScene Set Stage to 2 Set Timer to 1
Elseif Stage == 2 ApplyImageSpaceModifier MQ08AllBlackedOutISFX WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDPRESENTCookingForYou3 Set Stage to 3 Set Timer to 4
Elseif Stage == 3 RemoveImageSpaceModifier MQ08AllBlackedOutISFX ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeInFromBlack2sISFX Set Stage to 4 Set Timer to 1
Elseif Stage == 4 WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerKissScene Set AWillowLPTimer3.Kissing to 0 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp Set Stage to 5 Set Timer to 1
Elseif Stage == 5 EnablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 StopQuest AWillowLPTimer2 endif END

Scn WillowLPTimer3Script
float Timer
short ChesterKissPlayer short Kissing short KissingSequence float PPosX float PPosY float PPosZ short Stage float PHAngle
;Willow gives player a hug and a kiss after getting Chester
Begin GameMode
If Timer >= 0 Set Timer to Timer - GetSecondsPassed
Elseif Stage == 0 If ChesterKissPlayer Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 1 WillowREF.evp Set Stage to 1 Set Timer to 1 endif
Elseif Stage == 1 Set Kissing to 1; Pkg variable WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerKissScene Set Stage to 2 Set Timer to 1
Elseif Stage == 2 ApplyImageSpaceModifier MQ08AllBlackedOutISFX WillowREF.SayTo Player WLPWillowtoPChugsThanks Set Stage to 3 Set Timer to 4
Elseif Stage == 3 RemoveImageSpaceModifier MQ08AllBlackedOutISFX ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeInFromBlack2sISFX Set Stage to 4 Set Timer to 1
Elseif Stage == 4 WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerKissScene Set Kissing to 0 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp Set Stage to 5 Set Timer to 1
Elseif Stage == 5 EnablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 StopQuest AWillowLPTimer3 endif END

Scn Willow9aScript
short RandomFindingBegins
float PayDayTimer float WillowScores float WillowBuys float FindStuff
short DoOnce short DoOnce1 short DoOnce2 short DoOnce3 short NeedsBeautyBack
Begin GameMode
If MenuMode 1009 || MenuMode 1 Return Elseif Player.GetInCell GSGeneralStore || Player.GetInCell WestsideCoOp || AWillow4a.ShoppingBlake Return Elseif Player.GetInCell WillowsCell || Player.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow Return ElseIf IsPlayerInRegion VMapTheFortRegion || IsPlayerInRegion VMapCampForlornHopeRegion Return ElseIf (RandomFindingBegins) && (GameDaysPassed >= PayDayTimer + .07) Set RandomFindingBegins to 0 Set DoOnce to 0 Return
Elseif RandomFindingBegins == 0 If WillowREF.Waiting == 0 If WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0
Set WillowScores to GetRandomPercent If WillowScores > 50 && DoOnce == 0 If (WillowREF.GetDistance Player > 200 && WillowREF.GetDistance WillowsHouseMarkerREF > 4000) WillowsFifthContainerREF.AddItem Caps001 2 Set PayDaytimer to GameDaysPassed Set RandomFindingBegins to 1 Set DoOnce to 1
Else If DoOnce == 0 WillowsFifthContainerREF.AddItem Caps001 2 WillowREF.PlayIdle WillowPickUpGroundObject Set PayDaytimer to GameDaysPassed Set RandomFindingBegins to 1 Set DoOnce to 1 endif endif
Else
If (WillowREF.GetDistance Player > 200 && WillowREF.GetDistance WillowsHouseMarkerREF > 4000) WillowsFifthContainerREF.AddItem WillowsScavengingList 1 Set PayDayTimer to GameDaysPassed Set RandomFindingBegins to 1 Set DoOnce to 1
Else If DoOnce == 0 WillowsFifthContainerREF.AddItem WillowsScavengingList 1 WillowREF.PlayIdle WillowPickUpGroundObject Set PayDayTimer to GameDaysPassed Set RandomFindingBegins to 1 Set DoOnce to 1 endif endif endif endif endif endif END

Scn WillowChairTalkingScript ;adapted from a script posted by RickerHK in the forums for another issue with activation and sitting
Begin OnActivate
If IsActionRef Player If Player.GetSitting == 3 If MenuMode Return else Activate endif Else Activate endif endif END

Scn WillowHouseLightSwitchMain
short LightsOn
Begin OnActivate
If LightsOn == 0 WHsittingareaREF.Enable 0 WHdiningtablelightREF.Enable 0 WHkitchenREF.Enable 0 Set LightsOn to 1 SetOpenState 1
Elseif LightsOn WHsittingareaREF.Disable WHdiningtablelightREF.Disable WHkitchenREF.Disable Set LightsOn to 0 SetOpenState 0 Endif
Activate
END

Scn Willow1dScript
short DateStove float Timer short Stage short DoOnce short DateOngoing short PresentTime short DoOnce1 short FirstDate
Begin GameMode
;;Timer for Willow to cook meal at stove and then get it on the table and go sit down for date with player
If Timer >= 0 Set Timer to Timer - GetSecondsPassed
Elseif Stage == 0 If AWillow1b.WillowStove && DateStove Set Stage to 1 Set Timer to .5 endif
Elseif Stage == 1 WillowREF.PlayIdle MTSpecialIdlePotStrd Set Stage to 2 Set Timer to 1
Elseif Stage == 2 WillowREF.PlayIdle MTSpecialIdleCheckStove Set Stage to 3 Set Timer to 1
Elseif Stage == 3 Set AWillow1b.WillowStove to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1.GuardAlert to 0 Set AWillow1.Relaxin to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowChillMO to 0 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set AWillowFreeform.SitCouch to 0 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerBUNGALOWsitchair Set AWillowFreeform.SitChair to 1 Set Stage to 4 Set Timer to 2
Elseif Stage == 4 If WillowREF.GetSitting == 2 || WillowREF.GetSitting == 3 WillowHouseDinnerFor2MarkerREF.Enable 0 If DoOnce == 0 WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDDateDinnersReady Set DoOnce to 1 endif If DoOnce1 == 0 Set PresentTime to 1 endif Set DoOnce1 to 1 Set Stage to 5 Set Timer to 1 endif
Elseif Stage == 5 Set DateOngoing to 1 Set DoOnce to 0 Set Stage to 0 StopQuest AWillow1d
endif END

Scn WillowHouseLightSwitchBunkroom
short LightsOn
Begin OnActivate
If LightsOn == 0 WHBunkroom1REF.Enable 0 Set LightsOn to 1 SetOpenState 1
ElseIf LightsOn WHBunkroom1REF.Disable Set LightsOn to 0 SetOpenState 0 Endif
Activate
END

Scn WillowHouseMenuClothingScript
;Initial Setup menu for Willow Permanent gear so it can be used throughout all outfits as it will be an exclusion list on all sorting
short Button ref HeadSlot0 ref HairSlot1 ref UpperBody2 ref Lefthand3 ref RightHand4 ref Pipboy6 ref Backpack7 ref Necklace8 ref Headband9 ref Hat10 ref Eyeglasses11 ref Nosering12 ref Earrings13 ref Mask14 ref Choker15 ref MouthObject16 ref BodyAddon117 ref BodyAddon218 ref BodyAddon319
Begin OnActivate Player
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.TakeMyClothes == 0 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowClothingMgmtMsg0 Else ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowClothingMgmtMsg1 endif
END
Begin MenuMode
Set Button to GetButtonPressed If Button == -1; no button has been pressed yet Return Elseif Button == 0; Do Nothing Return ElseIf Button == 1; Outfit 1 WillowHouseDrawerOutfit1REF.Activate Player Set AWillowFreeform.Outfit1Setup to 1 PlaySound DRSGunCaseOpen Return ElseIf Button == 2; Outfit 2 WillowHouseDrawerOutfit2REF.Activate Player Set AWillowFreeform.Outfit2Setup to 1 PlaySound DRSGunCaseOpen Return ElseIf Button == 3; Outfit 3 WillowHouseDrawerOutfit3REF.Activate Player Set AWillowFreeform.Outfit3Setup to 1 PlaySound DRSGunCaseOpen Return ElseIf Button == 4; Outfit 4 WillowHouseDrawerOutfit4REF.Activate Player Set AWillowFreeform.Outfit4Setup to 1 PlaySound DRSGunCaseOpen Return ElseIf Button == 5; Outfit Sleep WillowHouseDrawerSleepwearREF.Activate Player Set AWillowFreeform.OutfitSleepSetup to 1 PlaySound DRSGunCaseOpen Return ElseIf Button == 6; Outfit Swim WillowHouseDrawerSwimwearREF.Activate Player Set AWillowFreeform.OutfitSwimSetup to 1 PlaySound DRSGunCaseOpen Return ElseIf Button == 7; Outfit ftb WillowHouseDrawerFTBREF.Activate Player Set AWillowFreeform.OutfitFTBSetup to 1 PlaySound DRSGunCaseOpen Return ElseIf Button == 8; Outfit Perm If AWillowFreeform.OutfitPermSetup == 0 ;HeadSlot0 Set HeadSlot0 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 0 If HeadSlot0 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent HeadSlot0 endif ;HairSlot1 Set HairSlot1 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 1 If HairSlot1 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent HairSlot1 endif ;UpperBody2 Set UpperBody2 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 2 If UpperBody2 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent UpperBody2 endif ;Lefthand3 Set Lefthand3 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 3 If Lefthand3 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent Lefthand3 endif ;RightHand4 Set RightHand4 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 4 If RightHand4 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent RightHand4 endif ;Pipboy6 Set Pipboy6 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 6 If Pipboy6 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent Pipboy6 endif ;Backpack7 Set Backpack7 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 7 If Backpack7 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent Backpack7 endif ;Necklace8 Set Necklace8 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 8 If Necklace8 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent Necklace8 endif ;Headband9 Set Headband9 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 9 If Headband9 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent Headband9 endif ;Hat10 Set Hat10 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 10 If Hat10 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent Hat10 endif ;Eyeglasses11 Set Eyeglasses11 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 11 If Eyeglasses11 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent Eyeglasses11 endif ;Nosering12 Set Nosering12 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 12 If Nosering12 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent Nosering12 endif ;Earrings13 Set Earrings13 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 13 If Earrings13 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent Earrings13 endif ;Mask14 Set Mask14 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 14 If Mask14 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent Mask14 endif ;Choker15 Set Choker15 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 15 If Choker15 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent Choker15 endif ;MouthObject16 Set MouthObject16 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 16 If MouthObject16 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent MouthObject16 endif ;BodyAddon117 Set BodyAddon117 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 17 If BodyAddon117 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent BodyAddon117 endif ;BodyAddon218 Set BodyAddon218 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 18 If BodyAddon218 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent BodyAddon218 endif ;BodyAddon319 Set BodyAddon319 to WillowREF.GetEquippedObject 19 If BodyAddon319 AddFormToFormList WillowOutfitPermanent BodyAddon319 endif ;moving all items WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseClothingMainSortREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseClothingMainSortREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerPermanentREF 1 0 24 WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerPermanentREF 1 0 26 WillowHouseClothingMainSortREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF Set AWillowFreeform.OutfitPermSetup to 1 Return ElseIf AWillowFreeform.OutfitPermSetup ;Clear out old outfit in case player forgot to do it before he came to redo Perm Outfit WillowHouseDrawerPermanentREF.RemoveAllTypedItems Player ;Clear out old list so we can make a new one ;HeadSlot0 If HeadSlot0 ListRemoveForm WillowOutfitPermanent HeadSlot0 endif If HairSlot1 ListRemoveForm WillowOutfitPermanent HairSlot1 endif If UpperBody2 ListRemoveForm WillowOutfitPermanent UpperBody2 endif If Lefthand3 ListRemoveForm WillowOutfitPermanent Lefthand3 endif If RightHand4 ListRemoveForm WillowOutfitPermanent RightHand4 endif If Pipboy6 ListRemoveForm WillowOutfitPermanent Pipboy6 endif If Backpack7 ListRemoveForm WillowOutfitPermanent Backpack7 endif If Necklace8 ListRemoveForm WillowOutfitPermanent Necklace8 endif If Headband9 ListRemoveForm WillowOutfitPermanent Headband9 endif If Hat10 ListRemoveForm WillowOutfitPermanent Hat10 FollowerMessageWillowGeckoSlayerChallengeComplete Set DoOnce8 to 1 endif ;Pencil and Gecko Slayer challenges need message announcements If DoOnce11 == 0 && AWillow4a.GeckoSlayerChallengeUnlocked ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowGeckoSlayerAnnouncement Set DoOnce11 to 1 endif If DoOnce12 == 0 && AWillow4a.PencilChallengeUnlocked ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowPencilAnnouncement Set DoOnce12 to 1 endif ;Set up tracking for player level for later use If GetStageDone AWillowMeetQuest 2 == 1 && DoOnce9 == 0 Set PlayerLevelHired to Player.GetLevel Set DoOnce9 to 1 endif ;Set up tracking for player for later use ;I'm gonna track level and how often player and Willow go into the house then do stuff. RadioStuff to 0 ElseIf STthreerandom <= 100 Set RadioOff to 1 Set RoutineSurprises to 1 Set FirstSurprise to 1 Set RadioStuff to 0 endif Elseif RadioCountry Set STthreerandom to getrandompercent If Set RadioStuff to 0 endif Elseif RadioOff Set STthreerandom to getrandompercent If STthreerandom < 50 Set RadioCountry to 1 Set RoutineSurprises to 1 Set FirstSurprise to 1 Set RadioStuff to 0 ElseIf I don't want it running all the time. If WillowsHouseMarkerREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow == 0 || AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.TakeMyClothes == 0 || WillowShowerSleepDelay Return ElseIf (GetCurrentTime > 1 && GetCurrentTime < 1.5) If StartSleepQuest == 0 && (WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow && WillowREF.Waiting) Set AWillow1h.PlayerWakesWillow to 0 StartQuest AWillow1h Set StartSleepQuest to 1 endif endif END

Scn Willow1fScript
float WillowStartReadingBook short WillowHasBook
; Book reading time is 5 days
Begin GameMode
If WillowHasBook If GameDaysPassed - WillowStartReadingBook >= 5 WillowREF.RemoveNote WillowsReadingBook WillowREF.ModAV Unarmed 4 Set WillowHasBook to 0 Set WillowStartReadingBook to 0 StopQuest AWillow1f endif endif
END

Scn Willow1gScript
float WillowStartReadingMagazine short WillowHasMag
; Magazine reading time is 3 days
Begin GameMode
If WillowHasMag If GameDaysPassed - WillowStartReadingMagazine >= 3 WillowREF.RemoveNote WillowsReadingMagazine WillowREF.ModAV Unarmed 5 Set WillowHasMag to 0 Set WillowStartReadingMagazine to 0 StopQuest AWillow1g endif endif
END

Begin OnActivate Player
ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowHouseMenuSort
END
Begin GameMode
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
elseif Button == 0; Do Nothing Return
elseif Button == 1; Dump Scavenging Container into Player's Inventory WillowsFifthContainerREF.RemoveAllTypedItems Player 1 1 PlaySound UIItemsClothingUp Return
elseif Button == 2; Dump Aid Items into Player's Inventory WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems Player 1 1 47 WillowSortDONOTSORTAidForWillow WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems Player 1 1 31 WillowSortDONOTSORTMiscForWillow WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems Player 1 1 25; books PlaySound UIItemsClothingUp Return
elseif Button == 3; Sort 047 All of it If Player.GetItemCount NVRepairKit > 0 Set PlayerNVRepairKit to Player.GetItemCount NVRepairKit Player.RemoveItem NVRepairKit PlayerNVRepairKit 1 WillowHouseSortWRKREF.AddItem NVRepairKit PlayerNVRepairKit endif
Player.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortBooksMagREF 1 0 25; Books
Player.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF 1 0 47 WillowSortPlayer047 ;Fridge all drinks WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortOffScreen2REF 1 0 47 WillowSortAidFridgeDrinksList WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortFridgeREF 1 0 47 WillowSortAidDrinksCampfireCrafting ;Drinks to crafting WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF
;Food WillowHouseSortOffScreen2REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF 1 0 47 WillowSortAidFoodList WillowHouseSortOffScreen2REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortKitchenCounterFoodREF 1 0 47 WillowSortAidFoodCampfireCrafting ;food to crafting WillowHouseSortOffScreen2REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF 1 0 47
;Mags WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortOffScreen2REF 1 0 47 WillowSortAidMagList WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortBooksMagREF 1 0 47

;Chems: WillowHouseSortOffScreen2REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortChemsBoxREF 1 0 47
PlaySound DRSLocker02Close Return
elseif Button == 4; Sort 047 only crafting supplies Player.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF 1 0 47 WillowSortPlayer047 ;Drinks to crafting WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortOffScreen2REF 1 0 47 WillowSortAidDrinksCampfireCrafting WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF 1 0 47

PlaySound DRSLocker02Close Return

WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortAmmoGunsREF 1 0 41 WillowSortDONOTSORTAmmoGuns WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortAmmoEWREF 1 0 41 WillowSortDONOTSORTAmmoEW WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortAmmoExplosivesREF 1 0 41 WillowSortDONOTSORTAmmoExplosives WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortAmmoDumpREF 1 0 41; everything else from mods that ended up in ammo category PlaySound DRSLocker02Close Return
elseif Button == 6; Sort Armor ;;;set up player gear list ;HeadSlot0 Set HeadSlot0 to Player.GetEquippedObject 0 If HeadSlot0 AddFormToFormList WillowSortPlayerGear HeadSlot0 endif ;HairSlot1 Set HairSlot1 to Player.GetEquippedObject 1 If HairSlot1 AddFormToFormList WillowSortPlayerGear HairSlot1 endif ;UpperBody2 Set UpperBody2 to Player.GetEquippedObject 2 If UpperBody2 AddFormToFormList WillowSortPlayerGear UpperBody2 endif ;Lefthand3 Set Lefthand3 to Player.GetEquippedObject 3 If Lefthand3 AddFormToFormList WillowSortPlayerGear Lefthand3 endif ;RightHand4 Set RightHand4 to Player.GetEquippedObject 4 If RightHand4 AddFormToFormList WillowSortPlayerGear RightHand4 endif ;Pipboy6 Set Pipboy6 to Player.GetEquippedObject 6 If Pipboy6 AddFormToFormList WillowSortPlayerGear Necklace8 AddFormToFormList WillowSortPlayerGear Necklace8 endif ;Headband9 Set Headband9 to Player.GetEquippedObject 9 If Headband9 AddFormToFormList WillowSortPlayerGear Headband9 endif ;Hat10 Set If HeadSlot0 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear HeadSlot0 endif If HairSlot1 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear HairSlot1 endif If UpperBody2 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear UpperBody2 endif If Lefthand3 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear Lefthand3 endif If RightHand4 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear RightHand4 endif If Pipboy6 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear Pipboy6 endif If Backpack7 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear Backpack7 endif If Necklace8 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear Necklace8 endif If Headband9 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear Headband9 endif If Hat10 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear Hat10 endif If Eyeglasses11 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear Eyeglasses11 endif If Nosering12 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear Nosering12 endif If Earrings13 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear Earrings13 endif If Mask14 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear Mask14 endif If Choker15 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear Choker15 endif If MouthObject16 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear MouthObject16 endif If BodyAddon117 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear BodyAddon117 endif If BodyAddon218 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear BodyAddon218 endif If BodyAddon319 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerGear BodyAddon319 endif PlaySound DRSLocker02Close Return

elseif Button == 8; Sort Miscellaneous Items If Player.GetItemCount Flour > 0 Set PlayerFlour to Player.GetItemCount Flour Player.RemoveItem Flour PlayerFlour 1 WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem Flour PlayerFlour endif
Player.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF 1 0 31 WillowSortDONOTSORTMisc
;Reloading Bench: WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortOffScreen2REF 1 0 31 WillowSortMiscAmmoCraftingList WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortReloadingREF 1 0 31 ;Workbench WillowHouseSortOffScreen2REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF 1 0 31 WillowSortMiscWorkbenchCraftingList WillowHouseSortOffScreen2REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseWorkbenchSuppliesREF 1 0 31 ;Campfire Crafting WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortOffScreen2REF 1 0 31 WillowSortMiscCampfireCraftingList WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF 1 0 31 ;Shared Crafting WillowHouseSortOffScreen2REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF 1 0 31 WillowSortMiscSharedCraftingList WillowHouseSortOffScreen2REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortCraftingBenchesSharedREF 1 0 31 ;Books WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortOffScreen2REF 1 0 31 WillowSortMiscBook WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortBooksMagREF 1 0 31 ;Everything Else (dumping everything just in case something has been left behind in my sorting containers) WillowHouseSortOffScreen1REF.RemoveAllItems WillowHouseSortMiscJunkREF 1 1 WillowHouseSortOffScreen2REF.RemoveAllItems WillowHouseSortMiscJunkREF 1 1 PlaySound DRSLocker02Close Return
elseif Button == 9; Sort Weapons ;;;set up player hotkeyed gear list ;HK1 Set HK1 to GetHotkeyItem 1 If HK1 AddFormToFormList WillowSortPlayerWeapon HK1 endif ;HK2 Set HK2 to GetHotkeyItem 2 If HK2 AddFormToFormList WillowSortPlayerWeapon HK2 endif ;HK3 Set HK3 to GetHotkeyItem 3 If HK3 AddFormToFormList WillowSortPlayerWeapon HK3 endif ;HK4 Set HK4 to GetHotkeyItem 4 If HK4 AddFormToFormList WillowSortPlayerWeapon HK4 endif ;HK5 Set HK5 to GetHotkeyItem 5 If HK5 AddFormToFormList WillowSortPlayerWeapon HK5 endif ;HK6 Set HK6 to GetHotkeyItem 6 If HK6 AddFormToFormList WillowSortPlayerWeapon HK6 endif ;HK7 Set HK7 to GetHotkeyItem 7 If HK7 AddFormToFormList WillowSortPlayerWeapon HK7 endif ;HK8 Set HK8 to GetHotkeyItem 8 If HK8 AddFormToFormList WillowSortPlayerWeapon HK8 endif ;weapons Remove all weapons from player EXCEPT newly created list of gear player has hotkeyed/equipped now safely excluded by newly created list Player.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortWeaponsREF 1 0 40 WillowSortPlayerWeapon; Weapons Player.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseSortWeaponsREF 1 0 103; IMOD
;;;Clear out current contents of list for next sorting cycle
If HK1 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerWeapon HK1 endif If HK2 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerWeapon HK2 endif If HK3 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerWeapon HK3 endif If HK4 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerWeapon HK4 endif If HK5 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerWeapon HK5 endif If HK6 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerWeapon HK6 endif If HK7 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerWeapon HK7 endif If HK8 ListRemoveForm WillowSortPlayerWeapon HK8 endif PlaySound DRSLocker02Close Return endif END

Scn WillowCampfirePutOutScript
short Button
Begin OnActivate Player
ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowCampfireScript
END
Begin GameMode
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
elseif Button == 0; Player chooses to cook at campfire Activate Player.ShowRecipeMenu CampfireRecipes Return
elseif Button == 1; Player chooses to clean up campfire only Set AWillow1.CampfireOut to 0 Disable MarkForDelete Return
endif END

Scn WillowLPftbTimerScript
;;; Fade to Black scene
short Stage short DoOnce short PostFTBchat short FTBAgain short DoOnce1 short BungalowIsHome short AtHome short NoDance short MiscOutfit short Usingftboutfit short BungalowBed
float Timer
Begin GameMode
If Timer > 0 Set Timer to Timer - GetSecondsPassed
Elseif Stage == 0 If AWillowLIkesPlayerQuest.FTBisOn == 1 DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 0 1 1 If (WillowsHouseMarkerREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow && Player.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow) If AWillowFreeform.Outfit1 WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerOutfit1REF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerOutfit1REF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set AWillowFreeform.Outfit1 to 1 ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Outfit2 WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerOutfit2REF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerOutfit2REF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set AWillowFreeform.Outfit2 to 1 ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Outfit3 WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerOutfit3REF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerOutfit3REF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set AWillowFreeform.Outfit3 to 1 ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Outfit4 WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerOutfit4REF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerOutfit4REF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set AWillowFreeform.Outfit4 to 1 ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Swimwear WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerSwimwearREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerSwimwearREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set AWillowFreeform.Swimwear to 1 ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Sleepwear WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerSleepwearREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerSleepwearREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set AWillowFreeform.Sleepwear to 1 ElseIf AWillowFreeform.ftb WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerFTBREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerFTBREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Else WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseClothingMainSortREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseClothingMainSortREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set MiscOutfit to 1 endif
WillowHouseDrawerFTBREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF Set Usingftboutfit to 1 Set Stage to 1 Set Timer to 1
Else WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowsSleepyTimeContainerREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowsSleepyTimeContainerREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set Stage to 1 Set Timer to 1 endif endif
Elseif Stage == 1 If (WillowsHouseMarkerREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow && Player.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow) WillowHouseDrawerFTBREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 WillowREF.AddItem AmmoMicroFusionCell 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem AmmoMicroFusionCell 1 Set Stage to 2 Set Timer to 1 Else Set Stage to 2 Set Timer to .1 endif
Elseif Stage == 2 If (WillowsHouseMarkerREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow && Player.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow) If NoDance Set Stage to 4 Set Timer to .1 ElseIf NoDance == 0 WillowREF.PlayIdle WillowsBootyShake Set Stage to 4 Set Timer to 21 endif Else WillowREF.PlayIdle WillowsBootyShake Set Stage to 3 Set Timer to 21 endif
Elseif Stage == 3 WillowREF.Look Player Set AWillow1.DanceWithHooker to 1 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerFTBwalktoplayer Set Stage to 4 Set Timer to 3
Elseif Stage == 4 If (WillowsHouseMarkerREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow && Player.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow) Set BungalowBed to 1 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerHouseSleepFTB Set NoDance to 0 Set Stage to 6 Set Timer to 5 Set NoDance to 0 Else If DoOnce == 0 ApplyImageSpaceModifier MQ08AllBlackedOutISFX WillowREF.SayTo WillowREF AWDftbChatter Set Stage to 5 Set Timer to 14 Set DoOnce to 1 endif endif
Elseif Stage == 5 WillowsSleepyTimeContainerREF.RemoveAllItems WillowREF WillowREF.AddItem AmmoMicroFusionCell 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem AmmoMicroFusionCell 1 Set Stage to 6 Set Timer to 2
Elseif Stage == 6 If (WillowsHouseMarkerREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow && Player.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow) If DoOnce1 == 0 ApplyImageSpaceModifier MQ08AllBlackedOutISFX WillowREF.SayTo WillowREF AWDftbChatter Set DoOnce1 to 1 Set Stage to 7 Set Timer to 14 endif Else; starting to wrap up "classic" ftb Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PostFTBchat to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PostFTBComment to 1 Set AWillow1.DanceWithHooker to 0 WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerFTBwalktoplayer Set GameHour to GameHour +1 RemoveImageSpaceModifier MQ08AllBlackedOutISFX ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeInFromBlack2sISFX EnablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 Set Stage to 9 Set Timer to 1 endif
Elseif Stage == 7;continuing on with ftb if in bungalow Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PostFTBchat to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PostFTBComment to 1 Set GameHour to GameHour +1 RemoveImageSpaceModifier MQ08AllBlackedOutISFX ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeInFromBlack2sISFX EnablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 Set Stage to 8 Set Timer to 10
Elseif Stage == 8 Set DoOnce to 0 Set DoOnce1 to 0 Set Stage to 10 Set Timer to 1 WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerHouseSleepFTB Set BungalowBed to 0
If Usingftboutfit WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerFTBREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerFTBREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set Usingftboutfit to 0 endif If AWillowFreeform.Outfit1 WillowHouseDrawerOutfit1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerOutfit1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Outfit2 WillowHouseDrawerOutfit2REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerOutfit2REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Outfit3 WillowHouseDrawerOutfit3REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerOutfit3REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Outfit4 WillowHouseDrawerOutfit4REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerOutfit4REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Swimwear WillowHouseDrawerSwimwearREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerSwimwearREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Sleepwear WillowHouseDrawerSleepwearREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerSleepwearREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.ftb WillowHouseDrawerFTBREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerFTBREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Elseif MiscOutfit WillowHouseClothingMainSortREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseClothingMainSortREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set MiscOutfit to 0 endif
WillowREF.Additem WillowsWeaponToken 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem WillowsWeaponToken 1
Elseif Stage == 9; ends "classic" Willow ftb If AWillow1.WillowFollowFar Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 1 WillowREF.evp Else Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp endif Set DoOnce to 0 Set Stage to 0 If AWillow4c.HoldMe WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDFTBcloser endif Set WillowREF.WeaponSwap to 1; sent out to return weapons Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.FTBisOn to 0 StopQuest AWillowLPftbTimer
Elseif Stage == 10 If AWillow1.WillowFollowFar Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 1 WillowREF.evp Else Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp endif WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDFTBcloser ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowAfterlow Player.CIOS WillowsVersionWellRested Set Stage to 11 Set Timer to .016
Elseif Stage == 11 Set Stage to 0 Set WillowREF.WeaponSwap to 1; send out to return weapons Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.FTBisOn to 0 StopQuest AWillowLPftbTimer endif END

Scn WillowHouseLightsExteriorScript
short LightsOn
Begin GameMode
If LightsOn; day If GetCurrentTime < 19.50 && GetCurrentTime > 6.0 Disable 0 Set LightsOn to 0 endif
Else; night If GetCurrentTime > 19.50 || GetCurrentTime < 6.0 Enable 0 Set LightsOn to 1 endif endif
END

Scn WillowPresentsHeartBoxCleanUpScript
short Button
Begin OnActivate Player
ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowSurpriseBoxMessage
END
Begin MenuMode
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
elseif Button == 0; opens box Activate Return
elseif Button == 1; player cleans up empty box Disable Return
elseif Button == 2; Player does nothing Return endif
END

Scn WillowJTaScript
short WaitingWithWillow short TurnOffFollow short GoingL38 short FL short JTfl short WaitWWOverride short PlayerUsedRadio short DoOnce
;;;most variables in JTScript
Begin GameMode
If Player.IsInCombat == 0 && JTref.FollowerSwitchAggressive == 0 If JTref.IsIncombat JTref.StopCombat endif endif
;;;;;; Puts him on/off no attacking at all ambush package/wait so he just hangs around during combat if that's what player prefers
IF JTref.NOAttackToggle If JTref.IsFollowingDefault || JTref.IsFollowingLong If JTref.Waiting == 0 If Player.IsInCombat JTref.SetGhost 1 JTref.SetAV Confidence 1 JTref.SetAV Perception 1 Set JTref.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set JTref.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set JTref.StayNOAttack to 1 JTref.evp Set JTref.Waiting to 1 endif endif endif endif
If JTref.StayNOAttack If Player.IsInCombat == 0 If JTref.IsFollowingDefault || JTref.IsFollowingLong JTref.SetGhost 1 JTref.SetAV Confidence 3 JTref.SetAV Perception 6 Set JTref.StayNOAttack to 0 Set JTref.Waiting to 0 Set JTref.IsFollowingDefault to 1 JTref.evp
Elseif JTref.FollowFar == 1 JTref.SetGhost 1 JTref.SetAV Confidence 3 JTref.SetAV Perception 6 Set JTref.StayNOAttack to 0 Set JTref.Waiting to 0 Set JTref.IsFollowingLong to 1 JTref.evp
Else JTref.SetGhost 1 JTref.SetAV Confidence 3 JTref.SetAV Perception 6 Set JTref.StayNOAttack to 0 Set JTref.Waiting to 0 Set JTref.IsFollowingDefault to 1 JTref.evp endif endif endif
;;; Automatic call back from wherever if he gets too far behind
If Player.GetInCell Vault22a == 0 || Player.GetInCell Vault22b == 0 || Player.GetInCell Vault22c == 0 || Player.GetInCell Vault22d == 0 || Player.GetInCell Vault22e == 0 || Player.GetInCell Lucky38BasementFloorB2 == 0 || Player.GetInCell Lucky38Penthouse == 0 || Player.GetInCell Lucky38ControlRoom == 0 If JTref.GetInCell Lucky38SuiteFloor22 == 0 If (JTref.GetDistance JTshousemarkerREF > 4000 && JTref.Waiting == 0) If JTref.Waiting == 0 If JTref.GetDead == 0 If JTref.GetDistance Player > 5000 If JTref.IsFollowingDefault || JTref.IsFollowingLong JTref.MoveTo Player 100, 0, 0 endif endif endif endif endif endif endif
;;;; This gives the player the benefit of the Ferocious Loyalty Perk for J.T.
If Player.HasPerk FerociousLoyalty && Player.GetHealthPercentage < .5 If JTref.HasBeenHired && JTfl == 0 JTref.AddSpell FerociousLoyaltyEffect Set JTfl to 1 endif endif
If JTfl && Player.GetHealthPercentage >=.5 JTref.Dispel FerociousLoyaltyEffect Set JTfl to 0 endif
If AWillowJT2.PoisonTreated == 0 && JTREF.GetItemCount NVAntivenom > 0 If JTREF.IsSpellTarget BarkScorpionPoison || JTREF.IsSpellTarget CazadorPoison || JTREF.IsSpellTarget DeathClawPoison || JTREF.IsSpellTarget DLC03FeralGhoulPoison || JTREF.IsSpellTarget DLC03RadScorpion3Poison || JTREF.IsSpellTarget PoisonGreaseRadscorpionSpell || JTREF.IsSpellTarget NightstalkerPoison || JTREF.IsSpellTarget RadScorpion1Poison || JTREF.IsSpellTarget RadScorpion2Poison Set AWillowJT2.PoisonTreated to 1 StartQuest AWillowJT2 endif endif
If DoOnce == 0 If GetStageDone VHDHouseBattle 100 || GetStageDone VHDIndependentBattle 100 || GetStageDone vHDBattleController 30 || GetStageDone VHDLegionBattle 100 JTref.MoveTo CassHomeMarkerREF Set JTref.StayNOAttack to 0 Set JTref.GoHome to 0 Set JTref.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set JTref.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set JTref.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set JTref.Waiting to 1 JTref.evp Set DoOnce to 1 endif endif END

Scn WillowHouseBedSCRIPT
;Incorporates vanilla devs player bed script
short playerSleep short Sleepin
begin OnActivate if isActionRef player == 1 ; set playerBed ref variable to me set playerSleep to 1 endif Activate end
begin menumode ; player has activated me and is sleeping if playerSleep == 1 && IsPCSleeping == 1 set playerSleep to 2 endif end
Begin GameMode if playerSleep > 0 if playerSleep == 2 ; player has actually slept in this bed ; give player Well-Rested spell and then clear variable player.CastImmediateOnSelf WellRestedSpell endif ; clear variable set playerSleep to 0 endif END

Scn Willow9cScript ;;; Handles Willow's campfire cooking
short CookForMe short DoOnce short DoOnce1 short BrahminEnGarde short VegPocket short DogTreats short SweetCake short Coffee short WillowGeckoSteak short WillowGeckoKebab short SendOut short NeedsBeautyBack short PlayerCount short StoveCookin short PlayerTotal short FridgeCount short KCcount short SortKCcount short SCCcount short CCooked short AntStew short MantisCasserole short CazPuff short PlaceInventory
float Timer
Begin GameMode
If AWillow1.CampfireOut ;Remove the items from the player's inventory after he asks Willow to put out campfire or she's cooking at the Stove at bungalow ;If player has her ingredients this moves them to her container automatically ;Apple If Player.GetItemCount Apple > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount Apple Player.RemoveItem Apple PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem Apple PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif ;NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit If Player.GetItemCount NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit Player.RemoveItem NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif ;BlamcoMacandCheese If Player.GetItemCount BlamcoMacandCheese > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount BlamcoMacandCheese Player.RemoveItem BlamcoMacandCheese PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem BlamcoMacandCheese PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif ;BrahminMeat If Player.GetItemCount BrahminMeat > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount BrahminMeat Player.RemoveItem BrahminMeat PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem BrahminMeat PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif ;BrocFlower If Player.GetItemCount BrocFlower > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount BrocFlower Player.RemoveItem BrocFlower PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem BrocFlower PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif ;Carrot If Player.GetItemCount Carrot > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount Carrot Player.RemoveItem Carrot PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem Carrot PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif ;NukaColaBottle If Player.GetItemCount NukaColaBottle > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount NukaColaBottle Player.RemoveItem NukaColaBottle PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem NukaColaBottle PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif ;Flour If Player.GetItemCount Flour > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount Flour Player.RemoveItem Flour PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem Flour PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif ;NVGeckoMeat If Player.GetItemCount NVGeckoMeat > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount NVGeckoMeat Player.RemoveItem NVGeckoMeat PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem NVGeckoMeat PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif ;JalapenoPepper If Player.GetItemCount JalapenoPepper > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount JalapenoPepper Player.RemoveItem JalapenoPepper PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem JalapenoPepper PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif ;NukaCola If Player.GetItemCount NukaCola > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount NukaCola Player.RemoveItem NukaCola PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem NukaCola PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif ;NVPinyonNuts If Player.GetItemCount NVPinyonNuts > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount NVPinyonNuts Player.RemoveItem NVPinyonNuts PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem NVPinyonNuts PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif ;Potato If Player.GetItemCount Potato > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount Potato Player.RemoveItem Potato PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem Potato PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif ;WaterPurified If Player.GetItemCount WaterPurified > 2 Player.RemoveItem WaterPurified 2 WillowREF.AddItem WaterPurified 2 Set SendOut to 1 endif ;SSBottleFull If Player.GetItemCount SSBottleFull > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount SSBottleFull Player.RemoveItem SSBottleFull PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem SSBottleFull PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif ;SugarBombs01 If Player.GetItemCount SugarBombs01 > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount SugarBombs01 Player.RemoveItem SugarBombs01 PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem SugarBombs01 PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif ;XanderRoot If Player.GetItemCount XanderRoot > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount XanderRoot Player.RemoveItem XanderRoot PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem XanderRoot PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif ;AntMeat If AWillowFreeform.RecipeUnlock01 > 0 If Player.GetItemCount AntMeat > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount AntMeat Player.RemoveItem AntMeat PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem AntMeat PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif endif ;MantisLeg If AWillowFreeform.RecipeUnlock02 > 0 If Player.GetItemCount MantisLeg > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount MantisLeg Player.RemoveItem MantisLeg PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem MantisLeg PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif endif ;CazadorEgg If AWillowFreeform.RecipeUnlock03 > 0 If Player.GetItemCount CazadorEgg > 0 Set PlayerCount to Player.GetItemCount CazadorEgg Player.RemoveItem CazadorEgg PlayerCount 1 WillowREF.AddItem CazadorEgg PlayerCount 1 Set SendOut to 1 endif endif endif
If AWillow1.CampfireOut ;Willow "cooks" at campfire or Stove in Novac Bungalow ;Veg Pockets If (WillowREF.GetItemCount NVGeckoMeat >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemCount Potato >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemCount Carrot >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemCount Flour >= 1) WillowREF.RemoveItem NVGeckoMeat 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Potato 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Carrot 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Flour 1 WillowREF.AddItem WillowsGeckoVegPocket 1 Set SendOut to 1 Set CCooked to 1 endif ;Dog Treats If (WillowREF.GetItemCount NVGeckoMeat >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemCount BlamcoMacandCheese >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemCount Flour >= 1) WillowREF.RemoveItem NVGeckoMeat 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem BlamcoMacandCheese 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Flour 1 WillowREF.AddItem WillowsDoggieTreats 2 Set SendOut to 1 Set CCooked to 1 endif ;Nuka-Star Coffee If (WillowREF.GetItemcount BrocFlower >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount XanderRoot >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount NVPinyonNuts >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount WaterPurified >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount SSBottleFull >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount NukaCola >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount Caps001 >= 3 && WillowREF.GetItemcount SodaBottleEmpty01 >= 3) WillowREF.RemoveItem BrocFlower 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem XanderRoot 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem NVPinyonNuts 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem WaterPurified 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem SSBottleFull 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem NukaCola 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Caps001 3 WillowREF.RemoveItem NukaColaBottle 3 WillowREF.AddItem WillowsColeensFamousCoffee 3 Set SendOut to 1 Set CCooked to 1 endif ;Sweet Cake If (WillowREF.GetItemcount Apple >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount Carrot >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount SugarBombs01 >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount SSBottleFull >= 1) WillowREF.RemoveItem Apple 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Carrot 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem SugarBombs01 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem SSBottleFull 1 WillowREF.AddItem WillowsSweetCake 1 Set SendOut to 1 Set CCooked to 1 endif ;Gecko Kebab If (WillowREF.GetItemCount NVGeckoMeat >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemCount JalapenoPepper >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemCount NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit >= 1) WillowREF.RemoveItem NVGeckoMeat 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem JalapenoPepper 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit 1 WillowREF.AddItem GeckoKebab 1 Set SendOut to 1 Set CCooked to 1 endif ;Brahnim En Garde If (WillowREF.GetItemCount BrahminMeat >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemCount NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit >= 1) WillowREF.RemoveItem BrahminMeat 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit 1 WillowREF.AddItem WillowsBrahminEnGarde 2 Set SendOut to 1 Set CCooked to 1 endif ;Gecko Steak If WillowREF.GetItemCount NVGeckoMeat >= 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem NVGeckoMeat 1 WillowREF.AddItem NVGeckoSteak 1 Set SendOut to 1 Set CCooked to 1 endif ;Ant Stew If AWillowFreeform.RecipeUnlock01 > 0 If (WillowREF.GetItemcount AntMeat >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount Carrot >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount Potato >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount WaterPurified >= 1) WillowREF.RemoveItem Carrot 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Potato 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem WaterPurified 1 WillowREF.AddItem WillowsAntMeatStew 1 Set SendOut to 1 Set CCooked to 1 endif endif ;Mantis Casserole If AWillowFreeform.RecipeUnlock02 > 0 If (WillowREF.GetItemcount MantisLeg >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount JalapenoPepper >= 2 && WillowREF.GetItemcount BlamcoMacandCheese >= 1) WillowREF.RemoveItem MantisLeg 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem JalapenoPepper 2 WillowREF.RemoveItem BlamcoMacandCheese 1 WillowREF.AddItem WillowsMantisCasserole 1 Set SendOut to 1 Set CCooked to 1 endif endif ;Cazador Egg Puff If AWillowFreeform.RecipeUnlock03 > 0 If (WillowREF.GetItemcount BrahminMeat >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit >= 2 && WillowREF.GetItemcount CazadorEgg >= 1) WillowREF.RemoveItem BrahminMeat 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit 2 WillowREF.RemoveItem CazadorEgg 1 WillowREF.AddItem WillowsCazadorEggPuff 1 Set SendOut to 1 Set CCooked to 1 endif endif
If CCooked If DoOnce == 0 WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDCookingCampfireAlert Set DoOnce to 1 endif Else If DoOnce1 == 0 WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDHouseCookingAlertNO Set DoOnce1 to 1 endif endif endif
If PlaceInventory ;;;;Moved adding items for shopping here because they were making her weapon disappear there and want to handle that issue here If VegPocket WillowREF.AddItem NVGeckoMeat 1 WillowREF.AddItem Potato 1 WillowREF.AddItem Carrot 1 WillowREF.AddItem Flour 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Caps001 20 Set VegPocket to 0 Set SendOut to 1 endif If DogTreats WillowREF.AddItem BlamcoMacandCheese 1 WillowREF.AddItem Flour 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Caps001 15 Set DogTreats to 0 Set SendOut to 1 endif If SweetCake WillowREF.AddItem Apple 1 WillowREF.AddItem Carrot 1 WillowREF.AddItem SugarBombs01 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Caps001 15 Set SweetCake to 0 Set SendOut to 1 endif If Coffee WillowREF.AddItem BrocFlower 1 WillowREF.AddItem XanderRoot 1 WillowREF.AddItem NVPinyonNuts 1 WillowREF.AddItem NukaColaBottle 3 WillowREF.RemoveItem Caps001 20 Set Coffee to 0 Set SendOut to 1 endif If WillowGeckoKebab WillowREF.AddItem JalapenoPepper 1 WillowREF.AddItem NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Caps001 10 Set WillowGeckoKebab to 0 Set SendOut to 1 endif If AntStew WillowREF.AddItem Carrot 1 WillowREF.AddItem Potato 1 WillowREF.AddItem WaterPurified 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Caps001 20 Set AntStew to 0 Set SendOut to 1 endif If MantisCasserole WillowREF.AddItem JalapenoPepper 2 WillowREF.AddItem BlamcoMacandCheese 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Caps001 15 Set MantisCasserole to 0 Set SendOut to 1 endif If CazPuff WillowREF.AddItem BrahminMeat 1 WillowREF.AddItem NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Caps001 15 Set CazPuff to 0 Set SendOut to 1 endif endif Set PlaceInventory to 0
;;;;fix for blinky weapon... If SendOut If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsRifle WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsRifle 0 endif WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowsFU2weaponsBoxREF 0 1 40 Set WillowREF.WeaponSwap to 1 StopQuest AWillow9c Else StopQuest AWillow9c endif END

Scn WillowHouseMenuRadioSwitchScript
short Button short Setup
Begin OnActivate Player ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowHouseRadioChoiceScript END
Begin MenuMode
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
elseif Button == 0; New Vegas Radio WillowHouseRadioNewVegasREF.Enable 0 WillowHouseRadioCountryREF.Disable 0 WillowHouseRadioCountryREF.SetOpenState 0 WillowHouseRadioNoStationREF.Disable 0 WillowHouseRadioNewVegasREF.SetOpenState 1 Set AWillowFreeform.RadioNV to 1 Set AWillowFreeform.RadioCountry to 0 Set AWillowFreeform.RadioOff to 0 Return
elseif Button == 1; Mojave Radio WillowHouseRadioCountryREF.Enable 0 WillowHouseRadioNewVegasREF.Disable 0 WillowHouseRadioNewVegasREF.SetOpenState 0 WillowHouseRadioNoStationREF.Disable 0 WillowHouseRadioCountryREF.SetOpenState 1 Set AWillowFreeform.RadioCountry to 1 Set AWillowFreeform.RadioNV to 0 Set AWillowFreeform.RadioOff to 0 Return
elseif Button == 2; Turn off radios WillowHouseRadioNoStationREF.Enable 0 WillowHouseRadioNewVegasREF.Disable 0 WillowHouseRadioCountryREF.Disable 0 WillowHouseRadioNoStationREF.SetOpenState 0 Set AWillowFreeform.RadioNV to 0 Set AWillowFreeform.RadioCountry to 0 Set AWillowFreeform.RadioOff to 1 Return
elseif Button == 3 ; Do Nothing Return endif END
Begin OnLoad If AWillowFreeform.RadioOff WillowHouseRadioNewVegasREF.SetOpenState 0 WillowHouseRadioCountryREF.SetOpenState 0 WillowHouseRadioNoStationREF.SetOpenState 0 endif
If AWillowFreeform.RadioCountry If WillowHouseRadioCountryREF.GetDisabled WillowHouseRadioCountryREF.Enable 0 WillowHouseRadioNewVegasREF.Disable 0 WillowHouseRadioNoStationREF.Disable 0 endif WillowHouseRadioCountryREF.SetOpenState 1 WillowHouseRadioNewVegasREF.SetOpenState 0 WillowHouseRadioNoStationREF.SetOpenState 0 endif
If AWillowFreeform.RadioNV && Setup If WillowHouseRadioNewVegasREF.GetDisabled WillowHouseRadioNewVegasREF.Enable 0 WillowHouseRadioNoStationREF.Disable 0 WillowHouseRadioCountryREF.Disable 0 endif WillowHouseRadioNewVegasREF.SetOpenState 1 WillowHouseRadioNoStationREF.SetOpenState 0 WillowHouseRadioCountryREF.SetOpenState 0 endif
If Setup == 0 Set AWillowFreeform.RadioNV to 1 If WillowHouseRadioNewVegasREF.GetDisabled WillowHouseRadioNewVegasREF.Enable 0 WillowHouseRadioNoStationREF.Disable 0 WillowHouseRadioCountryREF.Disable 0 endif WillowHouseRadioNewVegasREF.SetOpenState 1 WillowHouseRadioNoStationREF.SetOpenState 0 WillowHouseRadioCountryREF.SetOpenState 0 Set Setup to 1 endif END

Scn WillowFreeformActBananaYuccaScript
short Button short DigMeUp
Begin OnActivate Player If GetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowFreeform 15 == 1 && Player.GetItemCount WeapShovel >= 1 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowItemTakeIntoInventoryScript Set DigMeUp to 1 ElseIf GetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowFreeform 15 == 1 && Player.GetItemCount WeapShovel == 0 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowNoShovelMsg Return Else ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowNoHarvest Return endif END
Begin GameMode
If DigMeUp
set Button to GetButtonPressed
If Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
Elseif Button == 0; Player takes item PlaySound DRSBurialMoundOpen WillowRubyHillMineBY1REF.Disable 0 WillowRubyHillMineBY1REF.MarkForDelete WillowRubyHillMineBY2REF.Disable 0 WillowRubyHillMineBY1REF.MarkForDelete Player.AddItem WillowFreeformBananaYucca 1 AddTopic AWFFreeformQuestStage2 Set AWillow4a.DoOnce9 to 1 Return
Elseif Button == 1 ; do nothing Return
endif endif END

Scn WillowLocationNiptonCrossCommentTriggerScript
short DoOnce
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
If DoOnce == 0 If WillowREF.GetDistance Player <= 1500 If Player.IsInCombat == 0 && WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0 If WillowREF.IsTalking == 0 && Player.IsTalking == 0 WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDx1Nipton 1 Set DoOnce to 1 Disable MarkForDelete endif endif endif endif END

Scn WillowTentCheatPosterScript
short Button
Begin OnActivate Player ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowTentCheatPosterMsg END
Begin GameMode
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
elseif Button == 0; Player chooses to cheat through the quest WillowCheatBoxREF.Enable 0 WillowCheatTerminalREF.Enable 0 WillowTentCheaterLockerREF.Enable 0 SetQuestObject WillowsEscapedConvict1Kyle 0 KyleREF.Disable KyleREF.MarkForDelete SetQuestObject WillowsEscapedConvict2Kenny 0 KennyREF.Disable KennyREF.MarkForDelete SetQuestObject WillowsEscapedConvictLeaderStan 0 StanREF.Disable StanREF.MarkForDelete SetQuestObject WillowsEscapedConvictWendyGF 0 WendyREF.Disable WendyREF.MarkForDelete Jessica2REF.MarkForDelete WillowsJessicaGreetTriggerREF.Disable WillowsJessicaGreetTriggerREF.MarkForDelete GWNNREF.MoveTo TheGWNNXMarkerREF GWNNref.SetActorsAI 1 SetQuestObject WillowsPreviousTravelCompanion 0 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.GWNNtravel to 1 GWNNref.evp JTref.MoveTo TheGWNNXMarkerREF JTref.SetActorsAI 1 SetQuestObject WillowsTheBigGuysDog 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.JTAccompany to 1 JTref.evp WillowTentCheaterPosterREF.MarkForDelete WillowTentCheaterPosterREF.Disable 0 Return
elseif Button == 1; Player chooses not to cheat way through the quest WillowTentCheaterPosterREF.MarkForDelete WillowTentCheaterPosterREF.Disable 0 Return
elseif Button == 2; Player chooses not to do anything. Return endif END

Scn WillowHotelDinoDeliteCoffeeScript
Begin OnEquip
Player.AddItem CoffeeMug01 1
END

Scn WillowSurprisePencilSculptureScript
short Button
Begin OnActivate Player
ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowPencilSculpture
END
Begin GameMode
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
elseif Button == 0; Player moves pencil sculpture to mantel piece WillowSurprisePencilSculptureREF.Disable 0 WillowSurprisePencilSculptureMantleREF.Enable 0 Return
elseif Button == 1; Player puts sculpture into inventory WillowSurprisePencilSculptureREF.Disable 0 Player.AddItem WillowSurprisePencilSculpture 1 Return
elseif Button == 1; Player does nothing Return endif
END

Scn Willow1bScript
short WillowStove float Timer short Stage short DoOnce short DoOnce1
Begin GameMode
;;Timer for Willow to cook at stove in bungalow
If Timer >= 0 Set Timer to Timer - GetSecondsPassed
Elseif Stage == 0 If WillowStove Set Stage to 1 Set Timer to 1 endif
Elseif Stage == 1 If AWillow9b.Cooked WillowREF.PlayIdle MTSpecialIdlePotStrd Set AWillow9b.Cooked to 0 Set Stage to 2 Set Timer to 2 Else WillowREF.SayTo PlayerREF AWDHouseCookingAlertNO 1 Set Stage to 0 Set WillowStove to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp SetQuestDelay AWillow9b 5 StopQuest AWillow1b endif
Elseif Stage == 2 WillowREF.PlayIdle MTSpecialIdleCheckStove Set Stage to 3 Set Timer to 2
Elseif Stage == 3 PlaySound DRSOvenRangeClose WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDHouseCookingAlert 1 Set Stage to 0 Set WillowStove to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp SetQuestDelay AWillow9b 5 StopQuest AWillow1b endif END

Scn WillowSurpriseContainerCleanUpCounterBoxScript
short Button
Begin OnActivate Player
ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowSurpriseBoxMessage
END
Begin MenuMode
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
elseif Button == 0; opens box Activate Return
elseif Button == 1; player cleans up empty box Set AWillowFreeform.CounterBox to 0 Disable Return
elseif Button == 2; Player does nothing Return endif
END

Scn WillowHouseMealWineBottleScript
short Button
Begin OnActivate Player
ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowWineBottleMessage
END
Begin GameMode
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
elseif Button == 0; Player cleans up dinner Activate WillowHouseDinnerFor2MarkerREF.Disable 0 Set AWillowFreeform.DinnerForTwo to 0 Return
elseif Button == 1; Do nothing Return
endif
END

Scn WillowHouseBungalowKeyOnLoadScript
;Key will enable if JeannieMay and Cliff are both dead
Begin OnLoad
If JeannieMayCrawfordREF.GetDead && CliffBriscoeREF.GetDead Enable endif
END
