;Willow "cooks" at stove in Novac Bungalow ;Veg Pockets If (WillowREF.GetItemCount NVGeckoMeat >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemCount Potato >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemCount Carrot >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemCount Flour >= 1) WillowREF.RemoveItem NVGeckoMeat 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Potato 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Carrot 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Flour 1 WillowTentStoveREF.AddItem WillowsGeckoVegPocket 1 Set Cooked to 1 endif ;Dog Treats If (WillowREF.GetItemCount NVGeckoMeat >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemCount BlamcoMacandCheese >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemCount Flour >= 1) WillowREF.RemoveItem NVGeckoMeat 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem BlamcoMacandCheese 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Flour 1 WillowTentStoveREF.AddItem WillowsDoggieTreats 2 Set Cooked to 1 endif ;Nuka-Star Coffee If (WillowREF.GetItemcount BrocFlower >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount XanderRoot >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount NVPinyonNuts >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount WaterPurified >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount SSBottleFull >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount NukaCola >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount Caps001 >= 3 && WillowREF.GetItemcount SodaBottleEmpty01 >= 3) WillowREF.RemoveItem BrocFlower 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem XanderRoot 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem NVPinyonNuts 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem WaterPurified 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem SSBottleFull 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem NukaCola 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Caps001 3 WillowREF.RemoveItem NukaColaBottle 3 WillowTentStoveREF.AddItem WillowsColeensFamousCoffee 3 Set Cooked to 1 endif ;Sweet Cake If (WillowREF.GetItemcount Apple >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount Carrot >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount SugarBombs01 >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount SSBottleFull >= 1) WillowREF.RemoveItem Apple 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Carrot 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem SugarBombs01 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem SSBottleFull 1 WillowTentStoveREF.AddItem WillowsSweetCake 1 Set Cooked to 1 endif ;Gecko Kebab If (WillowREF.GetItemCount NVGeckoMeat >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemCount JalapenoPepper >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemCount NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit >= 1) WillowREF.RemoveItem NVGeckoMeat 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem JalapenoPepper 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit 1 WillowREF.AddItem GeckoKebab 1 WillowTentStoveREF.AddItem GeckoKebab 1 Set Cooked to 1 endif ;Brahnim En Garde If (WillowREF.GetItemCount BrahminMeat >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemCount NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit >= 1) WillowREF.RemoveItem BrahminMeat 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit 1 WillowREF.AddItem WillowsBrahminEnGarde 2 WillowTentStoveREF.AddItem WillowsBrahminEnGarde 2 Set Cooked to 1 endif ;Gecko Steak If WillowREF.GetItemCount NVGeckoMeat >= 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem NVGeckoMeat 1 WillowREF.AddItem NVGeckoSteak 1 WillowTentStoveREF.AddItem NVGeckoSteak 1 Set Cooked to 1 endif ;Ant Stew If AWillowFreeform.RecipeUnlock01 > 0 If (WillowREF.GetItemcount AntMeat >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount Carrot >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount Potato >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount WaterPurified >= 1) WillowREF.RemoveItem AntMeat 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Carrot 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem Potato 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem WaterPurified 1 WillowTentStoveREF.AddItem WillowsAntMeatStew 1 Set Cooked to 1 endif endif ;Mantis Casserole If AWillowFreeform.RecipeUnlock02 > 0 If (WillowREF.GetItemcount MantisLeg >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount JalapenoPepper >= 2 && WillowREF.GetItemcount BlamcoMacandCheese >= 1) WillowREF.RemoveItem MantisLeg 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem JalapenoPepper 2 WillowREF.RemoveItem BlamcoMacandCheese 1 WillowTentStoveREF.AddItem WillowsMantisCasserole 1 Set Cooked to 1 endif endif ;Cazador Egg Puff If AWillowFreeform.RecipeUnlock03 > 0 If (WillowREF.GetItemcount BrahminMeat >= 1 && WillowREF.GetItemcount NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit >= 2 && WillowREF.GetItemcount CazadorEgg >= 1) WillowREF.RemoveItem BrahminMeat 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem NVFreshBananaYuccaFruit 2 WillowREF.RemoveItem CazadorEgg 1 WillowTentStoveREF.AddItem WillowsCazadorEggPuff 1 Set Cooked to 1 endif endif endif
If InventoryCheck Set AWillow9e.WillowRestock to 1 StartQuest AWillow9e endif If AWillow9c.SendOut == 1 If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsRifle WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsRifle 0 endif WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowsFU2weaponsBoxREF 0 1 40 Set WillowREF.WeaponSwap to 1 endif Set StoveCookin to 0 StopQuest AWillow9d END

Scn Willow1lScript
short WillowSocialEatin short DoOnce float Timer short EatNoBeauty short EatNoBackpack short Yummy short BeerTime float WillowFull float Today short NoFoodTalk short WWhiskey short WNukaCola
Begin GameMode
; implementing timer to simulate that she's full and won't ask for food or talk about food for awhile If NoFoodTalk Set Today to GameDaysPassed If Today - WillowFull >= .2 StopQuest AWillow1l endif endif END

Scn WillowHouseMenuQuestObjectToggleScript
short Button
Begin OnActivate Player
ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowTentRadioQuestObjectToggle
END
Begin MenuMode
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
elseif Button == 0; do nothing Return
elseif Button == 1; radio quest 0 SetQuestObject WillowsRadio 0 Return
elseif Button == 2; point checker quest 0 SetQuestObject WillowsPointsChecker 0 Return
elseif Button == 3; JTs ball quest 0 SetQuestObject WillowsCombatMenu 0 Return
elseif Button == 4; JTs ball quest 0 SetQuestObject WillowsJTBaseball 0 Return
elseif Button == 5; radio quest 1 SetQuestObject WillowsRadio 1 Return
elseif Button == 6; point checker quest 1 SetQuestObject WillowsPointsChecker 1 Return
elseif Button == 7; JTs ball quest 1 SetQuestObject WillowsCombatMenu 1 Return
elseif Button == 8; JTs ball quest 1 SetQuestObject WillowsJTBaseball 1 Return endif
END

Scn WillowCombatMenuScript
short Button short FullMessage
Begin OnEquip If AWillowFreeform.Lendgame ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowRadioBusyMsg Player.UnequipItem WillowsRadio 1 Elseif WillowShowerSleepDelay ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowRadioBusyMsg Player.UnequipItem WillowsRadio 1 Else ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowsCombatMenu Set FullMessage to 1 endif END
Begin MenuMode If FullMessage == 1 set Button to GetButtonPressed if Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
elseif Button == 0 ;;Follow No Attack
Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1i.MeleeCombat to 0 Set AWillow1.WaitNoAttack to 0 Set AWillow1.ClearOut to 0 Set AWillow1.RunBackToPlayer to 0 WillowREF.SetGhost 1 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 1 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 1 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 0 Set AWillow1.FollowNoAttack to 1 WillowREF.evp Set FullMessage to 0 Player.UnequipItem WillowsCombatMenu 1 Return
elseif Button == 1 ;;Follow No Attack Release
If AWillow1.WillowFollowFar WillowREF.SetGhost 0 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 5 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 Set AWillow1.FollowNoAttack to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 1 WillowREF.evp ElseIf AWillow1i.MeleeFightin WillowREF.SetGhost 0 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 5 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 Set AWillow1.FollowNoAttack to 0 Set AWillow1i.MeleeCombat to 1 WillowREF.evp Else WillowREF.SetGhost 0 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 5 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 Set AWillow1.FollowNoAttack to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp endif Set FullMessage to 0 Player.UnequipItem WillowsCombatMenu 1 Return
elseif Button == 2 ;;Wait No Attack Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1i.MeleeCombat to 0 Set AWillow1.ClearOut to 0 Set AWillow1.RunBackToPlayer to 0 Set AWillow1.FollowNoAttack to 0 WillowREF.SetGhost 1 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 1 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 1 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 0 WillowREF.StopCombat WillowREF.SCAonActor Set AWillow1.WaitNoAttack to 1 WillowREF.evp Set WillowREF.Waiting to 1 Set FullMessage to 0 Player.UnequipItem WillowsCombatMenu 1 Return
elseif Button ==3 ;;Wait No Attack Release If AWillow1.WillowFollowFar WillowREF.SetGhost 0 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 5 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set AWillow1.WaitNoAttack to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 1 WillowREF.evp ElseIf AWillow1i.MeleeFightin WillowREF.SetGhost 0 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 5 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set AWillow1.WaitNoAttack to 0 Set AWillow1i.MeleeCombat to 1 WillowREF.evp Else WillowREF.SetGhost 0 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 5 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set AWillow1.WaitNoAttack to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp endif Set FullMessage to 0 Player.UnequipItem WillowsCombatMenu 1 Return
elseif Button == 4 ;;Clear Out Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1i.MeleeCombat to 0 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 0 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 0 WillowREF.SCAonActor WillowREF.StopCombat WillowREF.ResetAI Set AWillow1.WaitNoAttack to 0 Set AWillow1.RunBackToPlayer to 0 Set AWillow1.FollowNoAttack to 0 WillowsXMarkerREF.MoveTo WillowREF Set AWillow1.ClearOut to 1 WillowREF.evp Set FullMessage to 0 Player.UnequipItem WillowsCombatMenu 1 Return
elseif Button == 5 ;;Clear Out Release If AWillow1.WillowFollowFar WillowsXMarkerREF.MoveTo WillowsXMarkerReturnREF WillowREF.SetGhost 0 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 5 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 Set AWillow1.ClearOut to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 1 WillowREF.evp ElseIf AWillow1i.MeleeFightin WillowsXMarkerREF.MoveTo WillowsXMarkerReturnREF WillowREF.SetGhost 0 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 5 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 Set AWillow1.ClearOut to 0 Set AWillow1i.MeleeFightin to 0 Set AWillow1i.MeleeCombat to 1 WillowREF.evp Else WillowsXMarkerREF.MoveTo WillowsXMarkerReturnREF WillowREF.SetGhost 0 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 5 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 Set AWillow1.ClearOut to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp endif Set FullMessage to 0 Player.UnequipItem WillowsCombatMenu 1 Return
elseif Button == 6 ;;;Call Willow to Player Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1i.MeleeCombat to 0 Set AWillow1.WaitNoAttack to 0 Set AWillow1.ClearOut to 0 Set AWillow1.RunBackToPlayer to 0 WillowREF.SetGhost 1 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 1 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 1 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 0 Set AWillow1.FollowNoAttack to 1 WillowREF.evp Set FullMessage to 0 Player.UnequipItem WillowsCombatMenu 1 Return
elseif Button == 7 ;;; Keep doing what you're doing Set FullMessage to 0 Player.UnequipItem WillowsCombatMenu 1 Return
elseif Button == 8 ;;; Return to Player's Position Immediately If AWillow1.WillowFollowFar WillowREF.SetGhost 0 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 5 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set AWillow1.WaitNoAttack to 0 Set AWillow1.ClearOut to 0 Set AWillow1.RunBackToPlayer to 0 Set AWillow1.FollowNoAttack to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1i.MeleeCombat to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 1 WillowREF.evp WillowREF.MoveTo player 50, 0, 0 ElseIf AWillow1i.MeleeFightin WillowREF.SetGhost 0 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 5 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set AWillow1.WaitNoAttack to 0 Set AWillow1.ClearOut to 0 Set AWillow1.RunBackToPlayer to 0 Set AWillow1.FollowNoAttack to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set AWillow1i.MeleeCombat to 1 WillowREF.evp WillowREF.MoveTo player 50, 0, 0 Else WillowREF.SetGhost 0 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 5 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set AWillow1.WaitNoAttack to 0 Set AWillow1.ClearOut to 0 Set AWillow1.RunBackToPlayer to 0 Set AWillow1.FollowNoAttack to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1i.MeleeCombat to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp WillowREF.MoveTo player 50, 0, 0 endif Set FullMessage to 0 Player.UnequipItem WillowsCombatMenu 1 Return elseif Button == 9; Do Nothing Set FullMessage to 0 Player.UnequipItem WillowsCombatMenu 1 Return endif endif END

Scn WillowHouseMenuActionScript
short Button short DoOnce short MenuSandbox short MiscOutfit
Begin OnActivate
If WillowsHouseMarkerREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowActionScriptMsg endif
END
Begin MenuMode set Button to GetButtonPressed if Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
elseif Button == 0; do nothing Return
elseif Button == 1; sandboxing
If WillowREF.Waiting Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1.GuardAlert to 0 Set AWillow1.Relaxin to 1 WillowREF.evp Set WillowREF.Waiting to 1 If WillowsHouseMarkerREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow && WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow Set AWillowFreeform.WillowLeavesHouse to 3 Set AWillowFreeform.FirstSurprise to 0 Set AWillowFreeform.PillowMoved to 0 endif If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsRifle WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsRifle 0 Set AWillow1.RelaxinNoBeauty to 1 endif Set Button to -1 Return
ElseIf WillowREF.Waiting == 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1.GuardAlert to 0 Set AWillow1.Relaxin to 1 WillowREF.evp Set WillowREF.Waiting to 1 If WillowsHouseMarkerREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow && WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow Set AWillowFreeform.WillowLeavesHouse to 3 Set AWillowFreeform.FirstSurprise to 0 Set AWillowFreeform.PillowMoved to 0 endif If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsRifle WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsRifle 0 Set AWillow1.RelaxinNoBeauty to 1 endif Set Button to -1 Return endif
elseif Button == 2; no sandboxing Set AWillow1.Relaxin to 0 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 If WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault == 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp endif If AWillowFreeform.WillowLeavesHouse == 3 Set AWillowFreeform.WillowLeavesHouse to 1 Set AWillowFreeform.RoutineSurprises to 0 endif If AWillow1.RelaxinNoBeauty WillowREF.EquipItem WillowsRifle 1 Set AWillow1.RelaxinNoBeauty to 0 endif Set Button to -1 Return
elseif Button == 3; cook at stove StartQuest AWillow1b Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1.GuardAlert to 0 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set AWillow1.Relaxin to 0 Set AWillow1b.WillowStove to 1 WillowREF.evp Set AWillow9b.StoveCookin to 1 SetQuestDelay AWillow9b .16 StartQuest AWillow9b Set Button to -1 Return
elseif Button == 4; sit in her chair at the table If AWillowFreeform.SitChair == 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1.GuardAlert to 0 Set AWillow1.Relaxin to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowChillMO to 0 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set AWillowFreeform.SitCouch to 0 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerBUNGALOWsitchair Set AWillowFreeform.SitChair to 1 endif Set Button to -1 Return
elseif Button == 5; get her up from her chair at the table If AWillowFreeform.SitChair If AWillow1.WillowFollowFar Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 1 WillowREF.evp Else Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp endif WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerBUNGALOWsitchair Set AWillowFreeform.SitChair to 0 endif If AWillow1l.WillowSocialEatin If AWillow1.OnTheGoEat == 1 WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerFollowEatGeckoVegPocket Set AWillow1.OnTheGoEat to 0 ElseIf AWillow1.OnTheGoNukaCola == 1 WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerFollowDrinkNukaCola Set AWillow1.OnTheGoBeer to 0 ElseIf AWillow1.OnTheGoWhiskey == 1 WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerFollowDrinkWhiskey Set AWillow1.OnTheGoBeer to 0 endif
If AWillow1l.EatNoBackpack WillowREF.EquipItem WillowsLeatherBackpack 0 Set AWillow1l.EatNoBackpack to 0 endif
If AWillow1l.EatNoBeauty WillowREF.EquipItem WillowsRifle 1 Set AWillow1l.EatNoBeauty to 0 endif
If AWillow1l.Yummy == 0 WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDEatinOut Set AWillow1l.Yummy to 1 endif Set AWillow1l.WillowSocialEatin to 0 Set AWillow1l.Timer to 0 Set AWillow1l.NoFoodTalk to 1 Set AWillow1l.WillowFull to GameDaysPassed Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp endif Set Button to -1 Return
elseif Button == 6; put out Ant Stew for two WillowHouseDinnerFor2MarkerREF.Enable 0 Set Button to -1 Return
elseif Button == 7; Have Willow cook and put out Ant Stew WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage Set AWillowFreeform.SitChair to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1.GuardAlert to 0 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set AWillow1.Relaxin to 0 Set AWillow1d.DateStove to 1 Set AWillow1b.WillowStove to 1 StartQuest AWillow1d WillowREF.evp Set Button to -1 Return endif END

Scn Willow1hScript
short MiscOutfit short UsingSleepwearOutfit short Sleepin short PlayerWakesWillow short DoOnce
;;;if player sets house marker in the bungalow

WillowHouseDrawerSleepwearREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF Set UsingSleepwearOutfit to 1 Set Sleepin to 1 If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsRifle WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsRifle 0 endif WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowsFU2weaponsBoxREF 0 1 40
WillowREF.Additem WillowsWeaponToken 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem WillowsWeaponToken 1
;If DoOnce == 0 ; WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDSleepAlertBungalow ; Set DoOnce to 1 ;endif Set AWillow1.Relaxin to 0 Set AWillow1.WakeUpWillow to 1 Set AWillow1.SleepAtHome to 1 WillowREF.evp
ElseIf GetCurrentTime > 7 && Sleepin && PlayerWakesWillow == 0 Set AWillow1.Relaxin to 1 Set AWillow1.WakeUpWillow to 0 Set AWillow1.SleepAtHome to 0 WillowREF.evp Set WillowREF.Waiting to 1 Set Sleepin to 0
If UsingSleepwearOutfit WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerSleepwearREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerSleepwearREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set UsingSleepwearOutfit to 0 endif If AWillowFreeform.Outfit1 WillowHouseDrawerOutfit1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerOutfit1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Outfit2 WillowHouseDrawerOutfit2REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerOutfit2REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Outfit3 WillowHouseDrawerOutfit3REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerOutfit3REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Outfit4 WillowHouseDrawerOutfit4REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerOutfit4REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Swimwear WillowHouseDrawerSwimwearREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerSwimwearREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Sleepwear WillowHouseDrawerSleepwearREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerSleepwearREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.ftb WillowHouseDrawerFTBREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerFTBREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Elseif MiscOutfit WillowHouseClothingMainSortREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseClothingMainSortREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set MiscOutfit to 0 endif
WillowREF.Additem WillowsWeaponToken 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem WillowsWeaponToken 1
;Set DoOnce to 0 Set WillowREF.WeaponSwap to 1 Set AWillowFreeform.StartSleepQuest to 0 WillowREF.SayTo WillowREF AWDAtWakeUpGreetings StopQuest AWillow1h endif END

Scn WillowHouseCoffeeBrewScript
short Button
Begin OnActivate ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowHouseCoffeeBrewer END
Begin MenuMode
Set Button to GetButtonPressed
If Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
Elseif Button == 0; Player chooses to make coffee Player.RemoveItem CoffeeMug01 3 Player.RemoveItem BrocFlower 1 Player.RemoveItem NukaCola 1 Player.RemoveItem NVPinyonNuts 1 Player.RemoveItem SSBottleFull 1 Player.RemoveItem WaterPurified 1 Player.RemoveItem XanderRoot 1 Player.AddItem WillowsDinoDeLiteCoffee 3
Elseif Button == 1; Player can't make coffee Return endif END

Scn WillowKyleScript
short DoOnce
Begin OnDeath
If GetDistance Player < 4000 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowMeetQuest 2 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowMeetQuest 4 1 Elseif GetDistance Player >= 4000 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowMeetQuest 2 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowMeetQuest 4 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowMeetQuest 10 1 Player.AddItem WillowKyleTracker2000 1 endif END
Begin GameMode
If GetDead == 0 Return Else If GetItemCount WillowsRifleFAKE == 0 && GetItemCount WillowVoodooDoll == 0 If GetDistance Player >= 15000 Disable 0 MarkForDelete endif Else Return endif endif
END

Scn WillowStanScript
short DoOnce
Begin OnDeath
If GetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowMeetQuest 8 == 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowMeetQuest 9 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowMeetQuest 8 1 endif
END
Begin OnActivate Player
If DoOnce == 0 If GetDead && (Player.GetItemCount WillowsRifleFAKE == 0 && WillowREF.GetItemCount WillowsRifleFAKE == 0 && WillowREF.GetItemCount WillowsRifle == 0) If GetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowMeetQuest 9 == 1 AddItemHealthPercent WillowsRifleFAKE 1 .80 Additem WillowVoodooDoll 1 Additem Caps001 50 Set DoOnce to 1 endif endif endif
Activate
END
Begin GameMode
If GetDead == 0 Return Else If GetItemCount WillowsRifleFAKE == 0 && GetItemCount WillowVoodooDoll == 0 If GetQuestCompleted AWillowMeetQuest If GetDistance Player >= 15000 Disable 0 MarkForDelete endif endif Else Return endif endif
END

Scn WillowJT2Script
float PoisonTimer short PoisonTreated short PHCombatOngoing ref CombatTarget
Begin GameMode
If PoisonTreated > 0 If JTREF.IsSpellTarget BarkScorpionPoison || JTREF.IsSpellTarget CazadorPoison || JTREF.IsSpellTarget DeathClawPoison || JTREF.IsSpellTarget DLC03FeralGhoulPoison || JTREF.IsSpellTarget DLC03RadScorpion3Poison || JTREF.IsSpellTarget PoisonGreaseRadscorpionSpell || JTREF.IsSpellTarget NightstalkerPoison || JTREF.IsSpellTarget RadScorpion1Poison || JTREF.IsSpellTarget RadScorpion2Poison If PoisonTimer <= 15 ;this used to be set at 30 but they always get knocked out am trying it at 15 seconds to see what happens Set PoisonTimer to PoisonTimer + GetSecondsPassed
Else JTREF.CIOS NVAntivenom JTREF.RemoveItem NVAntivenom 1 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowJTAntivenom Set PoisonTreated to 2 Set PoisonTimer to 0 endif
Elseif JTREF.IsSpellTarget BarkScorpionPoison == 0 && JTREF.IsSpellTarget CazadorPoison == 0 && JTREF.IsSpellTarget DeathClawPoison == 0 && JTREF.IsSpellTarget DLC03FeralGhoulPoison == 0 && JTREF.IsSpellTarget DLC03RadScorpion3Poison == 0 && JTREF.IsSpellTarget PoisonGreaseRadscorpionSpell == 0 && JTREF.IsSpellTarget NightstalkerPoison == 0 && JTREF.IsSpellTarget RadScorpion1Poison == 0 && JTREF.IsSpellTarget RadScorpion2Poison == 0 Set PoisonTreated to 0 Set PoisonTimer to 0 StopQuest AWillowJT2 endif endif END

Scn WillowLPTimer4Script
float Timer
short WillowKissPlayer short Kissing short KissingSequence float PPosX float PPosY float PPosZ short Stage
;;Willow give player adhoc kisses
Begin GameMode
If Timer >= 0 Set Timer to Timer - GetSecondsPassed
Elseif Stage == 0 If WillowKissPlayer Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 1 WillowREF.evp Set Stage to 1 Set Timer to 1 endif
Elseif Stage == 1 Set AWillowLPTimer3.Kissing to 1 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerKissScene Set Stage to 2 Set Timer to 1
Elseif Stage == 2 ApplyImageSpaceModifier MQ08AllBlackedOutISFX WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDAdHocKisses Set Stage to 3 Set Timer to 4
Elseif Stage == 3 RemoveImageSpaceModifier MQ08AllBlackedOutISFX ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeInFromBlack2sISFX Set Stage to 4 Set Timer to 1
Elseif Stage == 4 WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerKissScene Set AWillowLPTimer3.Kissing to 0 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp Set Stage to 5 Set Timer to 1
Elseif Stage == 5 EnablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 Set Stage to 0 Set WillowKissPlayer to 0 StopQuest AWillowLPTimer4 endif END

Scn Willow5Script
short WillowInjured float Timer
ref WillowsLeftLeg ref WillowsRightLeg ref WillowsHealthy
Begin GameMode
Set WillowsHealthy to WillowREF.GetAV Health Set WillowsLeftLeg to WillowREF.GetAV LeftMobilityCondition Set WillowsRightLeg to WillowREF.GetAV RightMobilityCondition
If WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0 If WillowInjured == 0 If WillowsHealthy <= 90 || WillowsLeftLeg <= 95 || WillowsRightLeg <= 95 If GetStage AWillowMeetQuest < 5 If WillowREF.GetItemCount Stimpak >= 1 WillowREF.PlayIdle 3rdPSpecialIdleStimpak PlaySound NPCHumanUsingStimpak WillowREF.RestoreAV Health 100 WillowREF.RestoreAV LeftMobilityCondition 100 WillowREF.RestoreAV RightMobilityCondition 100 WillowREF.RemoveItem Stimpak 1 Set WillowInjured to 1 endif endif endif endif endif
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowGetsBeauty If WillowREF.HasBeenHired StopQuest AWillow5 endif endif
;;;Timer to reset variable so she won't spam Stimpaks
If WillowInjured If Timer < 10 Set Timer to Timer + GetSecondsPassed Else Set WillowInjured to 0 Set Timer to 0 endif endif END
Scn WillowFuNV2Script

Scn WillowUnarmedTrainingScript
ref PlayersUnarmedSkill short DoOnce short DoOnce1 short DoOnce2
Begin GameMode
If RangerAndyREF.GetDead && GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 3 == 0 If GetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 3 == 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 3 1 endif endif
If VeronicaREF.GetDead && GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 4 == 0 If GetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 4 == 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 4 1 endif endif
If FortLuciusREF.GetDead && GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 5 == 0 If GetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 5 == 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 5 1 endif endif
;;;Willow can complete RA training if player already has it before hired her/prevents Willow from getting it before Hiring If WillowREF.HasBeenHired == 0 && Player.HasPerk RangerTakedown Else If Player.HasPerk RangerTakedown && WillowREF.GetInCell NovacAndysRoom If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 3 == 0 If RangerAndyREF.GetDead == 0 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 3 1 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowRangerAndyTraining WillowREF.ModAV Unarmed 15 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +10) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif endif endif endif endif
;;;;;; Willow training with Lucius If Player.HasPerk LegionAssault && WillowREF.GetDistance FortLuciusRef <= 500 If AWillow4a.WillowsUnarmedSkill >= 50 If DoOnce == 0 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 5 1 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowLuciusTrainingHigh WillowREF.ModAV Unarmed 15 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +10) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif Set DoOnce to 1 endif
Else If DoOnce == 0 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 5 1 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowLuciusTrainingLow WillowREF.ModAV Unarmed 5 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +10) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif Set DoOnce to 1 endif endif endif
;;;;; completes if all training is done except for player because player has unarmed skill < 50 Set PlayersUnarmedSkill to Player.GetPermAV Unarmed
If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 1 == 1 If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 3 == 1 If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 4 == 1 If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 5 == 1 If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 6 == 1 If PlayersUnarmedSkill <= 49 SetStage AWillowUnarmedTraining 100 endif endif endif endif endif endif
;;;;; completes quest If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 1 == 1 If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 2 == 1 If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 3 == 1 If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 4 == 1 If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 5 == 1 If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 6 == 1 SetStage AWillowUnarmedTraining 100 endif endif endif endif endif endif
;;;;;; Sets off stuff to happen when Willows Unarmed skill gets to 100 ;;;sets her skills to 100 if she goes over 100
Set AWillow4a.WillowsUnarmedSkill to WillowREF.GetPermAV Unarmed Set AWillow4a.PlayersLevel to Player.GetLevel
If AWillow4a.WillowsUnarmedSkill >= 100 If DoOnce1 == 0 WillowREF.SetAV Unarmed 100 Set AWillow4a.UnarmedAt100 to 1 Set DoOnce1 to 1 endif endif
;;; completes quest when Willow reaches 100 skill points in Unarmed If AWillow4a.UnarmedAt100 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 6 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 6 1 CompleteAllObjectives AWillowUnarmedTraining SetStage AWillowUnarmedTraining 100 endif
;;;Handles Veronica ftb message because couldn't get timing right any other way If AWillow4c.GonnaAskVeronica If DoOnce2 == 0 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowVeronicaTraining Set DoOnce2 to 1 endif endif END

If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PCTalkedinMO If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PaidForJT == 1 If Player.GetInCell MojaveOutpostBarracks01 == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion vMapMojaveOutpostregion == 0 SetQuestObject WillowsPreviousTravelCompanion 0 Disable 0 MarkForDelete endif endif endif

If GetInCell WillowsCell If WillowREF.GetDead Disable MarkForDelete endif endif
END

END

If ITalked == 0 If GetStageDone AWillowShoppingQuest 5 == 1 && (WillowREF.WillowCanComment && WillowREF.Waiting == 0) If AWillow4a.MetEttienne == 0 If WillowREF.WillowCanComment WillowREF.StartConversation Player AWDSQwestsideFG WillowREF.AddItem Caps001 20 Set ITalked to 1 endif endif endif endif END

Scn Willow1kScript
short WillowTentStove float Timer short Stage
Begin GameMode
;;Timer for Willow to cook at stove in bungalow
If Timer >= 0 Set Timer to Timer - GetSecondsPassed
Elseif Stage == 0 If WillowTentStove Set Stage to 1 Set Timer to 1 endif
Elseif Stage == 1 If AWillow4a.WillowHeardCliff == 0 && AWillow9d.Cooked WillowREF.PlayIdle MTSpecialIdlePotStrd Set AWillow9d.Cooked to 0 Set Stage to 2 Set Timer to 2 Elseif AWillow4a.WillowHeardCliff && (AWillow9d.Cooked || AWillow9d.Cooked == 0) SetQuestDelay AWillow9d 5 Set Stage to 0 Set AWillow9d.Cooked to 0 Set WillowTentStove to 0 WillowTentMealMarkerREF.Enable 0 WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTentTableSet Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp StopQuest AWillow1k Else WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDHouseCookingAlertNO 1 Set Stage to 0 Set WillowTentStove to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp SetQuestDelay AWillow9d 5 StopQuest AWillow1k endif
Elseif Stage == 2 WillowREF.PlayIdle MTSpecialIdleCheckStove Set Stage to 3 Set Timer to 2
Elseif Stage == 3 PlaySound DRSOvenRangeClose WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDHouseCookingAlert 1 Set Stage to 0 Set WillowTentStove to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp SetQuestDelay AWillow9d 5 StopQuest AWillow1k endif END

Scn WillowScript
short HasBeenHired short WeaponOut short CombatStyleRanged short CombatStyleMelee short IsFollowingDefault short IsFollowingShort short IsFollowingLong short FollowerSwitchAggressive ; 0 = Passive (wait for player), 1 = Aggressive (attack when see enemy) short Waiting short Fired short WillowL38 short AmmoInventory short LastCheckDay float LastCheckHour short SSBottleFullCount short LastBottleCount short LastCheckDay1 float LastCheckHour1 short SSBottleFullCount1 short LastBottleCount1 short DoOnce short WeaponOutLikeMe short CoffeeCount short LastCoffeeCount short ReplacementBeauty short PlayerHealing short TeammateToggle short DoOnce1 ;short WeaponOut short WiW short PlayerIsBFF short WillowsMissingStuff;Tabitha's glasses short WillowsMissingStuff2 short WillowsSexyTimeMissingStuff short WillowCanComment short PHCombatStart short MonitorPlayerHP short PHCombatOngoing ref CombatTarget float Timer short FiredFinal short NoCombat short WeaponOutCuzStuff short WeaponTalk short LegionDressMeUp short WeaponSwap
Begin OnStartCombat
If FollowerSwitchAggressive StartQuest AWillow1i Elseif FollowerSwitchAggressive == 0 If Player.IsInCombat == 0 StopCombat Else StartQuest AWillow1i endif Else StartQuest AWillow1i endif
END
Begin OnCombatEnd
RestoreAV Health 100 restoreav perceptioncondition 100 restoreav endurancecondition 100 restoreav leftattackcondition 100 restoreav leftmobilitycondition 100 restoreav rightattackcondition 100 restoreav rightmobilitycondition 100
Set AWillow1i.MeleeFightinEnd to 1 Set AWillow1i.CombatChatWait to 1
If GetStage AWillowMeetQuest < 5 WillowREF.AddItem WillowsWeaponToken 1 Set WeaponSwap to 8 endif
END
Begin MenuMode 1008; trade ;Using coffee variables for talking tracking journal and talking about it to player Set CoffeeCount to GetItemCount WillowsJournal ; launches comment out of gamemode If CoffeeCount > 0 ElseIf CoffeeCount == 0 Set LastCoffeeCount to 1 endif END
Begin GameMode
If WeaponOutLikeMe && WeaponOut == 0 If IsInCombat == 0 && GetSitting == 0 && GetSleeping == 0 && Waiting == 0 If Player.IsWeaponOut == 1 SetAlert 1 Set WeaponOut to 1 If WeaponTalk == 0 WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDAlertWeaponOut 1 Set WeaponTalk to 1 endif endif endif endif
If WeaponOutLikeMe && WeaponOut If Player.IsWeaponOut == 0 SetAlert 0 Set WeaponOut to 0 endif endif
If Player.GetInCell Vault22a == 0 || Player.GetInCell Vault22b == 0 || Player.GetInCell Vault22c == 0 || Player.GetInCell Vault22d == 0 If WillowREF.GetInCell MojaveOutpostBarracks01 == 0 If (WillowREF.GetDistance WillowsHouseMarkerREF > 4000 && WillowREF.Waiting == 0) If WillowREF.GetInCell Lucky38SuiteFloor22 == 0 If WillowREF.Waiting == 0 If WillowREF.Fired == 0 || WillowREF.GetDead == 0 If WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault || WillowREF.IsFollowingLong || AWillowMeetQuest.FollowNotHired If WillowREF.GetDistance Player > 5000 WillowREF.MoveTo Player 50, 0, 0 endif endif endif endif endif endif endif endif
If Player.GetInCell Vault22a == 0 || Player.GetInCell Vault22b == 0 || Player.GetInCell Vault22c == 0 || Player.GetInCell Vault22d == 0 If WillowREF.GetInCell MojaveOutpostBarracks01 == 0 If (WillowREF.GetDistance WillowsHouseMarkerREF > 4000 && WillowREF.Waiting == 0) If WillowREF.GetInCell Lucky38SuiteFloor22 == 0 If WillowREF.Waiting == 0 If WillowREF.Fired == 0 || WillowREF.GetDead == 0 If AWillow1.FollowNoAttack If WillowREF.GetDistance Player > 2000 WillowREF.MoveTo Player 50, 0, 0 endif endif endif endif endif endif endif endif
;;;gets Willow to sneak when player is sneaking regardless of what package she is in If AWillow1.SneakInDialouge == 0 If Player.IsSneaking If WillowREF.HasBeenHired || AWillowMeetQuest.FollowNotHired WillowREF.SetForceSneak 1 Set AWillow1.SneakInDialouge to 1 ;used in Willow1Script to hold Willow in sneak during dialogue endif endif endif
If AWillow1.SneakInDialouge If Player.IsSneaking == 0 WillowREF.SetForceSneak 0 Set AWillow1.SneakInDialouge to 0 endif endif
If LastCoffeeCount If Timer >= 2 Set Timer to Timer - GetSecondsPassed Else WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDGimmeThatJournal Set WillowREF.LastCoffeeCount to 0 Set Timer to 0 endif endif
If WeaponSwap == 1 || WeaponSwap == 3 If (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.FTBisOn == 0 && AWillowFreeform.StartSleepQuest == 0 && WillowShowerSleepDelay == 0) WillowsFU2weaponsBoxREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 0 1 40 Set WeaponSwap to 4 endif Elseif WeaponSwap == 2 WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowsFU2weaponsBoxREF 0 1 40 Set WeaponSwap to 3 Elseif WeaponSwap == 6 If WillowREF.GetItemCount WillowsRifle == 0 Set WeaponSwap to 0 Else If WillowREF.CombatStyleRanged == 1 WillowREF.EquipItem WillowsRifle 1 Set WeaponSwap to 0 Else Set WeaponSwap to 0 endif endif Elseif (WeaponSwap >= 4) && (WeaponSwap < 7) Set WeaponSwap to WeaponSwap + 1 Elseif WeaponSwap == 8 WillowREF.AddItem WillowsWeaponToken 1 WillowsFU2weaponsBoxREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 0 1 40 Set WeaponSwap to 0 endif END
Begin OnDeath
Set WiW to 1
If Player.HasPerk SilverTongue Player.RemovePerk SilverTongue ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowIsWormfood endif
;;;;Failing quests if player is still doing them...
;;;; Fails Beauty And The Toys If GetStageDone AWillowMeetQuest 7 == 0 SetStage AWillowMeetQuest 110 endif
;;;; Fails She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 9 == 0 || GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 10 == 0 SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 110 endif
;;;; Fails Rock 'Em, Sock 'Em Willow If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 6 == 1 CompleteAllObjectives AWillowUnarmedTraining CompleteQuest AWillowUnarmedTraining StopQuest AWillowUnarmedTraining ElseIf GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 6 == 0 SetStage AWillowUnarmedTraining 110 endif
;;;; Fails Coffee Quest If GetQuestRunning AWillowCoffee If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowCoffee 10 == 0 SetStage AWillowCoffee 110 endif endif
;;;; Fails Shopping Quest If GetQuestRunning AWillowShoppingQuest SetStage AWillowShoppingQuest 110 endif
;;;; Fails Freeform Quest If GetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowFreeform 1 == 0 || GetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowFreeform 1 == 1 If GetQuestCompleted AWillowFreeform == 0 SetStage AWillowShoppingQuest 110 endif endif
Player.RemoveItem WillowsRadio 1 Player.RemoveItem WillowsPointsChecker 1 Player.RemoveItem WillowsCombatMenu 1 Player.RemoveFromFaction WillowsTentFaction
If WillowREF.GetDistance Player >= 15000 SetQuestObject Willow 0 Disable 0 MarkForDelete endif END

Scn WillowMeetQuestScript
short StartWillow short FirstGreet; in tent short FollowNotHired; Willow follows player but isn't teammate. No wheel. Won't get one until her rifle is found and they decide to work together for good. short WillowWaitingtoLeave short WillowTravelMO short WillowChillMO short WaitNotHired short KyleTravel short KennyTravel short KyleatCamp short KennyatCamp short KyleTravelFarm short WillowTalkAboutBeauty short DoOnce short StanHasBeauty short AskAboutPlayer; 1- Player's Name short FGBeauty short DoOnce1 short KyleSafe short PlayerNameFG short KKSpotted short DoesntOfferUnconditionalTravel; dialogue variable
;short DoOnce ;short DoOnce1 short DoOnce2 short DoOnce3 short DoOnce4 short DoOnce5 short DoOnce6 short DoOnce7 short DoOnce8 short DoOnce9 short CloseItOut ref CurrentWeapon ref CurrentWeaponType ref CombatTarget short WeaponType short ConfidenceLevel short SendOut short StanStay short WendyStay short StanSbox short WendySbox
Begin GameMode
If DoOnce == 0 Set AWillow1.ContainerStayPut to 1 WillowsSecondContainerREF.evp WillowsThirdContainerREF.evp WillowsFourthContainerREF.evp WillowsFifthContainerREF.evp StanREF.RemoveFromFaction WillowsTentFaction Set StanStay to 1 StanREF.evp WendyREF.RemoveFromFaction WillowsTentFaction Set WendyStay to 1 Player.AddToFaction WillowsTentFaction 1 WillowREF.AddToFaction WillowsTentFaction 1 WendyREF.evp WillowREF.SetGhost 1 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 1 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 1 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 0 Set FirstGreet to 1 WillowREF.evp Set DoOnce to 1 endif
;;Willow identifies K or K if she gets LOS on them If KKSpotted == 0 If WillowREF.GetLos KyleREF WillowREF.SayTo WillowREF AWillowDSpotsKK Set KKSpotted to 1 endif endif
If KyleSafe If KyleREF.GetDistance KKMarkerSIXref <= 2000 || KyleREF.GetDistance Player < 5000 SetEssential WillowsEscapedConvict1Kyle 0 Set KyleSafe to 0 Else SetEssential WillowsEscapedConvict1Kyle 0 Set KyleSafe to 1 endif endif
If DoOnce1 == 0 If KennyREF.GetDead KyleREF.StartConversation Player AWOAKKyleGreetingBastards Set DoOnce1 to 1 endif endif
If GetStageDone AWillowMeetQuest 2 == 1 && DoOnce3 == 0 If Player.GetInCell WillowsCell == 0 KyleREF.Moveto KKMarkerOneIdles SetQuestObject WillowsEscapedConvict1Kyle 1 KyleREF.SetActorsAI 1 KyleREF.RemoveFromFaction WillowsTentFaction Set AWillowMeetQuest.KyleTravelFarm to 1 KyleREF.evp KennyREF.Moveto KKMarkerONEref SetQuestObject WillowsEscapedConvict2Kenny 1 KennyREF.SetActorsAI 1 KennyREF.RemoveFromFaction WillowsTentFaction Set AWillowMeetQuest.KennyTravel to 1 KennyREF.evp Set DoOnce3 to 1 endif endif
If AWillowMeetQuest.FollowNotHired If AWillowMeetQuest.FGBeauty == 0 If WillowREF.HasBeenHired == 0 If WillowREF.GetItemCount WillowsRifle == 1 If Player.IsInCombat == 0 && WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerWMQBeautyFG Set AWillowMeetQuest.FGBeauty to 1 endif endif endif endif endif
;If Kyle and Kenny make it to Hwy 95 camp this puts them into their Sandbox pkgs If KyleREF.GetDistance KKMarkerSIXref <= 2000 If DoOnce2 == 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowMeetQuest 8 1 SetStage AWillowMeetQuest 8 Set KyleTravelFarm to 0 Set KyleatCamp to 1 KyleREF.evp Set KennyTravel to 0 Set KennyatCamp to 1 KennyREF.evp SetQuestObject WillowsEscapedConvict2Kenny 0 SetQuestObject WillowsEscapedConvict1Kyle 0 If KyleSafe SetEssential WillowsEscapedConvict1Kyle 0 Set KyleSafe to 0 endif SetEssential WillowsEscapedConvictLeaderStan 0 Set DoOnce2 to 1 endif endif
;;;Willow has both Beauty and Moira and has told the player about Chester so quest is completed If WillowREF.GetItemCount WillowsRifle >= 1 If WillowsFourthContainerREF.GetItemCount WillowVoodooDoll >= 1 If GetStageDone AWillowMeetQuest 9 == 1 SetStage AWillowMeetQuest 100 StopQuest AWillowMeetQuest endif endif endif
If GetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowMeetQuest 4 == 1 && GetStageDone AWillowMeetQuest 11 == 0 If KyleREF.GetDead If Player.GetItemCount WillowsRifleFAKE >= 1 If Player.GetItemCount WillowVoodooDoll >= 1 SetStage AWillowMeetQuest 11 endif endif endif endif
;;;;weapon and thus behavior control before hire ;;;;;am sending weapon out for to refresh container safely to avoid the blinky/invisible bug If GetStage AWillowMeetQuest < 5 && WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0 If AWillow1i.WillowWeaponType == 0 If WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 0 || WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 1 || WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 2 || WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 3 WillowREF.SCAOnActor WillowREF.StopCombat WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 0 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 0 Set AWillow1i.WillowWeaponType to 1 Elseif WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 4 || WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 5 || WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 6 || WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 7 || WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 8 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 Set AWillow1i.WillowWeaponType to 2 endif Elseif AWillow1i.WillowWeaponType == 1 If WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 4 || WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 5 || WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 6 || WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 7 || WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 8 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowsFU2weaponsBoxREF 1 0 40 Set WillowREF.WeaponSwap to 8 Set AWillow1i.WillowWeaponType to 2 endif Elseif AWillow1i.WillowWeaponType == 2 If WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 0 || WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 1 || WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 2 || WillowREF.GetWeaponAnimType == 3 WillowREF.SCAOnActor WillowREF.StopCombat WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 0 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 0 WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowsFU2weaponsBoxREF 1 0 40 Set WillowREF.WeaponSwap to 8 Set AWillow1i.WillowWeaponType to 1 endif endif endif
If GetStage AWillowMeetQuest < 5 && WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0 If WillowREF.GetAV Confidence == 3 If AWillow1i.WillowWeaponType == 1 WillowREF.SCAOnActor WillowREF.StopCombat WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 0 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 0 Elseif AWillow1i.WillowWeaponType == 2 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 endif endif endif END

;;;This holds Willow onto passive until player is in combat; v97 If Player.IsInCombat == 0 && WillowREF.FollowerSwitchAggressive == 0 If WillowREF.IsInCombat WillowREF.StopCombat endif endif
;;;moves Willow back out of fleeing and into following again after combat If AWillow1.ClearOut && Player.IsInCombat == 0 If WillowFollowFar WillowsXMarkerREF.MoveTo WillowsXMarkerReturnREF WillowREF.SetGhost 0 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 5 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 1 WillowREF.evp Set AWillow1.ClearOut to 0 ElseIf AWillow1i.MeleeFightin WillowsXMarkerREF.MoveTo WillowsXMarkerReturnREF WillowREF.SetGhost 0 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 5 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 Set AWillow1i.MeleeFightin to 0 Set AWillow1i.MeleeCombat to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp Set AWillow1.ClearOut to 0 Else WillowsXMarkerREF.MoveTo WillowsXMarkerReturnREF WillowREF.SetGhost 0 WillowREF.SetAV Perception 5 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 WillowREF.SetAV Assistance 1 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp Set AWillow1.ClearOut to 0 endif endif
;;;;;;;;Willow takes off/puts on backpack when sandboxing at L38 or near home marker; also takes off/puts on Beauty If Relaxin If WillowREF.GetInCell Lucky38SuiteFloor22 || (WillowREF.GetDistance WillowsHouseMarkerREF <= 2500 && WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow == 0) If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsLeatherBackpack WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsLeatherBackpack Set RelaxinBackPackOff to 1 endif
If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsRifle WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsRifle 0 Set RelaxinNoBeauty to 1 endif endif endif
If Relaxin == 0 If RelaxinBackPackOff WillowREF.EquipItem WillowsLeatherBackpack 0 Set RelaxinBackPackOff to 0 endif
If RelaxinNoBeauty WillowREF.EquipItem WillowsRifle 1 Set RelaxinNoBeauty to 0 endif endif
;;Sets up auto sit with player. If OnTheGoEat || AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.FTBisOn ElseIf Player.GetSitting > 0 && (SitWithMe == 0 && AWillowFreeform.SitCouch == 0) If (WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault || WillowREF.IsFollowingLong) If WillowREF.GetDistance Player < 750 && WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow == 0 If (WillowREF.Waiting == 0 && GuardAlert == 0) Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerFindFURNITUREsitting Set SitWithMe to 1 endif Elseif WillowREF.GetLOS Player && WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow If GuardAlert == 0 && AWillow1.SleepAtHome == 0 If AWillowFreeform.SitChair == 0 && AWillow1b.WillowStove == 0 If AWillow1d.DateOngoing == 0 If Relaxin && DoOnce6 == 0 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set Relaxin to 0 Set DoOnce6 to 1 Else If DoOnce5 == 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set DoOnce5 to 1 endif endif endif endif WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerBUNGALOWfindcouch Set AWillowFreeform.SitCouch to 1 endif endif endif endif If Player.GetSitting == 0 && (SitWithMe || AWillowFreeform.SitCouch) If WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow == 0 Set SitWithMe to 0 WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerFindFURNITUREsitting Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp Elseif WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow If DoOnce6 Set Relaxin to 1 WillowREF.evp Set WillowREF.Waiting to 1 Set DoOnce6 to 0 Else If DoOnce5 == 1 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp Set DoOnce5 to 0 endif endif WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerBUNGALOWfindcouch Set AWillowFreeform.SitCouch to 0 endif endif ;;;;Most of the mod deals only with IsFollowingDefault this will put her on IsFollowingLong if player has put her on that v97 If WillowFollowFar == 1 If (WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault == 1 && WillowREF.IsFollowingLong == 0) Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 1 WillowREF.evp endif endif ;;;;Keeps Beauty equipped If WillowREF.CombatStyleRanged && WillowREF.GetItemCount WillowsRifle > 0 If WillowREF.WeaponSwap == 0 If RelaxinNoBeauty == 0 && AWillow1l.EatNoBeauty == 0 If (SleepMarker == 0 && SleepOnBedroll == 0 && SleepAtHome == 0) WillowREF.EquipItem WillowsRifle 1 endif endif endif endif If RelaxinNoBeauty && WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsRifle WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsRifle 0 endif
;;;;Sets follow variable for all her commenting throughout her scripts If WillowREF.WillowCanComment == 0 If WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault || WillowREF.IsFollowingLong || AWillowMeetQuest.FollowNotHired || AWillow1.FollowNoAttack Set WillowREF.WillowCanComment to 1 endif endif If WillowREF.WillowCanComment == 1 If WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault == 0 && WillowREF.IsFollowingLong== 0 && AWillowMeetQuest.FollowNotHired == 0 Set WillowREF.WillowCanComment to 0 endif endif ;;;;Picks up treating for poison here so it can happen outside of combat which happens sometimes due to timing If AWillow5a.PoisonTreated == 0 && WillowREF.GetItemCount NVAntivenom > 0 If WillowREF.IsSpellTarget BarkScorpionPoison || WillowREF.IsSpellTarget CazadorPoison || WillowREF.IsSpellTarget DeathClawPoison || WillowREF.IsSpellTarget DLC03FeralGhoulPoison || WillowREF.IsSpellTarget DLC03RadScorpion3Poison || WillowREF.IsSpellTarget PoisonGreaseRadscorpionSpell || WillowREF.IsSpellTarget NightstalkerPoison || WillowREF.IsSpellTarget RadScorpion1Poison || WillowREF.IsSpellTarget RadScorpion2Poison Set AWillow5a.PoisonTreated to 1 StartQuest AWillow5a endif endif ;;;;moving Willow out of end game slides If DoOnce1 == 0 If GetStageDone VHDHouseBattle 100 || GetStageDone VHDIndependentBattle 100 || GetStageDone vHDBattleController 30 WillowREF.MoveTo CassHomeMarkerREF set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1.GuardAlert to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowTravelMO to 1 Set AWillow1.Relaxin to 1 WillowREF.evp Set WillowREF.Waiting to 1 Set DoOnce1 to 1 endif endif ;;;;she pulls her weapon on her own initiative in a couple of location; reholsters it here If WillowREF.WeaponOutCuzStuff && WillowREF.IsInInterior == 0 WillowREF.SetAlert 0 Set WillowREF.WeaponOutCuzStuff to 0 endif ;;;;;This will turn off NCR control comments in Willow's chatter based on NCR reputation If AWillow4a.McCarranNonNCR == 0 If GetReputationThreshold RepNVNCR 2 >= 2 && AWillow4a.McCarranNonNCR == 0 ;;;this is reputation at which NCR sends out hit squads Set FirstDayNCR22 to GameDaysPassed Set AWillow4a.McCarranNonNCR to 1 endif endif If AWillow4a.McCarranNonNCR If GetReputationThreshold RepNVNCR 2 < 2 Set AWillow4a.McCarranNonNCR to 0 endif endif ;;;;This starts timer once reputation goes to 2 >= 2 to establish that it's a pattern and not a blip in reputation and 1st question about antiNCR intentions If AWillow4a.McCarranNonNCR && NDaysNCR22 == 0 Set Today to GameDaysPassed If Today - FirstDayNCR22 >= 3 Set NDaysNCR22 to 1 endif endif
If RadsIncoming == 0 && (Player.IsInCombat || WillowREF.IsInCombat) Elseif RadsIncoming == 0 && (Player.IsInCombat == 0 && WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0) If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsSBVenomousMask && DoOnce7 == 1 WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsSBVenomousMask 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem WillowsSBVenomousMask 1 Set WillowREF.WeaponSwap to 2 Set DoOnce7 to 0 endif endif
If WillowREF.WillowCanComment && RadsToggle == 0 Set RadsLevelStart to Player.GetRadiationLevel If RadsLevelStart >= 1 && RadsIncoming == 0 Set RadsIncoming to 1 endif endif
If RadsIncoming If Timer <= 15 Set Timer to Timer + GetSecondsPassed Else Set RadsLevelCheck to Player.GetRadiationLevel If RadsLevelCheck >= 1 Set RadsIncoming to 1 Set RadsDialogue to 1 If PlayerMask == 0 || PlayerMask && (Player.IsInCombat || WillowREF.IsInCombat) Elseif PlayerMask && (Player.IsInCombat == 0 && WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0) If DoOnce7 == 0 WillowREF.AddItem WillowsSBVenomousMask 1 WillowREF.EquipItem WillowsSBVenomousMask 1 Set WillowREF.WeaponSwap to 2 Set DoOnce7 to 1 endif endif
ElseIf RadsLevelCheck < 1 Set RadsLevelStart to 0 Set RadsDialogue to 0 Set RadsIncoming to 0 endif Set Timer to 0 endif endif
;;; Adding items to level lists for vendors If DoOnce8 == 0 AddItemToLeveledList 188GeneralStoremisc WillowKIDOutfitPrewarChildandWatch 1 1 80 AddItemToLeveledList 188JunkMerchantMisc WillowKIDOutfitPrewarChildandWatch 1 1 80 AddItemToLeveledList vendormiscitems WillowKIDOutfitPrewarChildandWatch 1 1 80 AddItemToLeveledList vendorchestjunkstore WillowKIDOutfitPrewarChildandWatch 1 1 80 AddItemToLeveledList ClutterHouseholdJunk WillowKIDOutfitPrewarChildandWatch 1 1 80 AddItemToLeveledList ClutterHouseholdJunkSmall WillowKIDOutfitPrewarChildandWatch 1 1 80 AddItemToLeveledList VendorWeaponModsGunsTier1 WillowMod9mmSilencer 1 1 100 AddItemToLeveledList VendorWeaponModsGunsTier2 WillowMod9mmSilencer 1 1 100 Set DoOnce8 to 1 endif ;;;; At the beginning of each game session all this stuff gets added to all of these lists; NVSE function If GetGameRestarted ListAddForm NVBedSleepOnBackSexyList WillowNVBedTwinOnBack01R ListAddForm NVHoldoutWeapons WillowsSpikedKnuckles ListAddForm NVHoldoutWeapons WillowCarriedWeapNV9mmPistol ListAddForm NVImprovedHoldoutWeapons WillowMoraelinWeapLaserPistol ListAddForm NVImprovedHoldoutWeapons WillowWeapNV357RevolverUnique ListAddForm NVImprovedHoldoutWeapons WillowsTeddyBearCharges ListAddForm PerkCowboyWeapons WillowWeapNV357RevolverUnique ListAddForm PerkPyromaniacWeapons WillowWeapShishkebab ListAddForm TheProfessionalWeaponsList WillowMoraelinWeapLaserPistol ListAddForm TheProfessionalWeaponsList WillowCarriedWeapNV9mmPistol ListAddForm TheProfessionalWeaponsList WillowWeapNV357RevolverUnique ListAddForm ShotgunSurgeonWeaponsList WillowsNVCombatShotty endif END

Scn WillowTentMealWineBottleScript
short Button
Begin OnActivate Player
ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowWineBottleMessage
END
Begin GameMode
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
elseif Button == 0; Player cleans up dinner Activate WillowTentMealMarkerREF.Disable 0 Set AWillowFreeform.DinnerForTwoTent to 0 Return
elseif Button == 1; Do nothing Return
endif
END

Scn WillowSurprisesMailboxScript
short CueSurprise short PCcurrent
; Player has completed Freeform Quest and he and Willow are both out of the bungalow ; this makes it look like Willow is stuffing presents for the player into the mailbox; she leaves a note with the present ; AWillowFreeform.DoOnce13 is a toggle that goes back/forth with player entering/exiting the bungalow
Begin OnLoad If AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents < 7 If AWillowFreeform.MBox If WillowREF.WillowCanComment && AWillowFreeform.DoOnce13 If (WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow == 0 && Player.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow == 0) Set CueSurprise to GetRandomPercent
If CueSurprise < 9 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem WillowSurpriseMBothergiftList 1 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem WillowSurpriseMBnoteList 1 Set AWillowFreeform.DoOnce13 to 0 If AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents < 6 Set AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents to (AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents + 1) endif
Elseif CueSurprise < 17 Set PCcurrent to Player.GetLevel If PCcurrent >= 0 && PCcurrent < 6 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem LL2Tier2AmmoGunsAll 1 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem LL2Tier2AmmoMixedEnergyAll 1 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem NVRepairKit 1 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem WillowSurpriseMBnoteList 1 Set AWillowFreeform.DoOnce13 to 0 If AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents < 6 Set AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents to (AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents + 1) endif Elseif PCcurrent > 5 && PCcurrent < 11 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem LL2Tier3AmmoGunsAll 1 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem LL2Tier3AmmoMixedEnergyAll 1 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem NVRepairKit 1 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem WillowSurpriseMBnoteList 1 Set AWillowFreeform.DoOnce13 to 0 If AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents < 6 Set AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents to (AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents + 1) endif Elseif PCcurrent > 10 && PCcurrent < 16 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem LL2Tier4AmmoGunsAll 1 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem LL2Tier4AmmoMixedEnergyAll 1 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem NVRepairKit 1 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem WillowSurpriseMBnoteList 1 Set AWillowFreeform.DoOnce13 to 0 If AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents < 6 Set AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents to (AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents + 1) endif Elseif PCcurrent > 15 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem LL2Tier5AmmoGunsAll 1 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem LL2Tier5AmmoMixedEnergyAll 1 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem NVRepairKit 1 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem WillowSurpriseMBnoteList 1 Set AWillowFreeform.DoOnce13 to 0 If AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents < 6 Set AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents to (AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents + 1) endif endif
ElseIf CueSurprise < 25 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem WillowSurpriseMBbookmagList 1 WillowNovacHotelExtMailboxREF.AddItem WillowSurpriseMBnoteList 1 Set AWillowFreeform.DoOnce13 to 0 If AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents < 6 Set AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents to (AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents + 1) endif
Else If CueSurprise <= 100 Return endif endif endif endif endif endif
END

Scn WillowStoveScript
short Button
Begin OnActivate Player If Player.GetInCell WillowsCell ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowStoveTentScript Elseif Player.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowStoveHouseScript endif END
Begin GameMode
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
elseif Button == 0; Player chooses to cook at stove (using big pot) Activate Player.ShowRecipeMenu CampfireRecipes Return
elseif Button == 1; Player chooses to cook Ant Stew and set up meal on table (this unlocks after Ant Stew recipe unlocks) Player.RemoveItem AntMeat 2 Player.RemoveItem Carrot 2 Player.RemoveItem Potato 2 Player.RemoveItem WaterPurified 2
If Player.GetInCell WillowsCell WillowTentMealMarkerREF.Enable 0 Set AWillowFreeform.DinnerForTwoTent to 1 Elseif Player.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow WillowHouseDinnerFor2MarkerREF.Enable 0 Set AWillowFreeform.DinnerForTwo to 1 endif
endif END

Scn WillowSunglassesScript
short GlassesOff
Begin OnAdd
If WillowREF.IsInInterior Set GlassesOff to 1 endif
If WillowREF.IsInInterior == 0; back outside put them on Set GlassesOff to 0 endif
END
Begin GameMode
If WillowREF.IsInInterior && GlassesOff == 0 ; If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsAuthorityGlasses WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsAuthorityGlasses 1 1 Set GlassesOff to 1 endif endif
If WillowREF.IsInInterior == 0 && GlassesOff; back outside put them on ; If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsAuthorityGlasses WillowREF.Unequipitem WillowsAuthorityGlasses 0 1 WillowREF.EquipItem WillowsAuthorityGlasses 0 1 Set GlassesOff to 0 endif endif
END

Scn WillowJessicaGreetTriggerScript2
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerAsksAboutClint If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.JessicaFirstFG == 0 SetQuestObject WillowBrightFollower 1 SetQuestObject WillowsPreviousTravelCompanion 1 SetQuestObject WillowsTheBigGuysDog 1 Jessica2REF.MoveTo JessicaXMarkerHeadingREF Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.JessicaFirstFG to 1 Jessica2REF.evp Jessica2REF.Enable GWNNREF.MoveTo TheGWNNXMarkerREF GWNNref.SetActorsAI 1 Set GWNNref.StayPut to 0 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.GWNNtravel to 1 GWNNref.evp JTref.MoveTo TheGWNNXMarkerREF JTref.SetActorsAI 1 Set JTref.StayPut to 0 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.JTAccompany to 1 JTref.evp Disable MarkForDelete endif endif END

Scn WillowHouseExteriorVanillaDoorToggleScript
short Button
Begin OnActivate Player
ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowHotelVanillaDoorEnable
END
Begin GameMode
set Button to GetButtonPressed
If Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
Elseif Button == 0; Turn off Willow's mod inside bungalow/enable Vanilla door and disable Willow's door WillowNovacVanillaDoorToggleMarkerREF.Enable 0 Return
Elseif Button == 1 ; Turn on Willow's mod inside bungalow/disable Vanilla door and enable Willow's door WillowNovacVanillaDoorToggleMarkerREF.Disable 0 Return
Elseif Button == 2 ; do nothing Return
endif END

Scn WillowLikesPlayerQuestScript
short WillowLikesPlayer; tallies player behavior towards Willow gifts/conversation/activities/etc; ultimately leads to player reward short PlayerisAss; asks her to sleep with him in return for his help in initial quest; part of total tally for ultimate reward short PlayerKnowsAboutClint; set in dialogue Willow has told player about Chester and GWNN short PlayerAsksAboutClint; set in dialogue player follows up about Chester and GWNN short PlayerWasAss; 1 sex suggestion; 2 Lied about Moira short PlayerLied short WillowGetsBeauty short WillowHireForceGreet short DoOnce1 short PCdoUnarmed; dialogue control for Player training Willow short PCreturnUnarmed; dialogue control for Player training Willow short RAtrainWillow short RAreturntoTrain
short WillowIsBFF; Player has done enough to make Willow wanna be his/her BFF and gets all the rewards that go with that
short JessicaFirstFG; Package variable short JessicaRSandbox; Package variable short JessicasHairTopic; dialogue variable short JessicaPCInsults; dialogue variable short PCtalkingtoJessica; dialogue variable to MoveTo GWNN short GWNNguard; package variables for The Big Buy; wtf so many packages for a NPC that doesn't last but two minutes! short GWNNsleep short GWNNsandbox short GWNNtravel short GWNNtravelcamp short PChasChester; dialogue topic short JessicawithTheBigGuy; Accompany Package variable short TheBigGuyleaves; Travel to MO Package variable short JTAccompany; package variable short DoOnce2 short GWNNgivesChester; package variable short TBGsaysNOtoPlayer; dialogue variable to set up package for The Big Guy to give Chester directly to Willow short WillowHasChester; dialogue variable short PCtalkedtoTBGJessica; dialogue variable short GWNNsandboxMO; package variable short JessicaSandboxMO; package variable short JessicaChatPCinMO; package variable short PCgetsGWNNtoLeaveMO; dialogue variable short JessicaGaveReward; dialogue variable short PCJessicaTalkedAboutTBG; dialogue variable short TBGgivesChesterWillow; Dialogue Pkg variable short PCliedtoTBGJessica; dialogue variable short PCFindChesterLater; dialogue variable short PCTalkedinMO; dialogue variable short PlayerHitWillow; dialogue variable using to track if player assaults Willow because I turn off
short DoOnce3 short DoOnce4 short DoOnce5 short DoOnce6 short DoOnce7 short DoOnce8 short DoOnce9 short DoOnce10 short DoOnce11 short DoOnce12 short DoOnce13 short DoOnce14 short DoOnce15 short DoOnce16 short DoOnce17 short DoOnce18
short FriendsWithBenefits; Willow will dance for Player and maybe fade to black goodness short WillowCanScavenge; Dialogue Variable
short PlayerSaidNO; Dialogue Variable short IhaveChester; dialogue variable
float GettingFriendlier; variable set when Friends with Benefits goes to 1; Willow will start being friendlier building up to overt comeon of asking player to go out for beer and then she'll dance and fade to black if he/she wants ; right now I think this timer will last for 10 days
short SleepHereNightie short ReadNote short CanBuyJT short ReturnBuyJT short PaidForJT
short FTB; Set when Player has fade to black with Willow for dialogue purposes short ReturnForFTB short FTBisOn short TakeMyClothes short JTRewardGiven short FTBrejected short FTBneedsBeautyBack short Stage short PostFTBChat short FTBAgain short DoOnce19 float FTBtimer short PostFTBComment short JustFriends short PillowTalk short PreBFFs short HouseMarkerBFF short PreBFFClothes short VeronicaTraining short AddPresents short TalkAboutJT short TalkAboutBFF short BFFGreeting short SeductionReturn short TriggerSeductionAttempt short PCTalkedtoJessica; dialogue var for Expansion short WillowHasOnePresent short CrunchyPresent short ChewyPresent float WillowWaitingforNextPresent
short WereArePreBFFs float BFFannouncementDelay float LftbDiceRoll short LftbYes short LftbNo float FTBstartdelay float Today
Begin GameMode ;;;;;; Timer for presents given to Willow during the quest
If WillowHasOnePresent If GameDaysPassed - WillowWaitingforNextPresent >= 1 Set WillowHasOnePresent to 0 endif endif
If GetQuestCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest Return endif
;;;;;;Timer delay for player to move from Friends to BFF. Delay is two days
If WereArePreBFFs If GameDaysPassed - BFFannouncementDelay >= 2 Set WereArePreBFFs to 2 endif endif
If WereArePreBFFs < 2 ;waiting Else If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 100 && AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PreBFFs If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.BFFGreeting == 0 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.JTRewardGiven || AWillow1.NoMelee == 0 || AWillow1.HasHome SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 20 Set WereArePreBFFs to 3 endif endif endif endif
;;;;;Complete Quest If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 1 == 1 If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 4 == 1 If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 9 == 1 || GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 10 == 1 If GetStageDone AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 100 == 0 SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 100 endif endif endif endif
;;;This fails in dialogue results scrips sometimes so am trying to catch it here If GetStageDone AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 10 == 0 If WillowREF.GetItemCount WillowsRifle >= 1 || WillowGetsBeauty If WillowsFourthContainerREF.GetItemCount WillowVoodooDoll >= 1 If WillowsFourthContainerREF.GetItemCount WillowsTeddy >= 1 SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 10 endif endif endif endif END

Scn WillowHouseWaterPurifierScript
short Button
Begin OnActivate ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowHouseWaterPurifierScript END
Begin MenuMode
Set Button to GetButtonPressed
If Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
Elseif Button == 0; Player chooses to purify Dirty Water Player.RemoveItem WaterUnpurified 1 Set WillowWaterToPlayer to 1 WillowHousePurifiedH2OBottleREF.Enable 0 Return
Elseif Button == 1; Player chooses to purify 5ea Dirty Waters Player.RemoveItem WaterUnpurified 5 Set WillowWaterToPlayer to 5 WillowHousePurifiedH2OBottleREF.Enable 0 Return
Elseif Button == 2; Player chooses to purify all Dirty Waters Set WillowWaterToPlayerNo to Player.GetItemCount WaterUnpurified Player.RemoveItem WaterUnpurified WillowWaterToPlayerNo Set WillowWaterToPlayer to 3 WillowHousePurifiedH2OBottleREF.Enable 0 Return
Elseif Button == 3; Player chooses to purify Irradiated Water Player.RemoveItem IrradiatedWaterUnpurified 1 Set WillowWaterToPlayer to 1 WillowHousePurifiedH2OBottleREF.Enable 0 Return
Elseif Button == 4; Player chooses to purify 5ea Irradiated Waters Player.RemoveItem IrradiatedWaterUnpurified 5 Set WillowWaterToPlayer to 5 WillowHousePurifiedH2OBottleREF.Enable 0 Return
Elseif Button == 5; Player chooses to purify all Irradiated Waters Set WillowWaterToPlayerNo to Player.GetItemCount IrradiatedWaterUnpurified Player.RemoveItem IrradiatedWaterUnpurified WillowWaterToPlayerNo Set WillowWaterToPlayer to 3 WillowHousePurifiedH2OBottleREF.Enable 0 Return
Elseif Button == 6; Do Nothing Return endif END

Scn Willow1aScript
short HadDiscussion short TalkAgain short Waits float Today float WaitForNextDiscussion
Begin GameMode
;;;Timer for Player discussions with Willow about following without finding Beauty ;;;Will show up after 7, then 5, then 5 days if Willow isn't hired
If Waits == 1 If AWillowMeetQuest.DoesntOfferUnconditionalTravel == 0 If WillowREF.GetItemCount WillowsRifle == 0 Set Today to GameDaysPassed If Today - WaitForNextDiscussion >= 7 AddTopic AWDTravelWOBeauty1 Set TalkAgain to 1 endif endif endif endif
If Waits == 2 If AWillowMeetQuest.DoesntOfferUnconditionalTravel == 0 If WillowREF.GetItemCount WillowsRifle == 0 Set Today to GameDaysPassed If Today - WaitForNextDiscussion >= 5 Set TalkAgain to 2 endif endif endif endif
If Waits == 3 If AWillowMeetQuest.DoesntOfferUnconditionalTravel == 0 If WillowREF.GetItemCount WillowsRifle == 0 Set Today to GameDaysPassed If Today - WaitForNextDiscussion >= 5 Set TalkAgain to 3 endif endif endif endif
If WillowREF.HasBeenHired Set WaitforNextDiscussion to 0 StopQuest AWillow1a endif
END

Scn WillowBedrollScript
short Button
Begin OnActivate If IsActionREF Player == 1 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowsBedrollScript Else Activate endif END
Begin MenuMode
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
elseif Button == 0; Player chooses to sleep on bed Activate Disable MarkforDelete WillowsTravelingSleepMarkerREF.MoveTo WillowsThirdContainerREF Return
elseif Button == 1; Player chooses to clean up bed only Disable MarkforDelete WillowsTravelingSleepMarkerREF.MoveTo WillowsThirdContainerREF Return
elseif Button == 2;;; Player chooses to wait and leaves bedroll to clean up later Return
endif
END

Scn WillowHouseWaterBottleScript
short Button
Begin OnActivate ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowHouseWaterBottleMessage END
Begin MenuMode
Set Button to GetButtonPressed
If Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
Elseif Button == 0; Player Takes Water (one bottle due) WillowHousePurifiedH2OBottleREF.Disable 0 Player.AddItem WaterPurified 1 Set WillowWaterToPlayer to 0 Return
Elseif Button == 1; Player Takes Water (five bottles due) WillowHousePurifiedH2OBottleREF.Disable 0 Player.AddItem WaterPurified 5 Set WillowWaterToPlayer to 0 Return
Elseif Button == 2; Player Takes Some Number of bottles WillowHousePurifiedH2OBottleREF.Disable 0 Player.AddItem WaterPurified WillowWaterToPlayerNo Set WillowWaterToPlayer to 0 Set WillowWaterToPlayerNo to 0 Return
Elseif Button == 3; No purified water is available at this time Return endif END
