Scn WillowHouseShowerScript
short Showertime short DoOnce short MiscOutfit
Begin OnTriggerEnter If GetActionRef == Player && WillowREF.GetDistance Player > 50 && Showertime Return endif
If GetActionRef == Player && Showertime == 0 WHShowerWaterREF.Enable 0 WHShowerSteamREF.Enable 0 WHSoundREF.Enable 0 Set Showertime to 1 Return endif
If GetActionRef == WillowREF && Showertime Return endif
If GetActionRef == WillowREF && Showertime == 0 Set WillowShowerSleepDelay to 1 WHShowerWaterREF.Enable 0 WHShowerSteamREF.Enable 0 WHSoundREF.Enable 0 WillowHouseShowerIdleMarkerREF.Enable 0 Set Showertime to 1 If AWillowFreeform.Outfit1 WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerOutfit1REF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerOutfit1REF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set AWillowFreeform.Outfit1 to 1 ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Outfit2 WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerOutfit2REF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerOutfit2REF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set AWillowFreeform.Outfit2 to 1 ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Outfit3 WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerOutfit3REF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerOutfit3REF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set AWillowFreeform.Outfit3 to 1 ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Outfit4 WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerOutfit4REF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerOutfit4REF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set AWillowFreeform.Outfit4 to 1 ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Swimwear WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerSwimwearREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerSwimwearREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set AWillowFreeform.Swimwear to 1 ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Sleepwear WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerSleepwearREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerSleepwearREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set AWillowFreeform.Sleepwear to 1 ElseIf AWillowFreeform.ftb WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerFTBREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseDrawerFTBREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set AWillowFreeform.ftb to 1 Else WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseClothingMainSortREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowHouseClothingMainSortREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set MiscOutfit to 1 endif If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsRifle WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsRifle 0 endif WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowsFU2weaponsBoxREF 0 1 40 endif END
Begin OnTriggerLeave If GetActionRef == Player && Showertime == 0 Return endif
If GetActionRef == Player && Showertime WHShowerWaterREF.Disable 0 WHShowerSteamREF.Disable 0 WHSoundREF.Disable 0 Set Showertime to 0 endif
If GetActionRef == WillowREF && Showertime == 0 Return endif
If GetActionRef == WillowREF && Showertime WHShowerWaterREF.Disable 0 WHShowerSteamREF.Disable 0 WHSoundREF.Disable 0 WillowHouseShowerIdleMarkerREF.Disable 0 Set Showertime to 0 If AWillowFreeform.Outfit1 WillowHouseDrawerOutfit1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerOutfit1REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Outfit2 WillowHouseDrawerOutfit2REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerOutfit2REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Outfit3 WillowHouseDrawerOutfit3REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerOutfit3REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Outfit4 WillowHouseDrawerOutfit4REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerOutfit4REF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Swimwear WillowHouseDrawerSwimwearREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerSwimwearREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.Sleepwear WillowHouseDrawerSleepwearREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerSleepwearREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent ElseIf AWillowFreeform.ftb WillowHouseDrawerFTBREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseDrawerFTBREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Elseif MiscOutfit WillowHouseClothingMainSortREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 24 WillowOutfitPermanent WillowHouseClothingMainSortREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowREF 1 0 26 WillowOutfitPermanent Set MiscOutfit to 0 endif WillowREF.Additem WillowsWeaponToken 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem WillowsWeaponToken 1 Set WillowREF.WeaponSwap to 1 Set WillowShowerSleepDelay to 0 endif END

Scn Willow4dScript
;Idle Chatter Timer Script for Exterior Chatter only
short WillowChats short STFU short StopSinging float Timer float ChanceToChat short Stage short Location short Btalked short Vtalked
Begin GameMode
;;;Staged timer to reset chats variable with control to not interfere with scripted comments
If Timer >= 0 Set Timer to Timer - GetSecondsPassed
ElseIf Stage == 0 If WillowChats Set Stage to 1 Set Timer to 10 Set WillowChats to 2 endif
ElseIf Stage == 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Stage to 2 Set Timer to 270
ElseIf Stage == 2 If AWillow4c.DeathclawChatter Set AWillow4c.DeathclawChatter to 0 endif Set WillowChats to 0 Set Stage to 0 Set Timer to 0 endif
;;;;;chat bit If STFU == 0 && AWillow1i.CombatChatWait == 0 If Player.IsInInterior == 0 && WillowREF.WillowCanComment If WillowChats == 0 && WillowREF.GetDistance Player >= 200 If Player.IsInCombat == 0 && WillowREF.IsInCombat == 0 If Player.IsSneaking == 0 && WillowREF.GetSleeping == 0 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.FTBisOn == 0 Set Location to 1 endif endif endif endif endif endif
If Location && WillowREF.GetDistance Player >= 200 If Player.IsInInterior == 0 && WillowChats == 0 If AWillow1.RadsDialogue == 1 WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedRadsDialogue 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return ElseIf IsPlayerInRegion VMapTheFortRegion WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedTheFort 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return Elseif Player.GetInWorldspace TheFortWorld; Caesar's tent WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedCaesarsTent 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return ElseIf IsPlayerInRegion VMAPBitterSpringsRegion || IsPlayerinRegion vMapRegionCampGolf WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedNCROther 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return ElseIf IsPlayerInRegion VMapCampForlornHopeRegion WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedCampForlornHope 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return ElseIf IsPlayerInRegion vMapCottonwoodCove WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedCottonwoodCove 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return Else Set Location to 2 endif Else Set Location to 0 Return endif endif
If Location == 2 && WillowREF.GetDistance Player >= 200 If Player.IsInInterior == 0 && WillowChats == 0 If Player.GetInWorldSpace FreesideWorld || Player.GetInWorldSpace FreesideNorthWorld WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedFreeside 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return ElseIf IsPlayerInRegion VMapGoodspringsRegion WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedGoodsprings 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return ElseIf IsPlayerInRegion MapHooverDam WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedHooverDam 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return ElseIf IsPlayerInRegion vMapLegateCamp WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedLegate 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return ElseIf Player.GetInWorldspace Lucky38World WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedL38Pent 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return Else Set Location to 3 endif Else Set Location to 0 Return endif endif
If Location == 3 && WillowREF.GetDistance Player >= 200 If Player.IsInInterior == 0 && WillowChats == 0 If IsPlayerInRegion vMapCampMcCarranRegion WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedMcCarran 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return ElseIf IsPlayerInRegion vMapMojaveOutpostregion WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedMojaveOutpost 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return ElseIf IsPlayerInRegion vMapNellisAFBRegion WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedNellis 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return ElseIf IsPlayerInRegion vMapNelsonRegion WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedNelson 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return ElseIf IsPlayerInRegion VMapNiptonRegion WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedNipton 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return ElseIf IsPlayerInRegion VMapNovacRegion || WillowREF.GetDistance WillowNovacBungalowDoorREF < 4000 WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedNovac 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return Else Set Location to 4 endif Else Set Location to 0 Return endif endif
If Location == 4 && WillowREF.GetDistance Player >= 200 If Player.IsInInterior == 0 && WillowChats == 0 If (IsPlayerInRegion vMapCampGuardianRegion || IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSAlphaRegion == 1 || IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSBravoRegion == 1 || IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSCharlieRegion == 1 || IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSDeltaRegion == 1 || IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSEchoRegion == 1 || IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSFoxtrotRegion == 1) WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedNCRStations 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return ElseIf IsPlayerInRegion VMapRedRockCanyonRegion WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedRedRock 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return ElseIf Player.GetInWorldSpace TheStripWorldNew WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedTheStrip 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return Elseif IsPlayerInRegion VMapWestside WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedWestside 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 ElseIf WillowREF.GetDistance WillowDeadwindDCMarkerREF <= 8000 || WillowREF.GetDistance WillowGypsumDCMarkerREF <= 12000 || WillowREF.GetDistance WillowPromontoryDCMarkerREF <= 10000 || WillowREF.GetDistance WillowQJDCMarkerREF <= 8000 || IsPlayerInRegion VMapQuarryJunctionRegion WillowREF.SayTo Player AWDTimedDeathclaws 1 Set AWillow4c.DeathclawChatter to 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return Else Set Location to 5 endif Else Set Location to 0 Return endif endif
If Location == 5 && WillowREF.GetDistance Player >= 200 ; vanilla followers If Player.IsInInterior == 0 && WillowREF.WillowCanComment If vNPCFollowers.bBooneHired || vNPCFollowers.bVeronicaHired Set ChanceToChat to GetRandomPercent If ChanceToChat < 50 If VeronicaREF.GetDistance WillowREF < 1000 && VTalked == 0 VeronicaREF.StartConversation WillowREF HELLO Set WillowChats to 1 Set VTalked to 1 Set BTalked to 0 Set Location to 0 Return Elseif CraigBooneREF.GetDistance WillowREF < 1000 && BTalked == 0 CraigBooneREF.StartConversation WillowREF HELLO Set WillowChats to 1 Set VTalked to 0 Set BTalked to 1 Set Location to 0 Return Else WillowREF.SayTo Player AWillowDScriptTimedChatter 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set VTalked to 0 Set BTalked to 0 Set Location to 0 Return endif Elseif ChanceToChat <= 100 If VeronicaREF.GetDistance WillowREF < 1000 && VTalked == 0 WillowREF.StartConversation VeronicaREF HELLO Set WillowChats to 1 Set VTalked to 1 Set BTalked to 0 Set Location to 0 Return Elseif CraigBooneREF.GetDistance WillowREF < 1000 && BTalked == 0 WillowREF.StartConversation CraigBooneREF HELLO Set WillowChats to 1 Set VTalked to 0 Set BTalked to 1 Set Location to 0 Return Else WillowREF.SayTo Player AWillowDScriptTimedChatter 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set VTalked to 0 Set BTalked to 0 Set Location to 0 Return endif endif Else WillowREF.SayTo Player AWillowDScriptTimedChatter 1 Set WillowChats to 1 Set Location to 0 Return endif Else Set Location to 0 Return endif endif END

Scn WillowMeetQuestFirstTriggerScript
short DoOnce short DoOnce1 short DoOnce2
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
If AWillowMeetQuest.StartWillow == 0 && WillowREF.HasBeenHired == 0 && WillowREF.Fired == 0 If DoOnce == 0 SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 0 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to 0 SetStage AWillowMeetQuest 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.StartWillow to 1 If GetNVSEVersion < 2 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowNVSE endif If WillowREF.GetInCell WillowsCell == 0 WillowREF.MoveTo WillowMQFirstMeetXMarkerHeadingREF Set AWillowMeetQuest.FirstGreet to 1 WillowREF.evp endif Set DoOnce to 1 endif endif
If AWillow4c.GoldPlated == 1 && DoOnce1 == 0 WillowTentCheaterPosterREF.Enable Set DoOnce1 to 1 endif
If DoOnce2 == 0 If WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault || WillowREF.IsFollowingLong || AWillowMeetQuest.FollowNotHired WillowREF.RemoveFromFaction WillowsTentFaction Player.RemoveFromFaction WillowsTentFaction Set DoOnce2 to 1 endif endif
If KyleREF.GetInCell WillowsCell KyleREF.SetActorsAI 0 endif
If KennyREF.GetInCell WillowsCell KennyREF.SetActorsAI 0 endif
If StanREF.GetInCell WillowsCell StanREF.SetActorsAI 0 endif
If WendyREF.GetInCell WillowsCell WendyREF.SetActorsAI 0 endif
If JTref.GetInCell WillowsCell JTref.SetActorsAI 0 endif
If GWNNref.GetInCell WillowsCell GWNNref.SetActorsAI 0 endif
WillowsSecondContainerREF.SetActorsAI 0 WillowsThirdContainerREF.SetActorsAI 0 WillowsFourthContainerREF.SetActorsAI 0 WillowsFifthContainerREF.SetActorsAI 0 END

Scn WillowMeetQuestTentTriggerScript
short DoOnce
Begin OnTriggerEnter Player
If Player.IsInCombat Player.StopCombatAlarmOnActor WillowREF.StopCombatAlarmOnActor endif
WillowsSecondContainerREF.SetActorsAI 0 WillowsThirdContainerREF.SetActorsAI 0 WillowsFourthContainerREF.SetActorsAI 0 WillowsFifthContainerREF.SetActorsAI 0
If JTref.GetInCell WillowsCell JTref.SetActorsAI 0 endif If KyleREF.GetInCell WillowsCell KyleREF.SetActorsAI 0 endif If KennyREF.GetInCell WillowsCell KennyREF.SetActorsAI 0 endif If GWNNref.GetInCell WillowsCell GWNNref.SetActorsAI 0 endif If StanREF.GetInCell WillowsCell StanREF.SetActorsAI 0 endif If WendyREF.GetInCell WillowsCell WendyREF.SetActorsAI 0 endif If (AWillowCoffee.FiredOnce && WillowREF.GetInCell WillowsCell && WillowREF.Fired == 1) WillowREF.SetActorsAI 0 endif
If AWillow4a.WillowHeardMalcolm If AWillow4a.WillowHeardCliff == 0 || AWillow4c.DoOnce9 == 0 Set AWillow4a.WillowHeardMalcolm to 0 endif endif END

Scn WillowJTScript
short HasBeenHired short CombatStyleRanged short CombatStyleMelee short IsFollowingDefault short IsFollowingLong short FollowerSwitchAggressive ; 0 = Passive (wait for player), 1 = Aggressive (attack when see enemy) short Waiting short Fired short L38 short GuardAlert short Relaxin short FindPlayer short HasHome short GoHome short FollowWillow short GoingHome short IsFollowingWillow short L38together short StayNOAttack short FollowFar short NOAttackToggle short PHCombatStart short MonitorPlayerHP short StayPut
Begin OnStartCombat
If FollowerSwitchAggressive == 0 && Player.IsInCombat == 0 StopCombat endif endif
END
Begin OnCombatEnd
RestoreAV Health 100 restoreav perceptioncondition 100 restoreav endurancecondition 100 restoreav leftattackcondition 100 restoreav leftmobilitycondition 100 restoreav rightattackcondition 100 restoreav rightmobilitycondition 100
END
Begin OnDeath
Set HasBeenHired to 0 Set Waiting to 0 Set StayNOAttack to 0 Set GoHome to 0 Set IsFollowingLong to 0 Set IsFollowingDefault to 0
If HasBeenHired ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowJTIsWormfood endif
If GetDead If GetDistance Player >= 15000 SetQuestObject WillowsTheBigGuysDog 0 Disable MarkForDelete endif endif
Player.RemoveItem WillowsJTBaseball 1
END

Scn WillowKyleTracker2000Script
short Button
Begin OnEquip Player
ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowKyleTracker2000
END
Begin MenuMode
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if Button == -1 ; No button has been pressed yet Return
elseif Button == 0; Do Nothing Player.UnequipItem WillowKyleTracker2000 1 Return
elseif Button == 1; Player move to Kyle Player.MoveTo KyleREF 50, 0, 0 Player.UnequipItem WillowKyleTracker2000 1 Return
elseif Button == 2; Get rid of Kyle Tracker 2000 Player.RemoveItem WillowKyleTracker2000 1 0 Return endif END

Scn Willow5aScript
float PoisonTimer short PoisonTreated
Begin GameMode
If PoisonTreated > 0 If WillowREF.IsSpellTarget BarkScorpionPoison || WillowREF.IsSpellTarget CazadorPoison || WillowREF.IsSpellTarget DeathClawPoison || WillowREF.IsSpellTarget DLC03FeralGhoulPoison || WillowREF.IsSpellTarget DLC03RadScorpion3Poison || WillowREF.IsSpellTarget PoisonGreaseRadscorpionSpell || WillowREF.IsSpellTarget NightstalkerPoison || WillowREF.IsSpellTarget RadScorpion1Poison || WillowREF.IsSpellTarget RadScorpion2Poison If PoisonTimer <= 15 ;this used to be set at 30 but they always get knocked out am trying it at 15 seconds to see what happens Set PoisonTimer to PoisonTimer + GetSecondsPassed
Else WillowREF.CIOS NVAntivenom WillowREF.RemoveItem NVAntivenom 1 PlaySound NPCHumanDrinkingBottleGulp ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowAntivenom Set PoisonTreated to 2 Set PoisonTimer to 0 Set AWillow1i.Stung to 1 endif
Elseif WillowREF.IsSpellTarget BarkScorpionPoison == 0 && WillowREF.IsSpellTarget CazadorPoison == 0 && WillowREF.IsSpellTarget DeathClawPoison == 0 && WillowREF.IsSpellTarget DLC03FeralGhoulPoison == 0 && WillowREF.IsSpellTarget DLC03RadScorpion3Poison == 0 && WillowREF.IsSpellTarget PoisonGreaseRadscorpionSpell == 0 && WillowREF.IsSpellTarget NightstalkerPoison == 0 && WillowREF.IsSpellTarget RadScorpion1Poison == 0 && WillowREF.IsSpellTarget RadScorpion2Poison == 0 Set PoisonTreated to 0 Set PoisonTimer to 0 StopQuest AWillow5a endif endif END

Scn Willow9eScript

Set WillowCount to WillowREF.GetItemCount BlamcoMacandCheese Set BlamcoMacandCheeseAfter to (WillowCount - BlamcoMacandCheeseBefore) If BlamcoMacandCheeseAfter > 0 WillowREF.RemoveItem BlamcoMacandCheese BlamcoMacandCheeseAfter Set AWillow9c.SendOut to 1 If WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem BlamcoMacandCheese BlamcoMacandCheeseAfter Elseif WillowREF.GetInCell WillowsCell WillowTentSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem BlamcoMacandCheese BlamcoMacandCheeseAfter endif endif
Set WillowCount to WillowREF.GetItemCount BrahminMeat Set BrahminMeatAfter to (WillowCount - BrahminMeatBefore) If BrahminMeatAfter > 0 WillowREF.RemoveItem BrahminMeat BrahminMeatAfter Set AWillow9c.SendOut to 1 If WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem BrahminMeat BrahminMeatAfter Elseif WillowREF.GetInCell WillowsCell WillowTentSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem BrahminMeat BrahminMeatAfter endif endif
Set WillowCount to WillowREF.GetItemCount BrocFlower Set BrocFlowerAfter to (WillowCount - BrocFlowerBefore) If BrocFlowerAfter > 0 WillowREF.RemoveItem BrocFlower BrocFlowerAfter Set AWillow9c.SendOut to 1 If WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem BrocFlower BrocFlowerAfter Elseif WillowREF.GetInCell WillowsCell WillowTentSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem BrocFlower BrocFlowerAfter endif endif
Set WillowCount to WillowREF.GetItemCount Carrot Set CarrotAfter to (WillowCount - CarrotBefore) If CarrotAfter > 0 WillowREF.RemoveItem Carrot CarrotAfter Set AWillow9c.SendOut to 1 If WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem Carrot CarrotAfter Elseif WillowREF.GetInCell WillowsCell WillowTentSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem Carrot CarrotAfter endif endif
Set WillowCount to WillowREF.GetItemCount CazadorEgg Set CazadorEggAfter to (WillowCount - CazadorEggBefore) If CazadorEggAfter > 0 WillowREF.RemoveItem CazadorEgg CazadorEggAfter Set AWillow9c.SendOut to 1 If WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem CazadorEgg CazadorEggAfter Elseif WillowREF.GetInCell WillowsCell WillowTentSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem CazadorEgg CazadorEggAfter endif endif
Set WillowCount to WillowREF.GetItemCount Flour Set FlourAfter to (WillowCount - FlourBefore) If FlourAfter > 0 WillowREF.RemoveItem Flour FlourAfter Set AWillow9c.SendOut to 1 If WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem Flour FlourAfter Elseif WillowREF.GetInCell WillowsCell WillowTentSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem Flour FlourAfter endif endif
Set WillowCount to WillowREF.GetItemCount JalapenoPepper Set JalapenoPepperAfter to (WillowCount - JalapenoPepperBefore) If JalapenoPepperAfter > 0 WillowREF.RemoveItem JalapenoPepper JalapenoPepperAfter Set AWillow9c.SendOut to 1 If WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem JalapenoPepper JalapenoPepperAfter Elseif WillowREF.GetInCell WillowsCell WillowTentSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem JalapenoPepper JalapenoPepperAfter endif endif

Set WillowCount to WillowREF.GetItemCount NVPinyonNuts Set NVPinyonNutsAfter to (WillowCount - NVPinyonNutsBefore) If NVPinyonNutsAfter > 0 WillowREF.RemoveItem NVPinyonNuts NVPinyonNutsAfter Set AWillow9c.SendOut to 1 If WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem NVPinyonNuts NVPinyonNutsAfter Elseif WillowREF.GetInCell WillowsCell WillowTentSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem NVPinyonNuts NVPinyonNutsAfter endif endif

Set WillowCount to WillowREF.GetItemCount SugarBombs01 Set SugarBombs01After to (WillowCount - SugarBombs01Before) If SugarBombs01After > 0 WillowREF.RemoveItem SugarBombs01 SugarBombs01After Set AWillow9c.SendOut to 1 If WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem SugarBombs01 SugarBombs01After Elseif WillowREF.GetInCell WillowsCell WillowTentSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem SugarBombs01 SugarBombs01After endif endif

Schematics - Teddy Bear Charges

Willow, at a workbench, combine:
3 Sticks of Dynamite Wires taken from Scrap Electronics A salvaged watch 1 Teddy Bear
Oh, be careful. These are funny, but very powerful! I recommend that you throw the bear and run like hell the other way.
- Ron
Agreement with Mr. Williams

You will pursue Michael Jefferson, the ghoul that took and killed my two sons, into Nevada and capture him and bring him back to me alive.
If you bring him to me alive I will give you $1000 NCR.
If you kill him, or he is dead by someone else's hand, but you bring me his head, I'll pay you $500 NCR.
Any other outcome and you will receive nothing from me.
The latest intel I have from my investigator is that Jefferson is heading for a small town south of New Vegas. There's a cult there led by a ghoul named Jason Bright. Jefferson thinks he will be safe hidden among the other zombies. We bribed his lover for this information and we believe it to be reliable.
John Williams
She Likes You, She Likes You Not...

She Likes You, She Likes You Not...
-This is Willow's main quest in which you will gain Willow's friendship and perhaps more... -Some things you do will make Willow happy or unhappy. You will know when you've made her happy or unhappy by a sound that plays when points are awarded or taken away from you. This process begins as soon as you meet her. -Once Willow has joined you, there will be an item added to your apparel inventory that you can equip, at any time, to get the number of points you have at that time. -There are many benefits of gaining her friendship and you will discover them over time as your relationship with her progresses.
Good luck and have fun!
:) llama
Willow's eating with you! How it works...

Willow's eating with you is for roleplaying purposes.
She will try to sit down to do it. If there is no appropriate seat nearby she won't be able to eat although she will remain standing and drink something.
She will eat and/or drink for two minutes and then return to following you. There is nothing more you need to do.
:) Have fun!
Willow's Going Shopping! How it works...

Willow's shopping works like this:
She will need 15 or 20 caps per trip.
She finds caps of her own while following you, but she probably won't have enough if you take her shopping frequently. When you enter the area where she is supposed to talk to the trader, if she does nothing, go talk to her. She has a dialogue topic that allows you to give her caps if you want to. That topic only appears in those locations. She also has an Idle Chatter topic that alerts you when she has fewer than 20 caps.
The items she buys are ingredients for her own recipes and a couple of others that she will successfully cook if she has ingredients when you ask her to put out her campfire.
However, she doesn't buy everything she needs. Some things will need to be scavenged or gathered.
Stan's Note

Alright losers, like I said before, go out and get me good stuff. I get tired of repeating myself so this is your last chance. I want weapons, chems, stuff that I can use or sell. Oh, and if you find anything nice I can give to Wendy that would be good. Jewelry or something she'll like.
I'm not going to Primm with the rest of those losers from NCRCF, not with the NCR sitting right at the gate so you're going to have to track me down. I'm going to catch up with Wendy and her friends. They're usually at The Raided Farmstead or at a place up on Highway 95 just south of Novac. To get to the Raided Farmstead go along the road that Nipton's on. If you keep going east you'll come to it soon enough. It's south of the road.
Find me when you have something good for me and I'll make it worth your while.
Stan
Willow's Ant Stew

These are the ingredients I use to make Ant Stew:
Ant Meat x1 Carrot x1 Potato x1 Water Purified x1
I just throw these things together and let them cook.
Willow's Mantis Casserole

These are the ingredients I use to make Mantis Casserole:
Mantis Leg x1 Jalapeno Pepper x2 Blamco Mac and Cheese x1
This one is tricky to do at the campfire. It turns out better at home on the stove.
Willow's Cazador Egg Puff

These are the ingredients I use to make the Cazador Egg Puff:
Brahmin Meat x1 Banana Yucca Fruit x2 Cazador Egg x1
This recipe is very hard to pull off. Well, it can be eaten no matter what, as long as you cook it until the egg is done, but it tastes best if you cook it just right.
Gone to Mojave Outpost
I've decided to leave for the Mojave Outpost. If you still want J.T. once you've gotten the 250 caps together meet me there.
Willow's Journal Rescue

The Great Robbery!!!
I was robbed. What a disaster! I lost Beauty, Chester and Moira; I'm heart broken. I got hurt in the scuffle and my leg is sore. I had enough stimpaks on me to heal up the worst of it, but it's really bothering me and is itching horribly. I hope that goes away soon.
But, I think that there might be something good to come out of it, as crazy as that sounds. How can losing Beauty be good? Well, someone found me on the road and is going to help me find my stuff.
And the someone! I don't want to jinx it so I'm just going to say this. I'm excited and am hoping for good things to happen.
Willow's Ingredient List

Apple Banana Yucca Fruit Blamco Mac and Cheese Brahmin Meat Broc Flower Carrot Empty Nuka-Cola Bottle Flour Gecko Meat Jalapeno Pepper Nuka Cola Pinyon Nuts Potato Purified Water Sarsaparilla Sugar Bombs Xander Root
These are the ingredients I need to make my favorite recipes. I need more than one of some of them to make a batch of something and, of course, we'd need to use a campfire to cook. I can set one up for us anytime. Willow :)
My favorite recipes: all my own recipes but I also like to make Gecko Steak and Gecko Kebabs
Willow's Journal San Francisco

San Francisco
I'm exhausted. We got into San Francisco yesterday morning early. I'm traveling with a guy named Harry, his brother Ron and their sister Joanne. They've been great companions. We stay up late every night laughing and telling stories around the campfire. It might be good to find someone new to travel with so I get some sleep for a change!
I'm determined to have a jacket made out of the hides of the geckos that killed Big George. I've been carrying the gecko hides around with me since Big George was killed. The trader that told me it could be done gave me the name of the woman who can do it and told me she's here somewhere. I'm going to find her no matter how long it takes. I'm going to wear a jacket made from those hides. Poor Big George deserves to be remembered. Stupid geckos.
:( I sure do miss him.
It's funny, but I never really liked gecko meat before, but since Big George died, I'm suddenly very fond of it and hunt them whenever I can. Maybe it's the sense of revenge I get every time I chew one of them into little bits.
Hmm. That sounds pretty savage. But dammit, they killed my dog!
You and Willow are now friends...

You've helped Willow recover her stolen items and she is very grateful. She now considers you a friend. To help you on your way to becoming BFFs and beyond here is a list of the gifts you can give to Willow that are guaranteed to make her happy. A dialogue topic will appear when you have one or more of these items in your inventory.
Teddy Bear, Intact Garden Gnome, Nuka Cola Quartz, Fancy Lad Snack Cakes, Bubblegum, Gumdrops and Junk Food.
You can give no more than one present a day.
Willow's Journal Chester

Chester
We found Chester today. I'm so happy.
I'm starting to like &PCName; more and more all the time. I wonder if we'll ever be more than friends? I think about it a lot.
I had a pretty good day today, found a couple of little things and some caps. I don't do nearly as much scavenging as I'd like, since I'm sticking close to &PCName; but I manage to pick up some stuff. As always, my watch obsession keeps me looking for them tucked in the pockets of clothes I find. I'm hoping I'll be lucky enough to find dynamite or gun powder or maybe even some more pencils wherever we end up going.
ESP.TRADUIT:
Chester
Hoy encontramos a Chester. Estoy muy contenta.
Empieza a gustarme &PCName; cada vez más. ¿Me pregunto si alguna vez seremos más que amigos? Pienso mucho en ello.
Ha sido un buen día, he encontrado un par de cosas y unas chapas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Novac

Novac
We went into a place called Novac today. There's a statue there that is completely amazing! It's so big there's a gift shop inside and snipers guard the town from inside its mouth! It sits at the edge of the courtyard to the motel in town. I loved everything about the motel. It reminded me so much of home, but instead of just a sign there's a magnificent, friendly statue that says hi to you whenever you come near.
Willow's Journal CassCaravanSite

Cass Caravan Site
We found Cass' caravan site today. The caravan had been totally destroyed. She was very upset. I felt bad for her.
Willow's Journal Mojave Outpost 2

Mojave Outpost Day 2
I spent most of today talking to people finding out everything I could about the Mojave and New Vegas. I got some good information. I don't know why I did it, but I asked about Bethie. No one I talked to has seen her. I knew it was pointless to ask, but I couldn't help myself. I was happy to see the NCR folks here; they made me feel welcome, although they don't seem overly happy to be here in the Mojave. There was a lot of legion talk, too. I don't like showing up here when war's so close to breaking out, but it's a problem I'm not going to worry about until I have to or until I see a legion guy coming at me. That's a scary thought. But that's why I've got Beauty! Oh, and last night I was having a drink and got into a fight! I haven't been in a fight in months. She was drunk and mean and she called me stupid and naive! Stupid and naive! I've been on the road for nearly two years, that stupid red-haired brahmin! We were both so angry I think it would have come to blows, but a Ranger came over and told us to calm down or he'd dump a bucket of water on us. A bucket of water! I felt like a seven year old. It was so embarrassing. I haven't lost my temper like that in a long, long time. But, oh, she made me so mad!!
Willow's Journal Mojave Outpost 2

Mojave Outpost Day 2
I spent most of today talking to people finding out everything I could about the Mojave and New Vegas. I got some good information. I don't know why I did it, but I asked about Bethie. No one I talked to has seen her. I knew it was pointless to ask, but I couldn't help myself. I was happy to see the NCR folks here; they made me feel welcome, although they don't seem overly happy to be here in the Mojave. There was a lot of legion talk, too. I don't like showing up here when war's so close to breaking out, but it's a problem I'm not going to worry about until I have to or until I see a legion guy coming at me. That's a scary thought. But that's why I've got Beauty!
Willow's Journal Mormon Fort

Mormon Fort
We went to the Old Mormon Fort today and I saw a man that looks just like Val!! His name is Arcade and he's even a doctor. It's so weird. They even wear the same kind of glasses. I ran over to talk to him when I saw him, but he wouldn't say much. I don't know if I scared him or if he thought I was crazy because I was trying to talk to him even though I don't know him, but it was kind of funny the way he wouldn't say much to me. I miss Val. I'd love to hear his voice and talk to him. The Fort is in Freeside. Freeside is right outside The Strip, with rats running around on the street. And The Strip, with all the money, is just behind a gate; not too different than some other places I've seen. Oh, and The Fort is very, very old. It reminded me of The Lion, The Witch and the Wardrobe and fortresses and castles and towers. But, too bad, there are no princesses or magic here.
Willow's Journal J.T.
J.T. is dead. I'm so sad. He was a very good dog. I'll miss him very much. Poor puppy. I love you, J.T., wherever you are.
Willow's Journal Raul

Raul
Raul has been telling us his stories and they are all so tragic. It's no wonder he's so sad all the time. I wish there was more we could do for him. What he really needs is a woman. Now!
Willow's Journal Boomtown

Boomtown!
We were in Boomtown today. What a place. It's gigantic. There's a plane there, which are things that are kind of like trains but they flew in the air like birds. They must have been so beautiful flying with those giant wings flapping in the sky. Oh! Better than that, we met Pearl, who's this very, very old lady. She seems very nice, but she reminded me of Madame Zelda. I kept expecting her to invite us to sit down so she could tell us our fortunes! I had to fight hard not to giggle at her and ask her when she did palm readings. Madame Zelda would only do them during the week of the full moon. Bethie and I always made sure to go get our palms read. It was so fun. When she died we stole her crystal ball from her trailer. I hope it's still in my room. oh! I hope mom hasn't cleaned my room! I bet she has. Grr! I'll get home someday and she'll have dumped half of my stuff!!!
Willow's Journal Westside

Westside
We went into Westside today to do some shopping. I heard that the man who runs the liquor store there is named Klamath Bob! He's from Klamath too! Small world, huh? It seems very poor, like most places I've seen, but the people seem happy enough, although they are worried about the fiends, who have territory nearby. There's this giant supermutant there named Mean Sonofabitch. He's so sweet, but very hard to understand, and a place called the Casa Madrid Apartments where there are some prostitutes. I was a little anxious to see what &PCName; would do about them
Willow's Journal Westside

Westside
We went into Westside today to do some shopping. I heard that the man who runs the liquor store there is named Klamath Bob! He's from Klamath too! Small world, huh? It seems very poor, like most places I've seen, but the people seem happy enough, although they are worried about the fiends, who have territory nearby. There's this giant supermutant there named Mean Sonofabitch. He's so sweet, but very hard to understand, and a place called the Casa Madrid Apartments where there are some prostitutes.
Willow's Journal Nelson

Nelson
We went into Nelson today and killed the main legion guy there. I have no idea what they call themselves; by rank I mean. And, honestly, I couldn't care less. They all wear red and should be shot as far as I'm concerned. So we did that and Novac should be a lot safer which makes me very, very happy. That sounds cruel, I know, but the legion is cruel, and evil. Hmm, two wrongs probably don't make a right, so I shouldn't gloat that real people, people that may have real families are dead, but the people of the Mojave deserve to be protected from Caesar. Later... Okay, I can't stop thinking about how the guys in the legion may have family too. Family like me, you know? Sisters. And now I feel terrible. War is a horrible thing. I did not want to get involved in this, you know? I just wanted to go to New Vegas!! Although, legion sisters are going to be treated like slaves...Ugh. I hate this. I'm not going to think about that. The legion is evil. I'll focus on that.
Willow's Journal Nipton

Nipton
I saw Nipton today. Nipton's been destroyed by the legion. Well, the buildings are fine, but all of the people are gone.
I'd always heard the legion were evil, cruel, etc. But hearing it and seeing it are two different things.
What they did to Nipton is unforgivable. There were crosses in town with people on them and fires and those that weren't killed were sent to be slaves. There must have been kids there too...whole families.
I don't think I'm making sense. I'm too upset to write much. If I didn't hate them before I hate them now.
Willow's Journal Tabitha

Tabitha
So there is this crazy radio station on the air run by a Nightkin named, Tabitha. Today we went up the Mountain where her radio station is located. It took us awhile to reach the top of the mountain because of all the obstacles in the way. Besides being attacked by supermutants and Nightkin along the way, there were also rockslides!! to avoid. And the Nightkin! They are so impressive the way they go invisible on you. Who wouldn't want to be that powerful in combat?
When we reached the top there was a lot of radiation and a couple of big craters where bombs must have hit during the Great War. Beyond the craters are the group of buildings and towers that Tabitha calls Utobitha.
Tabitha was inside the radio station wearing a crazy wig and a pair of red heart-shaped glasses! She went crazy (crazier?) and fought and died. I feel sorry for her. The Nightkin are so tortured, poor things.
Willow's Journal Tabitha

Tabitha So there is this crazy radio station on the air run by a Nightkin named, Tabitha. Today we went up the Mountain where her radio station is located. It took us awhile to reach the top of the mountain because of all the obstacles in the way. Besides being attacked by supermutants and Nightkin along the way, there were also rockslides!! to avoid. And the Nightkin! They are so impressive the way they go invisible on you. Who wouldn't want to be that powerful in combat?
When we reached the top there was a lot of radiation and a couple of big craters where bombs must have hit during the Great War Beyond the craters are the group of buildings and towers that Tabitha calls Utobitha.
&PCName; fixed Rhonda and took it back to Tabitha. So, that was a happy ending for Tabitha, I guess, as happy endings go, although she'll still be crazy, since she's a Nightkin. Oh, and Tabitha was wearing a crazy wig and a pair of red heart-shaped glasses!
Willow's Journal Boomtown2

Jack
We've been doing stuff for the Boomers so they'll like us and we've been doing a LOT of walking around Boomtown. It's so big!!! So, we helped Jack, he's this guy who watches girls through binoculars. He fell in love with a girl at the Crimson Caravan (he saw her through his binoculars) and wanted help getting together with her. So &PCName; went to Crimson Caravan and talked to the girl and now she's gone to Boomtown to be with Jack! It was very romantic (although a lot of work for &PCName; to pull together). Every time I see that little building Pearl lives in I want to go ask her for a palm reading or to have her tell my fortune. I bet she'd be really good at it. Ha!
Willow's Journal Boone

Boone
So now that &PCName; and I are staying friends forever, and our relationship isn't going any further, I wonder if it will be a problem that I like Boone? I don't think Boone will ever notice me, but he's such a good man. What he did for Carla was so brave and noble and he's so skilled with his weapon (heh) and that voice! Wow, so incredibly sexy. I guess I'll just keep being nice to him and see what happens...
Willow's Cover Page

This journal belongs to:
Willow Coleen Andersen
It was given to me by my mom for my 17th birthday on, May 13, 2279 to take on my trip to New Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT:
Este diario es propiedad de:
Willow Coleen Andersen
Me lo regaló mi madre en mi 17 cumpleaños el 13 de mayo del 2279, para llevármelo en mi viaje por New Vegas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow's Journal Star Bottle Caps

Legend of the Star Bottle Cap treasure...
I wonder if the legend of the Star Bottle Cap treasure is true? And if it is, how much treasure is there and where it might be? Would it be caps or would it be other things? Is it buried and is there a map somewhere that you can find? I wonder if it did exist once upon a time, but someone already found it and it's long gone now.
It would be a scavenger's and adventurer's dream come true to find something like that! Much better treasure than the stuff I've found before, like those dog toys from before the war that still squeak or my bottle of Nuka Cola quantum or even my necklace, which, no matter how much I love it, isn't real treasure!
You and Willow are now BFFs...

Congratulations! You and Willow are Best Friends Forever! She will never leave you unless you fire her. She is completely loyal and devoted to you.
In addition to that, several benefits of being friends will now be unlocked which you will discover in dialogue with her.
Plus there's more to come if you continue to gain points with her.
Have fun!
Willow's Journal Boomtown3

Cass
We've been doing stuff for the Boomers and when we're there Cass is so crabby about them. Sure, at first they were cautious, and yes, they have heavy artillery that they shoot at outsiders, but they aren't that bad once you're inside. It's not like they're just waiting for us to let down our guard so they can attack; they're good people.
All she wants to do is drink and complain about stuff. She knows a lot of stuff and that's useful. I have to give her that. And she seems to like &PCName; even though she's kind of crabby about that too.
I don't see how the two of us will ever get along, we are just so different.
Nuka-Star Coffee Ingredients List

&PCName;-
I did the math and this is what I need to make as much Nuka-Star coffee as I would love to have for a month.
4 Broc Flowers 4 Xander Roots 4 Pinyon Nuts 4 Purified Waters 4 Sunset Sarsaparilla 4 Nuka-Colas 12 Bottle Caps (no, not Star Bottle Caps even though my mom named it Nuka-Star Coffee) 12 Empty Nuka Cola Bottles (they have to be Nuka Cola Bottles)
-Willow
Willow's Journal Dream Big George

Bad dreams, bad sleep...
I've been having trouble sleeping lately. I keep dreaming about the day Big George died only instead of Big George I'm the one that falls off the edge of the trail and breaks my leg and maybe my arms too. I'm not sure, I lay there and I can't move my body at all. I can look around and it's very dark, which is weird, because the accident with Big George happened during the day, but it's night and I can hear something coming for me and I think it's the geckos. I'm scared because I can't move and I keep trying to get to Beauty. I can see it lying just out of reach on the ground and I'm getting more and more frantic and the approaching sounds get louder and louder and as I start to yell in frustration and fear I wake up. It's a little different every time (sometimes whatever it is that's coming almost gets close enough that I can see it and sometimes I wake up while I'm still trying to get to Beauty), but I've had it three or four times now and each time I wake up with my heart pounding and I'm so scared it takes me a long, long time to get back to sleep. I'm afraid it's not geckos coming for me, but maybe deathclaws...if they reach me before I wake up one night, I'm worried I'll wake up screaming and crying out loud.
Love Note
Willow's Journal The Boneyard

The Boneyard
Mina, Jonathan and I split up yesterday. We've been on the road together for about a week. I wasn't sorry to see them go. Mina was starting to get jealous of the way Jonathan was being nice to me. He wasn't interested in me that way, but there was no telling her that. He only had eyes for her. She's going to lose him if she doesn't stop acting like such a jealous bitch all the time.
I started asking around for someone else to travel with and I've already found someone going my way. I wish I had a big dog with me. I sure miss Big George. I'd have felt comfortable heading out towards Nevada on my own and picking up someone on the way with him along, but I don't really want to do that all alone.
Anyway, this guy I've met and I are planning to leave tomorrow morning. We're going to make a market run to buy some things on the way out of town. He wants to get some new gear and I could use a new pack. I've done really well on the road so far so maybe I'll splurge and get something that looks really nice with my Gecko jacket - stupid geckos :(
Willow's Journal Present

Present
I gave &PCName; a present today. I just couldn't help myself anymore and had to do something. I have such a crush. I'm just bursting. I may start flirting soon to get things moving...I'm ready for more...a lot more. Although, the timing has to be right, and the setting, and, oh, most of all I want it to be hot and steamy.
Willow's Journal Present

Present
I gave &PCName; a present today. I've been looking for just the right thing for awhile. I've never been so happy with a travel companion. I have fun every day and traveling is the adventure it should be. I love it.
Willow's Reading her Magazine Now
Willow is reading her magazine. When she is done with it her Unarmed skill will be raised by 4 points.
Willow's Reading her Skillbook Now
Willow is reading her skillbook. When she is done with it her Unarmed skill will be raised by 5 points.
Dear &PCName;,

My love,
I've thought about this a lot and have come to a decision you might not like, but I have to leave. I won't be able to live with myself if I fight with you to support Caesar.
As much as I love you, it cannot overcome how much I hate that man and what he stands for and what he does.
Please, please forgive me.
I'll be waiting for you so come pick me up after, okay? Stay safe.
Love, Willow
Dear &PCName;,

I've thought about this a lot and have come to a decision you might not like, but I have to leave. I won't be able to live with myself if I fight with you to support Caesar.
As much as I love you, it cannot overcome how much I hate that man and what he stands for and what he does.
Please, please forgive me.
I'll be waiting for you so come pick me up after, okay? Stay safe.
Love, Willow
Willow's Journal &PCName; Dream

Weird dream!
I just had the craziest dream! It was like I was living another life completely, but &PCName; was in it.
So the dream starts with us meeting, and we met the same way we met in real life. &PCName; finds me and helps me and then we go look for my stuff and do whatever we do together. It's very much like things have been in real life, except that &PCName; seems to be an entirely different person.
So neat, except that it was also so weird. But that's not the weirdest part. After I was dreaming for awhile, It started over again.
I met &PCName; again, as another person, with another name in the same place we met the first time.
I woke up so happy. What a great idea, living many lives over and over again with the same person I like so much.
Willow's Journal Dex's Dogtags

Dex's Dogtags
I've been thinking a lot about Dex lately. I don't know if I should tell &PCName; about him or not. When I've talked about it before it didn't turn out so well and I don't really want that to happen again.
The thing is Dex was in the NCR and then what he did to me, trying to rape me, that sounds bad, but what I did is so much worse. Or maybe it wasn't, because he said he'd kill me so I did it to save myself. I hate to think about it anymore. I've spent so much time thinking about it. I like to think that I did the right think saving myself. And it wasn't my fault he was an NCR trooper and not an evil Raider that everyone expects to be out in the world looking for women to rape.
And that NCR captain was so mean about it (how did you manage to kill a trooper if you didn't plan it ahead of time? (I always carry a weapon with me that's why) what were you doing out there alone with a man, anyway, if you didn't want to get raped? (what? is that a serious question?) Is that what you were wearing? Isn't that what whore's wear? (I'm wearing regular clothes, no I'm not a whore, you asshole!)). He made me so angry. Blaming me because I was acting like a normal girl on a date with a (huh!) respectable NCR trooper at a NCR outpost.
Thank goodness, though, that after he was so awful he decided to believe me (turned out Dex had been in trouble about girls before). I learned a lot about the NCR and life during that week, didn't I? Yes, yes, I did.
I don't know why I keep Dex's dogtags. Maybe it's time to get rid of the damn things so I can just forget about it.
Willow's Journal Mojave Outpost 1

Mojave Outpost
The Big Guy and I only just got into the Mojave Outpost a couple of hours ago. We split up right away. I'm kind of sad to see him go. He wasn't much fun (hardly any talking! and he didn't ever tell me his name!), but he was a great comfort to have along. I felt very safe with him around and it was nice to be with J.T. I didn't miss Big George so much.
I've been on the road for almost two years now and still haven't found a great friend to bring along with me on my travels or someone to fall in love with and maybe even settle down with in a cozy home somewhere. I don't think I'm ready to stop having adventures yet, but I do long to have someone special in my life and wouldn't mind having a place to call my own again.
Anyway, enough of that! I have practical things to worry about, like who to travel with next and where to go (New Vegas!!). I'll do that in the morning after I get a good night's sleep. I can hardly keep my eyes open.
Willow's Journal First Night

First Night
I'm so excited. Big George and I are laying out under the stars together on my Bedroll. I cooked our first meal on the campfire tonight (Big George had dog treats and some Brahmin Meat the traders shared with him) and I tried to make mom's famous coffee over the campfire. It was a disaster. It's hard enough to make at home on the stove, but tonight it tastes horrible! I'm going to have to practice a lot to make it taste good. I assumed cooking on the campfire wouldn't be that different from cooking at home. Boy, was I wrong!
We're traveling with a caravan that we know from the Motel. I'm not sure exactly where we are tonight but we're headed south from Klamath towards San Francisco. I plan to stop at many places along the way and maybe spend months at a time in some of them. This isn't going to be a fast trip. I may spend years away from home.
This is the exciting beginning to a very exciting adventure!
Willow's Journal Cass Hired

Cass
Oh, no! &PCName; asked Cass to come with us! I've never told &PCName; about the fight she and I got into at the MO that night. I don't think Cass remembers me (she was so drunk) because I'm sure she'd be saying something to me if she did, but she's ignoring me, or maybe she's ignoring me because she remembers. I don't know, but I don't want to talk to her after what happened so it suits me that she has nothing to say to me.
Willow's Journal Dream

Bad dream...
I had a horrible, horrible dream last night.
I'm at home in Klamath at our motel, in the courtyard looking toward the main lobby. It's weird though, I seem to be high off the ground, because what I'm looking at is the spot on the wall where the roof meets the building.
While I'm there looking toward the lobby my mom and dad exit the door and come and stand right in front of me. Their heads reach only as high as my feet and they look up at me. They are shouting something, but I can't hear them, and they look angry which makes me very sad and I start to cry.
While I'm looking down at them I see that my legs have rope around them and I turn my head to look at each of my arms and they are tied as well. I'm hanging, crucified to a cross like the ones Caesar hangs people on.
I cry even harder when I realize what's happened to me. I ask my parents why they've done this to me. They shout more and I still cannot hear what they say. They throw things at me (I don't know what they are, but they are little and hurt where they hit me) and they laugh and mock me. I beg them to stop and am crying.
Then I woke up. My heart was pounding and I was still crying. Ugh. It was bad.
Mailbox Gift Note

Enjoy your present!
Love,
Willow
ESP.TRADUIT:
¡Disfruta de tu regalo!
Con cariño,
Willow

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mailbox Gift Note

I hope you like this one!
Love,
Willow

Set AWillow4c.V22chatter to (AWillow4c.V22chatter + 1)

Set AWillow4c.V22chatter to (AWillow4c.V22chatter + 1)
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1

Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
I am so glad you're with me. I'd hate to be in here alone.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
I am so glad you're with me. I'd hate to be in here alone.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
I hate vaults. They are so creepy.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
Of all the places you've taken me, this, well, not my favorite.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
This place seems kind of cruel if you ask me. Well, I'll make an exception for geckos and Deathclaws.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
How could any woman run a place like this? It's so barbaric?
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
Have you noticed Lucy's voice? It's so deep. I wonder if maybe she's really a boy dressed as a girl? That'd be a big surprise for someone, huh?
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1 Set AWillow4a.DoOnce16 to 1
How old do you think Lucy is? Doesn't she seem old to you? She seems old to me.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1 Set AWillow4c.DoOnce1 to 1
Lucy's hair is a funny color. It doesn't look real to me. I wonder if she puts color on it somehow. I bet she has gray hair because she's so old.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1 Set AWillow4a.DoOnce5 to 1
I will be so happy when we're done running these errands for Lucy.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1 Set AWillow4c.DoOnce5 to 1
Deathclaw eggs! She doesn't want much, does she?
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1 Set AWillow4c.DoOnce2 to 1
I used to hate ferals until one day I found one with a teddy bear. Now I feel sorry for them. Although, I still hate to get into a fight with them.
There are a lot of dead ghouls in here. Hey, you don't think the ferals killed them, do you?
This place hasn't been totally picked over. There's still some good stuff left to take out of here.
I hope our mystery man turns out to be worth all of this.
*nervous humming*
That Haversham is crazy. Who'd want to be a ghoul?
That Haversham is crazy. Who'd want to be a ghoul? Ah! Oh, Raul, I'm so sorry!
Bright is nuts too. It's like we've stumbled into crazy town and he's the mayor.
Remember those guys that took my stuff? This is the place Stan talked about in his note.
Maybe it's just me, but don't you want to walk right up to the Nightkin and stare right at them to see what they'll do?
I hope Dr. Henry can fix Rex.
Dr. Henry is an interesting guy, isn't he?
Do you ever wonder what it was like to come to a place like this before The Great War?
Invisible Nightstalkers. I wonder if that could ever happen to a human?
I've got nothing against the girls. But I think, if someone has a girl of their own, they don't belong with a prostitute.
I like these guys.
This is not a gift shop.
Worst gift shop ever.
Hmpf. Who does she think she's impressing with this place? I'm not impressed. You're not, are you?
Hmpf.
I always imagined a vault would be a terrible place to live. You know, cuz deserted vaults are so creepy.
It's really nice in here. Way better than I'd imagined a vault could be.
This place is enormous.
I know I shouldn't scavenge here, but I'm not promising anything. If I see something good I might have to sneak it out with me.
It's great to be among NCR folks again. I feel right at home.
This is a twitchy bunch. I don't trust them.
If WillowREF.WeaponOut == 0 WillowREF.SetAlert 1 Set WillowREF.WeaponOutCuzStuff to 1 endif
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
Looks like everyone of these guys uses chems. Look at their eyes, their really messed up.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
Fiends, ugh. I thought they smelled bad outside.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
I don't like vaults. Even when they're crowded like this one.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
I've got nothing against the girls. But I think, if someone has a girl of their own, they don't belong with a prostitute.
I've got nothing against the girls. But I think, if someone has a girl of their own, they don't belong with a prostitute.
So this is home, huh? I can see why you like to get out.
I can't believe you stuck one of us in that freezer. That was heartless. I hope I don't have to worry about what you'll do to me.
Set AWillow4c.FreezerCompanion to 1
I wonder what happened here. They must have set up all these traps for a reason.
Robots, traps...I wonder what else we'll find in here? Ooh! Maybe we'll find a safe filled with some really great loot!
This is quite a show, isn't it?
Ever heard of toilet wine? Inmates make it. I wonder if anyone makes it here?
I hope you think it's okay to scavenge for stuff in a prison. Don't give me away if I grab something, okay?
I can't wait to see what we'll find. Do you think it's the treasure?

I wonder what it will be? Something really exciting I'm sure. Why else would it have been hidden for so long?
Set AWillow4a.BrahminComment to ( AWillow4a.BrahminComment + 1)
You know what this place needs? More Sunset Sarsaparilla lamps.
The robot, game thing? He gives me the creeps.
They were thorough. It sure looks like everyone's been wiped out.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
Should we be searching for survivors? Maybe somebody managed to hide somewhere.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
We haven't seen any kids. Do you think they took them?
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
You know, I don't think I'll ever forget this place.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
Eh, poor guy.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
Did you see the car over there on display? It's on display because it has bullet holes in it. My hat has bullet holes in it.
I'm in love with that cowboy robot.
Oof. It's cold in here.
Oof. It's cold in here.
I'll take a cave over a vault any day. Caves usually have critters, which are not creepy. Vaults...creepy.
I'll take a cave over a vault any day. Caves usually have critters, which are not creepy. Vaults...creepy.
Lakelurks! That sound they make is incredible. Does it vibrate through your whole head, too?

WillowREF.MoveToMarkerWithFade WillowsHouseMarkerREF set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1.GuardAlert to 0 Set AWillow1.SleepOnBedroll to 0 Set AWillow1.GoHome to 1; used to control JT follow Set AWillow1.Relaxin to 1 WillowREF.evp Set WillowREF.Waiting to 1 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowGoneHOME
No offense, but you don't seem injured and you still have your gear. Is this some kind of scam?
I used all my medical supplies on my leg. That's why I'm moving around so well, but it's still sore.
And it's impossible for me to prove I've been robbed. You'll just have to believe me. I am telling the truth.
Oh, wait. I found this. They dropped it. The thieves dropped it.
Player.AddItem WillowsMeetQuestNote 1
Maybe you should have stayed put. Sounds like things didn't work out like you planned.
No. I didn't plan to lose my favorite rifle, run out of ammo and get injured. I have never been this unlucky on the road before.
I suppose you'd like me to help you fix your problem? Give you a weapon and ammo or caps maybe?
No, I don't need caps, but my pistol is currently useless to me. So, I do need ammo or a different weapon to go after them.
Don't look at me. I have my own problems to handle. It was nice meeting you, but I'm leaving now.
Wait! I have a pistol, but no ammo and I'm still injured.
Is there something I can do to help you out of this situation?
Yes! Look at this. One of them dropped it. I think they'll be going to one of these places. I want to start looking for them at the closest one.
However, I have a problem. I have a pistol, but no ammo. That's gone too.
Player.AddItem WillowsMeetQuestNote 1
Are you thinking of chasing these guys down alone?
I'd rather not do it alone, but I will. I want my stuff back.
I'm not going to GIVE you anything. But maybe we could work out a deal if you want my help.
I have no caps to pay you, so how about this? After we get my stuff back I'll travel with you for awhile.
I'm a great shot. I started hunting with my Dad was I was a little kid. Plus, I'm a lot of fun to have around.
Sorry. I'm out of here.
Please. I need to go after my stuff. Maybe I could trade you something for your help.
Have you been traveling for a long time?
Nearly two years. Usually I talk my way out of any problems, but these guys jumped me from behind. I didn't get the chance.
Maybe I can help you get your rifle back...for a price.
I have no caps to pay you, so how about this? After we get my stuff back I travel with you for a while.
You're in a really tough spot. What can I do to help you out of this?
I want to go after the guys who took my stuff. They dropped this. Will you come with me? Maybe give me some ammo or a different weapon?
Player.AddItem WillowsMeetQuestNote 1
So you want me to supply you for this little adventure and come with you?
I'd love it if you came with. As for ammo I'll say this: I'm crap with a knife and I'm only a little better with my fists. So, it's up to you.
But I'm willing to earn what you give me. I'll travel with you for awhile if you like. I'm a great shot and I'm great company. What do you say?
Set AWillowMeetQuest.DoesntOfferUnconditionalTravel to 1
No, I didn't see anyone. Are you alright?
No, I'm not alright. They took my favorite rifle and some other stuff. I do have a pistol with me, but I've got no ammo for it and my leg is hurt.
AWillowDWillowTopic000
Hey, did you see a couple of guys on the road just now? They robbed me! Bastards.
WillowREF.EquipItem WillowsOutfitUPVegasGirl 1 SetEssential Willow 1 Set AWillowMeetQuest.FirstGreet to 2
Alright. That sounds good. Let's get the equipment all sorted out and then we can leave.
Okay, and thank you so much. My name's Willow, by the way. It's nice to meet you. But, please do hurry. I'm anxious to get going.
Set AWillowMeetQuest.FirstGreet to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WaitNotHired to 1 WillowREF.evp Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowWaitingtoLeave to 1
Set AWillowMeetQuest.AskAboutPlayer to 1
How about this? You sleep with me and then I'll do whatever you need to get your stuff back?
How about this? No and goodbye.

Okay. Sleep with me and I'll help you.
No. I'll go back to the Mojave Outpost and find someone there. I wanted to do this right now and not waste all that time. But, no and goodbye.

PlaySound WillowPlayerBad Set AWillowMeetQuest.FirstGreet to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowTravelMO to 1 WillowREF.MoveToMarkerWithFade CassHomeMarkerREF ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowLEFTmojaveoutpost
If you agree to travel with me for awhile I'll help you out. I could use the company on the road.
Travel with you? Okay, after we get my rifle back, I agree to travel with you for awhile.
You're telling me the truth aren't you? Okay, I'll help you. But I want something in return.
I have no caps to pay you. So how about this? After we get my stuff back I'll travel with you for awhile.
I'm a great shot. I started hunting with my Dad was I was a little kid. Plus, I'm a lot of fun to have around.
You sound awfully confident. What if we don't find your stuff? How will you repay me?
What if I agree to travel with you for awhile whether we find my rifle or not. I'm a great shot and I'm a lot of fun to have around.
You need me to supply you in order to follow these guys? Do you also want me to come with you?
Yes! I would be so grateful. Maybe I could repay you some way. I don't have caps, but would you be interested in some company on the road?
I'd be willing to travel with you for awhile, take night watch, kill critters, stuff like that. I'm fun to have around. What do you say?
Set AWillowMeetQuest.DoesntOfferUnconditionalTravel to 1
Okay, I'll do it. Let's get ready to go.
I'm Willow, by the way. It's nice to meet you. And thank you so much. This means the world to me.
Set AWillowMeetQuest.FirstGreet to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WaitNotHired to 1 WillowREF.evp Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowWaitingtoLeave to 1
Set AWillowMeetQuest.AskAboutPlayer to 1
I'll agree to that. But what if we don't find your stuff? Then what?
I don't want to consider that possibility. But I'll travel with you for awhile whether we find my stuff or not. That seems fair.
Okay, I'll agree to that. Let's get organized and then we'll get going.
Thank you so much. My name's Willow, by the way. It's nice to meet you. And, can we hurry? I'm anxious to get going.
And here. You should see this. They dropped it. I'm guessing it's where they're headed. I want to start looking at the closest location.
Set AWillowMeetQuest.FirstGreet to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WaitNotHired to 1 WillowREF.evp Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowWaitingtoLeave to 1
Set AWillowMeetQuest.AskAboutPlayer to 1 Player.AddItem WillowsMeetQuestNote 1
What if we don't find your stuff? I want your word that you will travel with me either way.
I don't want to think about that possiblity. But, alright, yes, you have my word. I'll travel with you either way.
I want your word that you will travel with me whether we find your rifle or not.
I don't even want to think about that possibility, but, yes, I agree to travel with you whether we find my rifle or not.
Let's get going.
Great! Listen! I want to tell you exactly what I lost so you'll know what to look for, okay?
You know about my rifle, Beauty. That's what I call her. And there are two other things. Chester, a teddy bear I've had forever, and Moira, a doll.
I hope we find the toys. I'm embarrassed to admit this and know it sounds stupid, but I do love them.

You're angry. I'm sorry. Can we start over?
Yeah, I am angry. You were an ass. But since you've apologized and you seem sincere enough, sure we can start over.
So, here's the deal. I found this. I've lost a bunch of stuff, including my favorite rifle and I want to chase down these guys and get it back.
I need ammo, if you have it, for the pistol I'm carrying and backup if you're interested. So, what do you say? Oh, and my name's Willow, by the way.
Player.AddItem WillowsMeetQuestNote 1
I'll do it...if you sleep with me. <huge laugh> I'm just kidding. Let's go get your stuff back.
Seriously? And you don't want anything in return from me?
No, I don't want anything from you. I feel really bad about what I said to you.
Thank you. That's very sweet of you. I appreciate it very much. I'd love to leave as soon as possible.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerisAss to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowTravelMO to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowChillMO to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WaitNotHired to 1 WillowREF.evp
I won't lie. I think you're very attractive. But I don't want anything from you for this.
Oh, thank you. Your not so bad yourself. Do you think we could leave as soon as possible?
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerisAss to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowTravelMO to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowChillMO to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WaitNotHired to 1 WillowREF.evp
I do want something from you. But not as payment. Let's just see how things go.
Oh, well, uh, alright. We'll just see how things go, then. Can we leave as soon as possible? I'm anxious to get my stuff.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerisAss to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowTravelMO to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowChillMO to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WaitNotHired to 1 WillowREF.evp
Okay. I'll help you. Let's go get your stuff. And don't worry about paying me back.
Why are you being so generous? This is a lot to do for someone you don't know for nothing in return. Not that I'm not grateful.
I acted like an ass earlier. I'd like to make that up to you.
Thank you. I appreciate that very much. Can we leave soon? I'm anxious to get going.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerisAss to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowTravelMO to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowChillMO to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WaitNotHired to 1 WillowREF.evp
I like you and I'd like to spend more time with you. Even if it does involve chasing criminals.
Well, thank you, you're not so bad yourself. Can we start chasing those criminals soon? I'd really like to get outta here.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerisAss to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowTravelMO to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowChillMO to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WaitNotHired to 1 WillowREF.evp
I do want something from you, but not as payment for anything. We'll just have to see how things go.
Thanks for helping me, but, yeah, we'll just have to see what happens. And do you think we could leave soon? I'm anxious to get out of here.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerisAss to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowTravelMO to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowChillMO to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WaitNotHired to 1 WillowREF.evp
Would you stay here and wait for me? I'll be back for you later.
Alright, if that's what you want. But don't leave me here long, okay?
Set AWillowMeetQuest.FollowNotHired to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WaitNotHired to 1 WillowREF.evp
Can I look at what you're carrying right now?
Um, sure.

Let's go.
Yeah, let's go.

Wow, Sarah is bad at sex! She's as bad at sex as she is with giftshops.
Set AWillow4b.ThreesomeSarah to 2
I'm sure Caesar is going to be very proud of you for killing Kimball. I hope he rewards you well. Better than when you saved his life.

Set AWillow4a.KimballDeadGreeting to 1
I will be so happy when we're done running these errands for Lucy.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1 Set AWillow4c.DoOnce5 to 1
Deathclaw eggs! She doesn't want much, does she?
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1 Set AWillow4c.DoOnce2 to 1
Exploding ants aren't as much fun as I thought they'd be.
Set AWillow4a.SlodingAnts to 0
So, you're passing bad Intel to the NCR from the legion? Hmpf.
Set AWillow4a.LegionSpyGrt to 1 Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1

Set AWillow4a.KimballDeadGreeting to 1
Lucy's hair is a funny color. It doesn't look real to me. I wonder if she puts color on it somehow. I bet she has gray hair because she's so old.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1 Set AWillow4a.DoOnce5 to 1
How old do you think Lucy is? Doesn't she seem old to you? She seems old to me.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1 Set AWillow4c.DoOnce1 to 1
Have you noticed Lucy's voice? It's so deep. I wonder if maybe she's really a boy dressed as a girl? That'd be a big surprise for someone, huh?
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1 Set AWillow4a.DoOnce16 to 1
The Nightkin are amazing when they sneak, aren't they?
You know, sometimes I really miss Boone.
Ears for the guy at Camp Forlorn Hope. Heads for the guy at McCarran. The NCR is more bloodthirsty that I thought!
I can't believe we're getting ears for that guy at Camp Forlorn Hope. It's disgusting. I don't want to carry 'em, you know.
It's so cool up here. It's a nice break from the heat.
Maybe after I've seen the Mojave I'll go back to Novac to live. Wouldn't it be fun to stay in one of those little bungalows at the motel?
A guy at the Mojave Outpost told me there's some horrible nest of Deathclaws near a place called Sloan. We're not going there are we?
I wonder if those ants at Boomtown really explode. If it's true, that'd be worth seeing, don't you think?
Raising that plane off the bottom of the lake was one of the neatest things I've ever seen. Whoosh!
Set AWillow4a.NellisPlane to 2
It's too bad the Fiends are such assholes. I like those scary helmets they wear. I'd love to wear one.
Why don't you do right, like some other men do. Get out of here, give me some money too.
