I'm famished. Do you think we could stop for a campfire and a proper meal?
Set AWillow1.LetsSnack to 1
Yawn, I sure could go for some coffee.
Set AWillow4c.WantsCoffee to 1
I'm sleepy. Are we going to stay out all night?
ESP.TRADUIT: Tengo sueño. ¿Vamos a estar fuera toda la noche?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you're carrying dogmeat on you. I sure hope you don't expect me to cook that for you. Eww, or watch you eat it.
Hey, if we run into any geckos I could use some meat. For cooking.
If AWillowFreeform.PLten && AWillow4a.GeckoSlayerChallengeUnlocked == 0 Set AWillow4a.GeckoSlayerChallengeUnlocked to 1 endif
I hate being stung by those stupid things. It ruins my whole day.
Set AWillow1i.Stung to 0
Did you hear that? Huh. Maybe I imagined it.
Do you smell that? Ugh, it's awful!
Have I told you about the time that...wait do you hear that?
I'm getting soaked back here! Were you thinking maybe we'd take a break inside, somewhere? Sometime? While it's raining, maybe?
I sure miss Big George sometimes. He was such a great dog.
Did you see that? I have never seen two of anything doing that before. Wow.
Ow! Dammit!
Oof. It's hot.
You know I want to learn to box, right? Well, I have 4 older brothers who used to beat me up as a kid. I'd love to pay them back when I get home.
Set AWillow4c.ToldStory to (AWillow4c.ToldStory + 1)
I only have brothers. Five brothers. Four older ones and a baby brother who's five years younger than me. I always wanted a sister.
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory01 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory01 + 1)
Do you eat Pre-War food? I don't trust most of it, but I can't resist Fancy Lad Snack cakes, or gumdrops, or Junk Food, ooh but Salisbury Steak? Ugh.
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory02 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory02 + 1)
I'm sneaking up behind a gecko, right? And I'm about to break cover when suddenly a Deathclaw runs up and grabs it. I swear I peed my pants.
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory03 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory03 + 1)
I told you about the motel my parents own, right? My mom does most of the cooking for the guests. She's the one that taught me how to cook.
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory04 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory04 + 1)
One time, when I was out exploring with one of my brothers, we found some Pre-war dog toys. A couple of them still squeaked.
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory05 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory05 + 1)
My mom, Coleen, makes the best coffee I've ever tasted. Everybody loves it, not just me. I try to make it, but it's never as good as hers.
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory06 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory06 + 1)
I love to collect things. You should see my room back home. It's so stuffed with junk I can't get to my bed. My mom is always complaining about it.
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory07 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory07 + 1)
Have I ever told you about the time my dog, Big George, cornered a baby molerat and its mom got so mad she nearly killed us both? I sure miss him.
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory08 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory08 + 1)
My oldest brother, Val, is a doctor. He tried to teach me some doctoring, but I just couldn't get the hang of it. He says I'm all thumbs.
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory09 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory09 + 1)
My brothers, Sam and Dean, once hunted down a giant Gecko that was terrorizing the Grazing Grounds in Klamath. They got a big reward for it.
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory10 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory10 + 1)
So, one day this lady runs into Val's clinic yelling her head off that her baby's sick. Val unwraps the blanket and inside he finds a baby Molerat!
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory11 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory11 + 1)
Chuck told me that he once kicked a guy so hard in the head that his helmet flew up in to the top of a 50 foot tree and got stuck there.
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory12 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory12 + 1)
Someday when I have kids I want to have five or six. I love my big family. There's always so much going on. It's never boring.
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory13 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory13 + 1)
When my friend Bethie and I were little we used to go visit this old lady named, Madame Zelda. She lived with nine molerats!
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory14 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory14 + 1)
Madame Zelda made potions and she would read our palms and tell our fortunes. Her predictions came true a lot!
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory15 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory15 + 1)
Madame Zelda once told me that I'd travel to New Vegas and meet the love of my life there. Interesting, huh?
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory16 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory16 + 1)
Did I tell you that Brian played the guitar? Because Madame Zelda once told us that Bethie would marry a guitar player.
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory17 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory17 + 1)
It's quiet in the Mojave.You know, some places you go it's noisy; there's more birds, plants, animals and they all make noise. I like the peace here.
Set AWillow4b.ToldStory18 to (AWillow4b.ToldStory18 + 1)
AWDAlertWeaponOut
What is it? Do you see something?
Set WillowREF.WeaponTalk to 0
What's going on?
Set WillowREF.WeaponTalk to 0
Bring it on!
Set WillowREF.WeaponTalk to 0
I have Moira.
I'm thrilled to have Moira back, but I'd still like to find Chester.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +20) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood

Player.RemoveItem WillowVoodooDoll 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.Additem WillowVoodooDoll 1 Set AWillow4c.PCgivesMoira to 1 Set AWillow4c.TalkedAboutChester to 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowMeetQuest 6 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowMeetQuest 6 1 SetStage AWillowMeetQuest 6
If WillowREF.GetItemCount WillowsRifle >= 1 || AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowGetsBeauty If WillowsFourthContainerREF.GetItemCount WillowsTeddy >= 1 If GetHasNote WillowsGivingGifts == 0 SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 10 endif endif endif
I don't know where Chester is, we've followed the trail we had. Do you have any ideas?
Uh, well, yeah, I do, actually. It's kind of embarrassing. I think the guy I was traveling with might have him. He was helping me carry my stuff.
We parted ways at the Mojave Outpost. He was the big, strong quiet type. Great for carrying stuff, but not a lot of fun. He didn't talk much.
I have an idea where we might find him. He wouldn't say much about himself, but he did talk a little bit about where he was going.
We didn't go to both places listed on the note. We can keep going if you'd like.
That's a good idea. But, I've been thinking about it, and, although, this is very embarrassing to admit, I don't think I had Chester with me.
I think the guy I was traveling with might have him. He was carrying some of my stuff for me. We parted ways at the Mojave Outpost.
He's the big, strong quiet type. Not much fun, but great for carrying stuff. I didn't get many details out of him, but I think I know where he is.
I'm sorry about Chester, but I need to get on with my business now. Maybe we can look again later.
You might not be interested, but there's something I want to tell you. I don't think I had Chester with me when I was robbed.
I think I left him with the guy I'd been traveling with. I put Chester in with his stuff. It was a joke. I think I forgot him there.
I feel stupid I made such a mistake and do still want to find Chester. If you ever change your mind I'll be ready.
SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 2 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerKnowsAboutClint to 1 SetStage AWillowMeetQuest 9
Are you suggesting we track him down to get Chester?
Well, yeah, I am. If you decide you're interested, I'll tell you everything I know about where he may be.

SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 2 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerKnowsAboutClint to 1 Set AWillow4c.TalkedAboutChester to 1
SetStage AWillowMeetQuest 9
So maybe we shouldn't bother looking anymore and just find this guy?
I can't swear he has Chester, but he was carrying him at one point. It was a joke and then I forgot he had him. I just can't remember for sure.
You sound so uncertain. I'll think about it.
Okay, but I'm willing to talk about it again at any time. I still want to find Chester very much.
SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 2 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerKnowsAboutClint to 1 Set AWillow4c.TalkedAboutChester to 1 SetStage AWillowMeetQuest 9
I think we should try looking at the other location and then decide what to do.
Okay.

SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 2 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerKnowsAboutClint to 1 Set AWillow4c.TalkedAboutChester to 1
SetStage AWillowMeetQuest 9
Tell me about Chester. Where is this guy you were traveling with?
He wouldn't say much. Mostly when I asked him something all he'd say was,"Not your business." But, I did get a few details out of him.
Apparently he has a brother, or maybe it's a friend, who's a ghoul, who came here to join some cult. The Bright Followers or something. Near Novac.
He's going there to find the brother, or friend, to take him home again, I guess. That was all I could get out of him. He wasn't much of a talker.
[Lie] I don't have Moira. I'm sorry.
I don't believe you. I think you have her. We will not be traveling together long if you plan on lying to me very often.
Um, okay. You caught me. I do have her. Sorry about that.
You were an ass earlier and now you've lied to me. Lie to anyone else, but not me. I don't like traveling with someone I can't trust.
And for now, while we are traveling together, if you wouldn't mind, I'd like to keep looking for Chester. I've had him since I was a little girl.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerWasAss to 2 Set AWillow4c.TalkedAboutChester to 1 PlaySound WillowPlayerBad

Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer -5); for lying Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +20); for finding Moira Player.RemoveItem WillowVoodooDoll 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.Additem WillowVoodooDoll 1 PlaySound WillowPlayerGood SetStage AWillowMeetQuest 6 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowMeetQuest 6 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowMeetQuest 6 1
If WillowREF.GetItemCount WillowsRifle >= 1 && WillowsFourthContainerREF.GetItemCount WillowsTeddy >= 1 If GetHasNote WillowsGivingGifts == 0 SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 10 endif endif
Please don't lie to me. Lie to anybody else, but not me. I want to be able to trust the person I'm traveling with, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: Por favor, no me mientas. Miéntele a cualquier otra persona, pero no a mí. Necesito poder confiar en la persona con la que estoy viajando, ¿vale?

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I'm still very interested in looking for Chester. Can we make time for that in our travels? I've had him since I was a little girl.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerWasAss to 2 Set AWillow4c.TalkedAboutChester to 1 PlaySound WillowPlayerBad

Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer -5); for lying Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +20); for finding Moira Player.RemoveItem WillowVoodooDoll 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.Additem WillowVoodooDoll 1 PlaySound WillowPlayerGood SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowMeetQuest 6 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowMeetQuest 6 1
If WillowREF.GetItemCount WillowsRifle >= 1 && WillowsFourthContainerREF.GetItemCount WillowsTeddy >= 1 If GetHasNote WillowsGivingGifts == 0 SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 10 endif endif
[Lie] No, really, I don't have her. You're wrong. I wouldn't lie to you.
Alright, I'll give you the benefit of the doubt. But if you do have her, and I find out for sure, I won't just forgive and forget.
AWillowDGrabsMoira
Hey! Give her back! I can't believe you took Moira from me!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerWasAss to 2
You're welcome, Willow.
I promised I would travel with you if we found Beauty. So, should we talk about this? Iron out some details?
Talk? What is there to talk about? You're going to follow me around and do whatever I say, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Hablar? ¿De qué tenemos que hablar? Vas a seguirme y hacer cualquier cosa que yo diga, ¿verdad?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um, no. I have no intention of doing that. We definitely need to talk.
Oh, your teasing me, aren't you? That was a good one. Yeah, you got me. Right? That was a joke.
Yeah, sure. Whatever you want.
Hey, I'm trying to be serious here. We should probably get some things cleared up before we hit the road. I want us to get along.
Yes, let's do this. I'd like to be very clear about how we're going to do things.
Oh, good.
Is there anything in particular you want to talk about?
Yes! I can't fight with anything other than a gun. I'm lousy at anything else. Okay, I can fight with my fists if I'm cornered... by a radroach.
I'd love to learn more, and would be willing to study, but for now I'm pretty useless. I just wanted to be really clear about that.
So, don't expect me to fight with anything other than a gun. Okay? I won't do it. Not with my skills the way they are now.
Set AWillow1.NoMelee to 1
Okay. What if we trained you somehow? Is that possible?
Yeah, I read books and magazines about Boxing to learn what I can. But, they're hard to find. I've only ever found a couple.
But if I can read enough of them I figure eventually I'll get good enough to be able to use better weapons and kick some ass in a fight.
Oh! Oh, oh, oh! You know what would be even better? If we found someone to train me! Are you any good with your fists?

StartQuest AWillowUnarmedTraining SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 1 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 2 1
If RangerAndyREF.GetDead == 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 3 1 endif
If VeronicaREF.GetDead == 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 4 1 endif
If FortLuciusREF.GetDead == 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 5 1 endif
SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 6 1
No problem. I don't really care. I prefer guns myself.
Oh, I'm glad you don't mind.
I read books and magazines about Boxing to learn what I can. But, they're hard to find. I've only ever found a couple.
But if I can read enough of them I figure eventually I'll get good enough to be able to use better weapons and kick some ass in a fight.
Oh! Oh, oh, oh! You know what would be even better? If we found someone to train me! Are you any good with your fists?

StartQuest AWillowUnarmedTraining SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 1 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 2 1
If RangerAndyREF.GetDead == 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 3 1 endif
If VeronicaREF.GetDead == 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 4 1 endif
If FortLuciusREF.GetDead == 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 5 1 endif
SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 6 1
I'm not happy about this, Willow. What else won't you do?
Hmm, what seems like the best plan? I could fight with my fists if you asked me to, probably getting really hurt in the process and doing you no good
or since I'm a great shot, I can use a gun, and effectively protect myself and you. It seems silly for me to use anything but a gun right now.
But, if you only travel with people who can use a knife or their fists then, yeah, I'm not your girl. Unless you're willing to train me up.
Train you? How would I do that?
Just give me any books or magazines you find about boxing I'll read them.
Eventually I figure I'll learn enough to use better weapons and be able to hold my own in a fight.
Oh! Oh, oh, oh! You know what would be even better? If we found someone to train me! Are you any good with your fists?

StartQuest AWillowUnarmedTraining SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 1 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 2 1
If RangerAndyREF.GetDead == 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 3 1 endif
If VeronicaREF.GetDead == 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 4 1 endif
If FortLuciusREF.GetDead == 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 5 1 endif
SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 6 1
No, I don't want to worry about training.
Fine, forget I said anything about it. But I won't fight with anything but a gun.

StartQuest AWillowUnarmedTraining SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 1 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 2 1
If RangerAndyREF.GetDead == 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 3 1 endif
If VeronicaREF.GetDead == 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 4 1 endif
If FortLuciusREF.GetDead == 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 5 1 endif
SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowUnarmedTraining 6 1
I've found Beauty.
Thank you!

WillowREF.RemoveItem WillowsWeaponToken 1 WillowREF.Additem WillowsRifle 1 WillowREF.EquipItem WillowsRifle 1 WillowREF.AddItem Ammo4570 50 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +20) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood

Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowGetsBeauty to 1 Player.RemoveItem WillowsRifleFAKE 1 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 SetStage AWillowMeetQuest 5 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowMeetQuest 5 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowMeetQuest 5 1

I have Chester.
Thank you for helping me. It means the world to me that you took the time to do this.

SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 2 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 4 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 5 1 Player.RemoveItem WillowsTeddy 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.Additem WillowsTeddy 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerAsksAboutClint to 2 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasChester to 1 Set AWillow4a.PClookingAtChester to 2 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +30) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood
If WillowREF.GetItemCount WillowsRifle >= 1 || AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowGetsBeauty If WillowsFourthContainerREF.GetItemCount WillowVoodooDoll >= 1 If GetHasNote WillowsGivingGifts == 0 SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 10 endif endif endif
DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 PipBoyRadioOff Set AWillowLPTimer3.Timer to 0 Set AWillowLPTimer3.ChesterKissPlayer to 1 StartQuest AWillowLPTimer3
AWillowDMoiraForceGreet
Did you find Moira or Chester?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Has encontrado a Moira o a Chester?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set AWillow4c.FGPlayerMoira to 2 WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerFGMoira
I have something to tell you. I will ask you to carry items I don't want you to use or touch.
Well, that's no fun, I can look at them can't I? Alright, I'm willing to do that.
Do you have anything else?
I have something for you. It's a radio. My dad got them for me. One for me and one for whoever I was traveling with.
He was worried about me going out on my own and thought this might make me that much safer.
They're broken now and can only receive messages, but since you have that computer with you we'll be able to use them.
You'll be able to talk to me because of it. I met someone else with one of those and it worked great.
Alright, if that's everything I guess we should consider ourselves partners on the road for awhile.
I can't think of anything else, let's go.

WillowREF.AddPerk CompanionSuite WillowREF.SetPlayerTeammate 1 set WillowREF.HasBeenHired to 1 WillowREF.AddToFaction FollowerFaction 1 WillowREF.SetFactionRank TeammateFaction 1 Set AWillow1.StayOnRanged to 1 Set WillowREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 WillowREF.SetCombatStyle WillowsCombatStyleRanged Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set AWillow1.WillowFollowFar to 0 Set WillowREF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0

Player.AddItem WillowsRadio 1 ;WillowREF.AddItemHealthPercent WillowsRadio 1 .98 Player.AddPerk SilverTongue ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowPerkAdd SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 1 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 0 1
Forget it. I don't want you back that much.
Yeah, I figured as much.
Yes, let's go.
No. I'm not coming back with you. You sent me away and said you didn't want to be with me any more.
So, if you want me back you're going to have to do something to prove to me you want me back.
No, sorry I can't train you. I don't have the skills.
Oh. Well, maybe we'll find someone else who can.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PCdoUnarmed to 1
Yes, I do have the skills.
Oh, that's great news!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PCdoUnarmed to 1
AWillowDBeautyFG
I found Beauty and you helped me so much! Thank you.

WillowREF.RemoveItem WillowsWeaponToken 1 WillowREF.RemoveItem WillowsRifleFAKE 1 WillowREF.Additem WillowsRifle 1 WillowREF.AddItem Ammo4570 50 WillowREF.EquipItem WillowsRifle 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +20) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood

Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowGetsBeauty to 1 WillowREF.SetAV Confidence 3 SetStage AWillowMeetQuest 5 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowMeetQuest 5 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowMeetQuest 5 1
If WillowsFourthContainerREF.GetItemCount WillowsTeddy >= 1 && WillowsFourthContainerREF.GetItemCount WillowVoodooDoll >= 1 If GetHasNote WillowsGivingGifts == 0 SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 10 endif endif
Set AWillowMeetQuest.FGBeauty to 2 WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerWMQBeautyFG
Is there something else?
I forgot to ask. What's your name?
Let's go.
No. I'm good. Thanks.
I'm done. Do you have anything to talk about?
Yeah, let's go.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnAdios to 0 Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 0
Alright. Let's go.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnAdios to 0 Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 0
Yeah, let's go.
I'm ready. Let's go.
Let's hit the road.
Whatever you say, boss.
Alright. See ya later.
Bye!
Can I talk to you about something for a minute...
Sure.
I'm done. Is there anything you want to talk to me about?
No. I'm good. Thanks.
Are you still interested in me giving you some hand-to-hand combat training?
Yes! Can we do it now?
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PCdoUnarmed to 2
Let's do that training now. Are you ready?
Yes! Absolutely!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PCreturnUnarmed to 2

ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX WillowREF.ModAV Unarmed 25 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 2 1
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +10) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
Sorry, we'll have to do it later.
Oh, alright. But don't forget.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PCreturnUnarmed to 1
Okay, sure, we can do it now.
Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Genial! Está bien; espérame aquí un segundo.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickExtendedISFX WillowREF.ModAV Unarmed 25 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 2 1
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +10) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
Yes, Willow? You want to talk about Unarmed training?
You know how you've been helping me learn to fight better with my fists? Well, I think I'm good enough to do it for real now.
And look what I've been saving to use someday. So, I can fight now, any time with them. Pretty exciting, huh?
Set AWillow1.NoMelee to 0 Set AWillow1.MeleeBringItOn to 1
Player.AddItemHealthPercent WillowsSpikedKnuckles 1 .5
I have a boxing magazine. Do you want to read it?
Yes, I do. Thank you.
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
StartQuest AWillow1g Set AWillow1g.WillowHasMag to 1 Set AWillow1g.WillowStartReadingMagazine to GameDaysPassed Player.RemoveItem MagazineNVUnarmed 1 WillowREF.AddNote WillowsReadingMagazine
I found a book about boxing. Do you want to read it?
ESP.TRADUIT: He encontrado un libro sobre boxeo. ¿Quieres leerlo?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I do. Thank you.
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
Player.RemoveItem BookSkillUnarmed 1 StartQuest AWillow1f Set AWillow1f.WillowStartReadingBook to GameDaysPassed Set AWillow1f.WillowHasBook to 1 WillowREF.AddNote WillowsReadingBook
Give me what you've stolen from Willow and I'll let you walk away from here.
Get lost!
StartCombat Player
Stopping to talk to me was a big mistake...it makes you a better target.
Come on!
StartCombat Player
AWillowDSpotsKK
It's the guys who took my stuff!
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Son los tíos que se llevaron mis cosas!

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might have. What did they look like?
I don't know. They looked like regular guys. There were two of them. One had very bright red hair and the other one was wearing some kind of helmet.
ESP.TRADUIT: No sé. Parecían tíos normales. Eran dos. Uno tenía el pelo muy rojo y el otro llevaba una especie de casco.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you alright? Did they hurt you?
I think we should stop traveling together.
ESP.TRADUIT: Creo que deberíamos dejar de viajar juntos.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously? You want to stop traveling with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿En serio? ¿Quieres que deje de viajar contigo?

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowFiring
Oh, no, that sounds very final, doesn't it. Forget I said anything. Stay with me.
Okay, I will. Are you messing with me?
Yes, I want you to leave. It's not you. It's me. I need my space.
ESP.TRADUIT: Sí, quiero que te vayas. No es por tí. Es por mí. Necesito mi espacio.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I'll go find someone else to travel with..are you sure this is what you want?
Fine. I'll go find somebody else to travel with..I don't need you. Are you sure this is what you really want?
ESP.TRADUIT: Vale. Ya buscaré algien más para viajar con él... No te necesito. ¿Seguro que es lo que quieres?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I want you to leave. It's not you. It's me. I need my space.
ESP.TRADUIT: Sí, quiero que te vayas. No es por tí. Es por mí. Necesito mi espacio.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you please go back to the Suite at the Lucky 38 and wait for me there?
Without you? Alright, but it won't be any fun. I don't like it there.

WillowREF.MoveToMarkerWithFade L38SuiteCompanionMarker01REF set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1.GuardAlert to 0 Set AWillow1.SleepOnBedroll to 0 Set WillowREF.WillowL38 to 1; used to control JT following Willow Set AWillow1.Relaxin to 1 WillowREF.evp Set WillowREF.Waiting to 1 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowGoneL38
Give me what you've stolen from Willow and I'll let you walk away from here.
Nevermind.
Oh, okay.
AWDx1Novac
Oh! Do you see that giant, uh, gecko, whatever that is, over there? Can we go see that? I bet you can go inside.
Here you go, it's a Sunset Sarsaparilla mug. Do you like it?
Thank you so much. It's so special. I love it!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasOnePresent to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowWaitingforNextPresent to GameDaysPassed

Player.RemoveItem WillowPresentsCoffeeMugSS 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem WillowPresentsCoffeeMugSS 1
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
Would you mind keeping watch here for awhile?
Yeah, I can do that. No problem.

Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1.GuardAlert to 1 WillowREF.evp Set WillowREF.Waiting to 1
If WillowsHouseMarkerREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow && WillowREF.GetInCell WillowNovacBungalow Set AWillowFreeform.WillowLeavesHouse to 3 Set AWillowFreeform.FirstSurprise to 0 Set AWillowFreeform.PillowMoved to 0 endif
I've heard about the ghouls outside of Novac. I know where they are.
You have? That's great. Can we go there?
SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 4
The Bright Followers aren't there any more. Well, most of them that I know about anyway.
I don't think that matters. It doesn't mean that he hasn't gone there looking for his friend.
Let's go find your friend. What's his name?
ESP.TRADUIT: Vamos a buscar a tu amigo. ¿Cómo se llama?

ESP.ORIGINAL: His name. Yeah, well, I just call him The Big Guy. He never told me his name in all the time we were together. Weird, isn't it?
So, I guess you'll need his description. He's very tall, and he wears a cowboy hat with a feather. Oh, and he's a ghoul.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerAsksAboutClint to 1
SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 4
Thanks for filling me in. We'll check it out if I get the time to do it.
Oh, alright. I hope there's something to find when we finally get there.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerAsksAboutClint to 1
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PCFindChesterLater to 1 SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 4
Yes. We can go there and look for Chester.
We can? Right now? Well, let's go.
Oh, and you'll want to know who you're looking for, right? He's a big, tall ghoul and he always wears a cowboy hat with a feather in it.
I don't know his name, if you can believe it. I just called him The Big Guy the whole time we were together. He has a dog with him named J.T.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerAsksAboutClint to 1
SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 4
Eventually. We'll get there when we get there.
Okay, I understand. I'll try to be patient.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerAsksAboutClint to 1
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PCFindChesterLater to 1 SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 4
I agree. I think we should go there now.
Great. Let's go.
Oh, and you'll want to know who you're looking for, right? He's a big, tall ghoul and he always wears a cowboy hat with a feather in it.
I don't know his name, if you can believe it. I just called him The Big Guy the whole time we were together. He has a dog with him named J.T.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerAsksAboutClint to 1
SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 4
It's true. But he's probably left by now. There's no need for us to rush to get there.
Fine. I sure hope there's some trace of him when we finally get there.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PlayerAsksAboutClint to 1
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PCFindChesterLater to 1 SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 4
WLPJessicaFirstMeetPlayerFG
I'm no threat. I'm not feral.
ESP.TRADUIT: No soy peligrosa. No soy una salvaje.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.JessicaFirstFG to 2
Yes, I can see that.
Why are you here?
Great. Can you answer some questions for me? Wow, you have unusual hair for a ghoul.
ESP.TRADUIT: Genial. ¿Puedo hacerte algunas preguntas? Guau, tienes un pelo bastante peculiar para una necrófaga.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I take great care of my appearance. I was a performer on The Strip for quite a long time before I came her to be with Jason and the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: Me preocupo mucho por mi apariencia. Actué bastante tiempo en el Strip antes de venir aquí para estar con Jason y los Seguidores.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back then, my looks kept me employed...and busy...and near the bright lights and interesting people...but I shouldn't go on about that.
I'll just say, thank you, as a lady should. I really think it's my best asset after my smile. Don't you agree?
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.JessicasHairTopic to 1
Oh, yes, absolutely. I'm looking for someone. Have you seen a tall ghoul in a cowboy hat?
<laughs nervously> Have you seen a tall ghoul in a cowboy hat?
I'd say your hair is your best asset, since you're asking. I don't see the charm in rotting teeth.
Well, your manners aren't the best, but you're honest. What can I do for you?
You mean Jefferson isn't here?
I told him that Jefferson had gone out into the Mojave, as other Followers have done before him, but that he had never returned.
We assumed he had died.
Do you know why he keeps coming back everyday if Jefferson is dead?
No, I don't know why he keeps coming back. But, I like seeing him so I haven't tried to make him stop.
When do you expect him today?
I really don't know. Some days I don't see him until three or four in the afternoon.
I do know he stays out at that camp by the gate. There's a bed. He sleeps there.
Ok, thanks. Why are you here? Why didn't you go off in the rockets with Jason and the others?
I missed the launch. I was away in the Wasteland and I don't know, really, what to do with myself...now.
I'd like to go with him.
But I don't know if he'll take me. I haven't the courage to ask him.
Ok, thanks. What is this place? Why are you here?
This is the home of the Bright Followers. Jason Bright is the leader.
I'm tired of Jason, and this place, and the Followers and would love to run away with him.
But, I don't know if he'll take me I haven't the courage to ask him.
Ok, thanks. Bye.
See ya later.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.JessicaRSandbox to 1 Jessica2REF.evp
I'm looking for someone. Have you seen a tall ghoul in a cowboy hat?
Yes, he comes by everyday to see me. Well, not me, he's looking for that Jefferson fellow.
But I like to think he's looking for me. I have such a crush on him. He's so big and tall and handsome.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PCtalkingtoJessica to 1

GWNNREF.MoveTo TheGWNNXMarkerREF Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PCtalkingtoJessica to 2 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.GWNNtravel to 1 GWNNref.evp JTref.MoveTo TheGWNNXMarkerREF Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.JTAccompany to 1 JTref.evp
GWNNREF.RemoveFromFaction WillowsTentFaction JTref.RemoveFromFaction WillowsTentFaction
I'm looking for someone. Have you seen a tall ghoul in a cowboy hat?
Would you like me to talk to him for you? I can ask him to take you with him when he leaves.
Yes, that would be wonderful.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PCTalkedtoJessica to 1
Thanks for your help. Goodbye.
See ya later.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.JessicaRSandbox to 1 Jessica2REF.evp
Oh, what's your name? I'll be sure to ask him when I speak to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: Oh, ¿como te llamas? Me aseguraré de preguntarle cuando hable con él.

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's Jessica, and thank you for helping me.
ESP.TRADUIT: Me llamo Jessica, y gracias por ayudarme.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.JessicaRSandbox to 1 Jessica2REF.evp
Goodbye.
See ya later.
Thank you so very much. I must get ready to go now.
Ok, thanks. Why are you hanging around out here?
I'm tired of Jason, and this place, and the Followers and would love to run away with him.
But, I don't know if he'll take me I haven't the courage to ask him.
Good dog!
Bark, bark!
You're a good looking fella, aren’t you?
Pant, pant.
Wish I had a dog biscuit for you, buddy.
Pant, pant, pant.
Whine!
Player.RemoveItem WillowsDoggieTreats 1 JTref.AddItem WillowsDoggieTreats 1
Would you like a dog biscuit, boy?
Stupid mutt, you don't know what I'm saying, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: Estúpido chucho, no entiendes ni una palabra de lo que digo, ¿verdad?

ESP.ORIGINAL: growl...
AWDAtWakeUpGreetings
Good morning.
Oh, there's nothing better than a good night's sleep in a comfortable bed.
I could use some coffee.
Do you have it? Will you give it to me?
Sure.
GWNNref.RemoveItem WillowsTeddy 1 Player.AddItem WillowsTeddy 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PChasChester to 1
You know that girl, Jessica, the Bright Follower? The one that waits to see you everyday?
Sure.
She's madly in love with you and wants to run away with you.
Yeah, I know.
You might want to consider asking her to go away with you. I think she likes you.
I suppose.
She does! And she's so pretty. She's got that great smile and that hair! You should go for it.
You're right. I should.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PCtalkedtoTBGJessica to 1
So are you going to take her with you when you go?
Yeah.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PCtalkedtoTBGJessica to 1
I hear you're looking for a man named Jefferson.
Yeah.
But it's pretty certain he's dead, right? So you must have a pretty good reason for staying here.
Willow told me you wouldn't say much. She was right.
But, he's dead. You're wasting your time. Are you going to keep standing here hoping he'll show up?
Yeah, I am. What of it?
I saw the note. You must be desperate for the money to keep hanging around like this.
Yeah.
No, I wasn't wondering that. He would have been asking about ghoul activity in the area.
Oh, that. Lately there's been talk of ghouls just a bit west of Novac up in the mountains.
ShowMap RepconMapMarkerREF SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 4 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 5 1
Has a tall ghoul in a cowboy hat been in here asking questions?
Sure, but he didn't buy any souvenirs if that's what you're wondering.
Did a big, tall ghoul in a cowboy hat come in asking about the ghouls up at REPCONN?
Sure.
Did a ghoul in a cowboy hat with a feather come and ask you some questions?
Who sent you? I ain't talking. They tried to get me to talk before, but I didn't say nothing, and don't aim to now, by gum.
ShowMap RepconMapMarkerREF SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 5 1
WLPJessicaChatPCinMO
AWDTimedNCRStations
I know I shouldn't scavenge here, but I'm not promising anything. If I see something good I might have to sneak it out with me.
*sings with no words*
AWDConvoJTx1
Hi, J.T. How ya doing, ya good dog?
AWLPJTWillowResp
Pant, pant, pant
WLPWillowResponse
Bark, bark!
JTref.evp
WLPBGtoWillowFGx1
Alright.
[Lie] She says the Bright Followers want you to leave here. Now.
I see.
Leave. It would be the best thing for everyone involved.
Are you kidding me?
They don't want you here. She doesn't want you here.
I see.
What is with you? Just give it up already. Jefferson's dead.
You're probably right.
Are you telling me you won't go? She's asked me to take care of you if you won't agree to leave.
I won't.
I think it's time for me to do something about you since you are being so uncooperative.
Eat this.
StartCombat Player
I'll give you some time to think about it.
Sure.
I know about the reward for taking him back, but he's dead. You're never going to see that money.
Sure.
You've given it your best shot. You've done everything you could. You should just leave now.
You're right. I should.

Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PCgetsGWNNtoLeaveMO to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.GWNNsandbox to 0 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.GWNNtravel to 0 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.GWNNguard to 0 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.TheBigGuyLeaves to 1 GWNNref.evp
I've talked to him.
And?
He's dead.
You killed him? Well, fuck you!
StartCombat Player
He says he'll take you with him when he leaves. Great news, huh?
Thank you.
Here, please, take this. It's not much, but it's all I have. I'd like to give it to you as a thank you for what you've done.
Player.AddItem WillowsJessicasExtraWig 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.JessicaGaveReward to 1
Where are you two headed?
We're headed back out to where he came from; some place in the NCR. I hope everything turns out okay.
I tried to talk him into going back to New Vegas with me or maybe settling down in the Mojave somewhere but he wasn't interested so off we go.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PCTalkedinMO to 1
On your bedroll.
Okay.

Go back to sleep. Sorry I woke you up.
ESP.TRADUIT: Vuelve a dormir. Siento haberte despertado.

ESP.ORIGINAL: <yawn> No problem. See you in the morning.

endif
Great!
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Genial! Está bien; espérame aquí un segundo...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, if you ever want to borrow Beauty from me, feel free, because I can use these.
And, I've been thinking about it, you know, now that I'm trained to fight up close, I think I could handle a knife or a something like that.

SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 1 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 12 1
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowIsBFF == 0 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 17 1 endif
AWOAKKyleGreetingBastards
You bastards.
AWDx1RocketSouvenirAsks
I want a rocket souvenir too! For my collection!
Set AWillow1.FindRocket to 2
Can I borrow Beauty for a while, Willow?
Yes, of course. Take good care of her.

WillowREF.RemoveItem WillowsRifle 1 Player.AddItem WillowsRifleFAKE 1
If WillowREF.GetItemCount WillowsRifle > 0 WillowREF.Removeitem WillowsRifle 999 endif
I would! Thank you.
WillowREF.AddItem WillowsRifle 1 WillowREF.EquipItem WillowsRifle 1 Player.RemoveItem WillowsRifleFAKE 1
Do you want Beauty back? I'm done with her.
Remember you promised to travel with me whether we found Beauty or not?
I am traveling with you.
Set AWillow1a.HadDiscussion to 1 Set AWillow1a.Waits to 2
I want to talk to you, again, about traveling with me, properly, without Beauty.
I thought we covered this? I am traveling with you. What more is there to say.
Set AWillow1a.Waits to 3
You still don't have Beauty and nothing's changed between us. We need to solve this.
Fine. Let's solve it.
Set AWillow1a.Waits to 4
No, I mean, really travel with me. Working with me cooperatively and everything...
I'm not being cooperative?
You could be more cooperative. You promised you would be even if we didn't find your rifle.
Are you even trying to find Beauty for me or did you just think since I agreed to come either way you wouldn't even try?
I did say that, it's true. But we haven't been looking all that long. We can talk about this again soon.
You could be more cooperative. You promised to work closely with me if we didn't find your rifle.
ESP.TRADUIT: Podrías colaborar más. Prometiste ayudarme si no encontrábamos tu rifle.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. You're fine. I just want you to know I'm looking forward to when that happens.
To when what happens?
To when we find Beauty and everything works really well between us.
Oh, okay. Thanks.
I know you don't have Beauty yet, but I'm not happy with our situation. I want more from you, now.
I'm not ready to give up looking for Beauty. I think if you get what you want we won't look for her anymore. So, no. I won't.
You promised me. It bothers me that you are breaking that promise.
I'm sorry, but I have my reasons for acting this way. Just give me more time, okay?
Can't we make this work for both of us?
No, probably not. Not unless you have Beauty behind your back and you're just playing games with me for some reason.
So you have no intention of fulfilling your promise?
I didn't say that. I just want to keep looking for a while longer before I commit myself to anything, that's all.
I just want you to know that I understand why you are holding back right now.
You do?
Sure. You think if you give it all up right away I won't look for Beauty. So, don't worry.
Thanks.
Something has to change. I'm very unhappy with this arrangement.
I want to find Beauty, and, I want to find her more than I care about breaking my promise to you. Sorry.
I'm not going to change the way things are without my rifle. You can say what you like about me and my integrity.
Okay, okay. We'll go find Beauty.
We will? You mean it? I didn't mean to lie when you first found me. I really meant what I said.
I'm sorry if I've been terrible to you.
Liar. I'm done with you. Go back to the Mojave Outpost and find somebody else to travel with.
Fine. I will.

Set AWillowMeetQuest.FollowNotHired to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WaitNotHired to 0 Set AWillowMeetQuest.WillowTravelMO to 1 WillowREF.MoveToMarkerWithFade CassHomeMarkerREF ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowLEFTmojaveoutpost
Are you happy with the way things are between us?
No, I'm not happy. But I'm more unhappy that I don't have Beauty.
You've mentioned that you have a collection. What do you collect?
When I scavenge for stuff to sell I look for special little things that I might like to keep. I have a collection of those things.
I haven't shown them to you because, well, a girl likes to have some privacy, and besides, not everyone I've traveled with has understood.
Set AWillow4a.BFFCollection to 1
Can I ask you some personal questions?
Sure, I don't mind.
Why were you alone when I found you?
I hadn't been in the Mojave long. I'd arrived at the Mojave Outpost a few days before and had already split up with my last travel companion.
I tried to find a new companion but couldn't, so I packed up and headed out. It was very unlucky that I got into trouble.
I've been on the road for almost two years now and that was about as bad as it's ever gotten for me.
Although, I did lose my dog, Big George, on the trip. He was killed by geckos. That was my worst day.
What got you interested in traveling?
I grew up in Oregon. My family runs a motel that lots of caravans and sometimes travelers come through.
ESP.TRADUIT: Crecí en Oregón. Mi familia dirige un motel por el que pasan bastantes caravanas y a veces algunos viajeros.

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I spent my childhood listening to stories of life on the road. I can't remember a time when I didn't want to leave and live out those stories.
Are you from the Mojave? Will you be able to fill me in on details as we travel around or are you a newcomer like me?
How do you support yourself on the road?
I learned a lot about trading and bargaining from the caravans and traders that stayed with us while I was growing up.
I scavenge things of value as I go and when I meet someone to trade with I bargain for the best prices I can get. I do pretty well that way.
Set AWillow4a.PersonalScanvenging to 1
What haven't they understood?
That it's fun to find pretty or interesting things and keep them and a couple of the people I've traveled with have made fun of me for it.
I don't collect anything, but why would I make fun of you for doing it?
You don't keep anything? You don't even keep things like the glasses your favorite grandmother wore?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿No te quedas con nada? ¿Ni siquiera con las gafas que llevaba tu abuela favorita?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or maybe the outfit you wore during a significant event, or a cigarette lighter that somebody gave you? Nothing?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿O tal vez la ropa que llevaste en algún evento importante, o un mechero que te regaló alguien? ¿Nada?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like to collect things too.
I'm so excited you collect stuff too. What's your favorite thing to collect?
No, I just pick up stuff to sell.
ESP.TRADUIT: No, solo recojo cosas para venderlas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. Interesting.
Set AWillow4a.PCNothing to 1 Set AWillow4a.BFFPresent to (AWillow4a.BFFPresent + 1)
You have a collection of junk that you haul around with you? What's the point?
Great. Forget I said anything.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer -5) PlaySound WillowPlayerBad
Set AWillow4a.BFFPresent to (AWillow4a.BFFPresent + 1)
Armor and weapons.
I have some good stuff at home. I don't pick those up on the road. They weigh too much.
Set AWillow4a.PCArmorandWeapons to 1 Set AWillow4a.BFFPresent to (AWillow4a.BFFPresent + 1)
Teddy Bears and Toys.
Oh, so you collect toys like I do.
Set AWillow4a.PCTeddyBearsandToys to 1 Set AWillow4a.BFFPresent to (AWillow4a.BFFPresent + 1)
Miscellaneous Items. You know, your basic junk.
Junk? I love junk. I have a spork in my collection and I love coffee mugs. I have to keep myself from picking them up.
Set AWillow4a.PCMiscItems to 1 Set AWillow4a.BFFPresent to (AWillow4a.BFFPresent + 1)
Things I think are special. If an item catches my eye and it interests me I'll keep it.
Those are my favorites too.
Set AWillow4a.PCSpecialItems to 1 Set AWillow4a.BFFPresent to (AWillow4a.BFFPresent + 1)
Now that you've asked me to pick I favorite I can't. I think I like to collect everything.
That's funny. It must be hard for you to not get overloaded most of the time.
Set AWillow4a.PCEverything to 1 Set AWillow4a.BFFPresent to (AWillow4a.BFFPresent + 1)
Willow, now that we're friends, are you willing to change your clothes?
What's wrong with what I'm wearing?
Here's a Nuka-Cola for you.
Thank you.
Set AWillow1l.WNukaCola to 0

No, I didn't get one.
Okay, maybe next time.
Can I see your collection again?
Sure.
WillowsFourthContainerREF.OpenTeammateContainer 1
AWDTimedNelson
I don't like the legion sitting here in Nelson. It's too close to Novac.
With the legion out of here, Novac should be safer, right?
Is there any way to save the troopers? I felt terrible when we couldn't help the people in Nipton.
Is there any way to save the troopers?
Boone, I agree with you. I want to save them too.
Willow and I are traveling together and we've tracked you down to see if you have her teddy bear.
Yeah.
AWDx1SnufflesHealed
That was nice of you.
AWDx1MrHouseSeen
Well, that settles that. Mr. House is definitely not a computer.
AWDTimedzToVeronicaResp04
Yes, and not too fussy either.
ANPCaTOwChatter
I'm really very boring. You'd get better stories out of a Freeside junkie.
AWDx1ResptoArcade
I'm sure that's not true, but, maybe you'll feel more like talking if we meet again.
ANPCvTowResp04
Yeah, a good one! Something elegant and classy, you know? But still stylish.
ANPCvTowResp05
Sure, ya.
ANPCVeronicaGenlResp1
Why does everyone always say that?
Ya think?
That bad, huh?
AWDx1RedLucyBRfirst
Are you planning to sleep with her?
Yes. I know you don't like her, but what if I wanted to? Would you have a problem with that?
ESP.TRADUIT: Sí. Se que no te gusta, pero ¿que pasa si quiero? ¿Sería un problema para tí?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I mean no. I mean...we're just friends, but I definitely don't want to watch you having sex with her. I'm going home. I'll see you there, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: Sí. Digo no. Quiero decir... solo somos amigos,

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'd have a problem with that! What are you gonna do?
Yes. I know you don't like her, but I want to do this. Are you going to have a problem with that?
Um...no?
Great!
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Genial! Está bien; espérame aquí un segundo...

ESP.ORIGINAL: No!
Oh! I'm so glad to hear you say that!
Oh, don't be like that honey. What if we took her to bed together? I think you'd enjoy it.
And you'd enjoy it. You wouldn't ignore me and just pay attention to her would you?
[Lady Killer] I won't ignore you, I promise. But maybe you'd ignore me some, huh? What do you say?
Alright, you sweet talker, I'll do it. This might turn out to be fun for both of us. I hope you know I'd only ever do something like this for you.

If Player.GetInCell OVWestSewers03d Set AWillow4b.Threesome to 1 Set AWillow4b.ThreesomeRLucy to 1 Elseif Player.GetInCell 2EOVault21 Set AWillow4b.Threesome to 1 Set AWillow4b.ThreesomeSarah to 1 endif
[Cherchez LF] I love you Willow, how could I possibly ignore you for another girl? Will you do it?
Alright, you sweet talker, I'll do it. This might turn out to be fun for both of us. I hope you know I'd only ever do something like this for you.

If Player.GetInCell OVWestSewers03d Set AWillow4b.Threesome to 1 Set AWillow4b.ThreesomeRLucy to 1 Elseif Player.GetInCell 2EOVault21 Set AWillow4b.Threesome to 1 Set AWillow4b.ThreesomeSarah to 1 endif
Wait. I don't want to. Let's get out of here together.
Okay.
Alright. I'll see you at home later.
Okay.

Willow, it's not like we're married. I'm free to do what I want.
ESP.TRADUIT: Willow, no es como si estuvieramos casados. Soy libre de hacer lo que quiera.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. You're right. We're not married. I understand now how things are. I thought you loved me, but I guess I was wrong. Have fun. I'm going home.
ESP.TRADUIT: Bien. Tienes razón. No estamos casados. Ahora entiendo como va esto. Pensé que me querías, pero supongo que me equivocaba. Que te diviertas. Me vuelvo a casa.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry. I didn't think about how you'd feel. Don't leave. I'll come with you.
Oh! I'm so glad to hear you say that!
I want my freedom. I'm going to sleep with her. If you don't like it you should go home.
ESP.TRADUIT: Quiero tener libertad. Voy a acostarme con ella. Si no te gusta deberías irte a casa.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, I'm going home.
Set AWillow4a.RedLucySexBreak to 2 Set AWillow4a.FirstDaySexBreak to GameDaysPassed Set AWillow4a.PCsexpartners to 1 Set AWillow4b.SLPostSexGrtg to 1

AWDx1SarahWeintraub
Sarah wants to have sex with you!
AWDx1CrockerDead
I think the NCR might be upset about a dead ambassador.
AWDTimedzToVeronicaResp07
Because it's true?
AWDx1LastWord
We made it!
AWDTimedHooverDam
That dam holds a lot of water. More than I've ever seen in one place at one time.
*nervous humming*
AWDHouseShowerSinging
singing in the shower
AWDResptoHowsitGoin
Hi! How are you today?
Hi!
Did you say something about Star Bottle Caps?
Yeah, Star Bottle Caps. Do you believe in the treasure? I do and I think it's out there waiting for someone to find it.
Set AWillow4a.TalksAboutBottlecaps to 1
No, I don't think it's out there waiting to be found. I think it's just a story.
Really? But it could be something exciting that hasn't been seen since before The Great War. I can't even imagine what that might be.
Aren't you even a little curious?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿No tienes ni un poquito de curiosidad?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if it exists or not, but we can look for it together if you want.
Woo-hoo! We are huntin' for treasure!
[Lie] I don't have her. I really don't.
And, since you don't have her, we'll keep looking for her then, right? And I want to keep looking for Chester too. I've had him since I was little.
Set AWillow4c.PLiesHasMoira to 1 Set AWillow4c.TalkedAboutChester to 1
Alright, yes, I do have Moira. You can have her.
We're moving! This is our new house. I thought it was time for a change.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Nos mudamos! Esta es nuestra nueva casa. Pensé que era hora de cambiar.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, no problem.

We're moving! This is our new house. I thought it was time for a change.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Nos mudamos! Esta es nuestra nueva casa. Pensé que era hora de cambiar.

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's great news! I love the bungalow!
It reminds me of home so much. I know I'll be very happy here.
ESP.TRADUIT: Me recuerda mucho a mi casa. Sé que seré muy feliz aquí.

We're moving! This is our new house. I thought it was time for a change.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Nos mudamos! Esta es nuestra nueva casa. Pensé que era hora de cambiar.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, let's do that.
Okay, I'll set it up right here. You might want to back up a bit.
Set AWillow1.LetsSnack to 0 Player.PlaceAtMe WillowCampfire2 1 0 0 StartQuest AWillow9c Set AWillow1.CampfireOut to 1 Set AWillow1.PlayerAsksForCampfire to 1
Why don't you grab something you can eat while we're on the move. I don't want to stop right now.
Alright. I can do that. Maybe we can do the big thing later?
WillowREF.RemoveItem WillowsDoggieTreats 1
Set AWillow1.LetsSnack to 0 PlaySound NPCHumanEatingFoodCrunchy
But, I don't have my favorite snack right now. I guess I can make do or wait.
Set AWillow1.LetsSnack to 0
Can you set up a campfire right here? This is a good spot, don't you think?
Yes, it's a great spot. I'll set it up right now. You might want to back up a bit.
Player.PlaceAtMe WillowCampfire2 1 0 0 StartQuest AWillow9c Set AWillow1.CampfireOut to 1
When I draw my weapon, draw yours, okay?
Sure, no problem.
Set WillowREF.WeaponOutLikeMe to 1
Okay.
Set WillowREF.WeaponOutLikeMe to 0
You can stop taking your weapon out when I do.
AWDTimedRedRock
It's gorgeous here! This may be the most beautiful place I've seen. In all my time on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Esto es precioso! Puede que sea el lugar más bonito que he visto en todo el tiempo que llevo en la carretera.

ESP.ORIGINAL: These guys look tough...really tough.
Just so you know, I plan to scavenge while we're here so don't give me away if you see me go for something. Okay?
*hums*
AWDTimedCottonwoodCove
*nervous humming*
Legion and their slaves...this place gives me the creeps. They have slave pens here. Cages...for people! Ugh!
AWDTimedMcCarran
*hums*
You loved me so, but let me go. Now I'll never know how our love will grow.
Do you get homesick when you go into an NCR held location? I sure do.
CraigBooneREF.SayTo CraigBooneREF ANPCbTowResp09
Do you think we'll run into anyone you know while we're here?
CraigBooneREF.SayTo CraigBooneREF ANPCbTowResp05
AWDTimedMojaveOutpost
I was so glad to see the NCR troopers when I first got here. I felt right at home.
I was trying to figure out how they built those two giant statues. I can't even imagine how they did it.
The view up here? It's gorgeous!
I know I shouldn't scavenge here, but I'm not promising anything. If I see something good I might have to sneak it out with me.
*hums*
Waiting, watching the stars above. Hoping that I could win back your love.
Set AWillow4c.PlayerHeardSinging to 1
AWDRespPraGuardMean
I don't think he likes me.
You've got my back, right, if he tries anything?
Hmpf.
AWDTentTableSet
I hope your hungry. I've made us something to eat and I've set the table.
AWDTimedCampForlornHope
This place is horrible. How can the NCR treat its troop like this?
Hmpf.
It's so depressing here.
I'll keep my hands to myself while we're here. Even if there was anything good to pick up, I couldn't do it. They need everything they've got.
I'm glad we're helping out around here. This is one of the saddest places I've been. The NCR has really let these guys down.
I can't believe anyone would be so low that they'd steal medical supplies from the other troops here.
Do you want something Willow?
I would so love to add a Dinky souvenir to my collection.
ESP.TRADUIT: Me encantaría tener un souvenir de Dinky para mi colección.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set AWillow4a.AsksForDinky to 2
I would so love to add a Dinky souvenir to my collection.
ESP.TRADUIT: Me encantaría tener un souvenir de Dinky para mi colección.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set AWillow4a.AsksForDinky to 3
Ooh, thanks! That is a quality collectible. I am stashing that somewhere safe.

I have a Dinky the Dinosaur for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Tengo un muñeco de Dinky el Dinosaurio para tí!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good news, Willow! I have one for you...
Ooh, thanks! That is a quality collectible. I am stashing that somewhere safe.
Set AWillow4a.AsksForDinky to 3 Player.RemoveItem VMS01DinoSouvenir 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem VMS01DinoSouvenir 1

No, not really. I won't stop you looking for it, but I'm not going to help either.
Oh, well, be that way. I'm going to keep looking for it.
Well, okay, maybe a little. What if we look for it together?
Yes, let's do that.
Great! I'd love to have a Nuka Cola.
Set AWillow1l.BeerTime to 1 Set AWillow1l.WNukaCola to 1
Great! I could use a drink, but I don't want Nuka Cola, I want...whiskey!
Set AWillow1l.BeerTime to 1 Set AWillow1l.WWhiskey to 1
Great idea.
I'll have my usual...whiskey.
Set AWillow1l.BeerTime to 1 Set AWillow1l.WWhiskey to 1
No, we don't have time right now.
Okay, maybe next time.
How about you sleep here?
Okay, where exactly?
Set WillowREF.Waiting to 1
AWDSQgsFG
We're here! I'm so excited. This is the first time I've been to a trader since I was at the Mojave Outpost.
You know, I keep magazines with me wherever I go. I have ones about trading or negotiating. You might find the ones about trading helpful.
I don't read them much. I mostly study the negotiating ones. Here, you can have one of the trading ones.
I should probably just sell the trading ones I have, since I don't read them, but I keep thinking I will and then I don't. Ya, know?
Player.AddItem MagazineNVBarter 1 Set AWillow4c.IsBuyingChet to 1 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerShoppingChetGS SetStage AWillowShoppingQuest 5
AWDSQcrimsoncaravanFG
This is the last one! I've been trying to decide how to thank you for taking me to all the traders.
I think it would be great if you could have a hat like mine. You know, it brings me good luck with traders.
I never have to bargain very hard to get great deals, it's really no work at all. It's my hat.
Would you mind cooking something for me? (you use campfire crafting menu in dialogue)
No, not at all. As long as you have the ingredients I can make whatever's on the menu.
Set AWillow1.PlayerGetsCampfire to 2
Let's do it. You have what you need, right?
Would you mind cooking something for me? (you use campfire crafting menu in dialogue)
Okay, I'm ready. May I see the menu?
Yeah. I just need a minute to get my stuff together. Hold on.
Player.CIOS WillowsMadSkillzCIOS
Set AWillow1.ShowMenu to 1 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerCOOKshowmenu
I don't have everything I need, but I'll come back.
Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Genial! Está bien; espérame aquí un segundo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you want to talk about Mr. House?
Yeah, what did you think? I don't like him. How do we even know he's human?

Oh, okay.

Ooh, and maybe we could keep our eyes open for something special to put outside. Are you interested?

blah
blah
AWDFTBcloser
That was fabulous!
Are we going to celebrate? Do I get a present or something special from you?
Yes, you do. So the first present is I made you a sweetroll to celebrate. But I'd also like to do something for you from now on as your friend.
I can cook you for, you know? Anything you want. You'll need to bring the ingredients, but I'll do the rest. What do you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: Puedo cocinar para tí, ¿sabes? Lo que quieras. Tendrás que traerme los ingredientes, pero yo haré el resto. ¿Qué te parece?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.AddItem WillowsBFFSweetroll 1 Set AWillow1.PlayerGetsCampfire to 1
You have some strong opinions about the Legion considering you just got here. Want to tell me why?
You want the short answer to that or the story-of-my-life answer?
Definitely the story of your life.
Okay, so, I grew up in the motel that my parents run, right? Well, my dad loves the guests.
He sits around the fire at night with the caravaners and asks them for news from along their routes. He's always done it since I was a little girl.
My mom and oldest brother, Val, they love it too and the three of them and the guests will sit up late into the night talking.
And arguing. They love to argue about the NCR and what it does or doesn't do and whether the legion is evil or not.
They'll talk and argue about just about anything, but their favorite subject is politics.
Did you ever get involved?
I was there, but I didn't say too much. I just wanted to be close to my dad. As I got older I helped my mom more and more and saw him less and less.
So if I wanted to be with my dad I'd have to grab time with him at night when he was with the guests. I fell asleep more often than not.
But, you know, I was awake often enough to learn that Caesar leads a group of brutal, killing slavers.
I want the short version.
My dad. He and the caravaners would talk about news from along their routes and I heard what they said.
They'd talk about Caesar and the legion so I've heard enough about them to know I don't trust them and I know they're brutal, murdering slavers.
It seems like almost every time we go in there you say something snide about her.
She's interested in you, I know it! And I don't like her...at all!
ESP.TRADUIT: Le interesas, ¡lo sé! ¡Y no me gusta un pelo!

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't really like what you're wearing and want you to wear something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: No me gusta la ropa que llevas y preferiría que llevaras otra cosa.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yeah? Well, I like it. This jacket means a lot to me and I'm going to keep wearing it. For now anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Ah, sí? Bueno, a mí me gusta. Esta chaqueta significa mucho para mí, y seguiré llevándola. Por el momento, claro.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing, I just want to see you naked.
What? Did you really just say that to me? Go find a picture of a naked girl to look at. I'm not taking my clothes off for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Qué? ¿Me lo estás diciendo en serio? Búscate una foto de una chica desnuda para eso. No me voy a desnudar para tí.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please?
Eh, maybe someday. Not today.
Nevermind
Oh, okay.
Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0
AWFMQx1MrHouse
Wow!
Of course he's human! Mr. House isn't just a man. He's a great man.
Alright, even if he is, he seems awfully full of himself.
He's interesting that's for sure.
It'd be interesting to know if he's human or not.
We don't. And without seeing him we can't be sure.
Hmm. Maybe we can do something about that.
He's rich and powerful and he's been running things for a long time.
So? Because he has a lot of money he gets to tell people how to live? That doesn't seem fair.
It's more than that. He's smart and he cares about New Vegas.
He seems kind of like a bully to me.
Willow! I respect Mr. House!
Sorry.
No, not a bully. He's more like a father who wants to protect and care for New Vegas.
Oh! When you explain it like that he doesn't seem so bad.
It's okay, but he's not a bully.
So if he's not a bully, what's he doing?
He's trying to keep New Vegas safe and functional. He has its best interests at heart.
Okay, I'll take your word for it. But he's not my favorite guy.
Be respectful. He's earned it. He planned ahead and protected New Vegas and is still protecting it.
Okay, sorry. He's smart. But he's only one guy trying to tell everyone else what to do. So, why isn't he a bully?
Because he has the best interests of New Vegas at heart. This is his home.
I think he's human, Willow.
Maybe. I do like his casino. Maybe we can avoid HIM in the future.
I don't plan to have much to do with him so we don't need to worry about it.
Good. That settles that.
Nothing. I'm not going to do anything. You should trust me.
I'm sorry honey, I'll try. It's hard not to be jealous you're just so wonderful I think everyone wants you as much as I do.
I liked him.
Seriously? Huh.
I like what he has to say.
But, he's a killer, no better than a raider...worse. He and the legion wipe out entire tribes. They torture and maim. They're slavers.
But he's a killer. And look at how he treats women! Do you honestly think you're different from the others?
But he has reasons for why he does the things he does. I admire him.
Wow. So you are seriously considering getting involved in this war. Against the NCR.
Yes, I'm seriously considering it and I want you to stay with me even if I decide to do that.
What? Why would I want to do that?
[LadyKiller]Because, we're destined to be together. You've known it since you first saw me, Willow.
You're right...I can't leave you.
But, I came here to see New Vegas, not to get involved in a war and I don't want to get involved with the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: Pero yo vine a ver New Vegas, no a involucrarme en una guerra y no quiero tener nada que ver con la legión.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [BFF]Would you really walk out on your best friend? I mean more to you than the NCR, don't I?
Yes, of course you do! You're right. I'll stay with you no matter what.
But, I came here to see New Vegas, not to get involved in a war and I don't want to get involved with the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: Pero yo vine a ver New Vegas, no a involucrarme en una guerra y no quiero tener nada que ver con la legión.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Romanced]Do you really want to fight over politics? We mean more to each other than that, don't we?
Oh! You're right! I love you! I'd die for you.
But, I came here to see New Vegas, not to get involved in a war and I don't want to get involved with the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: Pero yo vine a ver New Vegas, no a involucrarme en una guerra y no quiero tener nada que ver con la legión.

ESP.ORIGINAL: AWDFactionLegionArmor1
So, I'm carrying this legion stuff to be helpful, right? You're not gonna make me wear it, are you?
AWDSleepAlertBungalow
<Yawn> I'm going to bed. Goodnight.
AWDRespPraGuardCreepy
Ugh. I hate him.
AWDResptoMSoB
Hi!
Hey, big fella, how ya doin?
Hi, how ya doin?
AWDHouseCookingAlertNO
I didn't cook anything. We don't have what I need.
AWDx1Sloan
Sloan? Ah! This is where the Deathclaws are! We should leave. Now!
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
AWDTimedWestside
Have you noticed that no one's talking about you killing all those fiends? Isn't that weird? Should we tell someone about it?
I can't understand a thing Mean Sonofabitch says.
They sure are worried about the Fiends around here.
They're farmers! Maybe we could get some fresh vegetables from them.
Can we go shopping sometime soon?
If we're going shopping, I'm gonna need some caps.
Blue moon you saw me standing alone, without a dream in my heart, without a love of my own.
*sings with no words*
*hums*
AWDTimedFreeside
This place is a dump.
Ick, rats!
We're so close, can we go to The Strip?
ESP.TRADUIT: Ya que estamos cerca, ¿podríamos ir al Strip?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it just me, or does it seem like we're always getting into situations like this?
Maybe we could go to the Wrangler sometime.
I like The King. Maybe he should run things in The Mojave.
Sounds like I'm not the only one who's happy you took care of Caesar.
I bet Rex would like to go see The King while we're here.
*hums*
*sings with no words*
You loved me so, but let me go. Now I'll never know how our love will grow.
Like a fella once said, ain't that a kick in the head.
Set AWillow4c.PlayerHeardSinging to 1
AWDEatinOut
That was just what I needed.
Set AWillow1l.Yummy to 0
Hmm, that was good.
Set AWillow1l.Yummy to 0
AWDHouseCookingAlert
Hope you're hungry, the food's all done. I put it in the oven.
AWDResptoFortMelody
Hi!
Hi, how are you today?
AWDTimedNellis
This place is pretty special. It deserves a special name. I'm gonna call it Boomtown from now on.
Set AWillow4a.NellisChatter to ( AWillow4a.NellisChatter + 1)
How much are we going to have to do for them? To get them to trust us I mean. Pfft. Probably a lot.
I'm a walk walkin' and I'm walkin' some more, I'm walk walkin' and I'm walkin' some more cuz this place is enormous.
The mural they have about their history, it's pretty, but I think I'll pass on the story next time. It's hot in those little huts.
Exploding ants! We can't miss that!
I know I shouldn't scavenge here, but I'm not promising anything. If I see something good I might have to sneak it out with me.
Raising an airplane off the bottom of a lake seems like a big job! Why are we the ones that always end up doing this stuff?
AWDTimedNipton
You know, guys. I've only ever heard about what the legion does to towns. This is horrifying.
Set AWillow4c.BackgroundPolitics to (AWillow4c.BackgroundPolitics +1) Set AWillow4c.NiptonChatter to ( AWillow4c.NiptonChatter + 1)
I've only ever heard about what the legion does to towns. This is horrifying.
Set AWillow4c.BackgroundPolitics to (AWillow4c.BackgroundPolitics +1) Set AWillow4c.NiptonChatter to ( AWillow4c.NiptonChatter + 1)
We should go tell Ghost at the Mojave Outpost about this.
*nervous humming*
You know, I don't think I'll ever forget this place.
AWDResptoNoBark
I know! I've seen them!
Thanks, I'll be careful.
Hi, NoBark, how ya doin?
blah
You have a lot of food with you. Do you cook for yourself?
Yes! I really enjoy doing it too. I can set up a campfire anytime. Just ask. I'll want to cook regularly to keep up my supply of food.
Do you cook?
Set AWillow1.PlayerAsksForCampfire to 1
That's a difficult question to answer.
Why's that? It's seems easy enough to me. Either you're from here and you know the Mojave or you're not and you don't, right?
Like I said, it's difficult to explain, Willow. I took a shot to the head doing my job.
That's terrible. Who shot you? Was it an accident?
ESP.TRADUIT: Es horrible. ¿Quién te disparó? ¿Fué un accidente?

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, it wasn't an accident. He shot me, buried me and left me for dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: No, no fué ningún accidente. Me disparó, me enterró y me dió por fiambre.

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, why? That's so cruel.
I was a courier and he wanted what I was carrying. It was robbery.
So, how did you survive a shot to the head that damaged you so badly?
It happened in Goodsprings and the doc there patched me up.
Do you know who shot you?
That's too bad about your dog. I'm sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: Una lástima lo de tu perro. Lo siento.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. I miss him a lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: Gracias. Le echo mucho de menos.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set AWillow4a.PersonalTopicOne to 1
Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
Do you want to tell me what happened to your dog?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Quieres contarme lo que le pasó a tu perro?

ESP.ORIGINAL: He got ahead of me on the trail and got the scent of the Geckos. I'm not sure exactly what happened because he was ahead of me.
But I heard a yelp and I came around a bend in the trail and he'd fallen off the edge of a little precipice. The Geckos were below with him.
By the time I got down to them and shot all the geckos he was dead. He'd broken one of his legs in the fall and he couldn't defend himself.
I buried him as best I could and slept there that night with him and then, the next morning, I said goodbye and left him forever.
Set AWillow4a.PersonalTopicOne to 1 Set AWillow4a.PersonalGecko to 1
Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
Yes, and I'm going to pay him back for what he did to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: Sí, y voy a cobrarle con intereses lo que me hizo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll help all I can. What an asshole. Him, not you.
Set AWillow4a.PersonalGS to 1
Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
Yes, and he's dead.
Good.
Set AWillow4a.PersonalGS to 1
Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
Yes, but I don't want to talk about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: Sí, pero no quiero hablar de ello.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
Set AWillow4a.PersonalGS to 1
Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
No, I'm still trying to figure that out. You'll be with me while I do it.
I'll help you any way I can. What an asshole thing to do to you.
Do you know anything about this guy at all?
Set AWillow4a.PersonalGS to 1
Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
No, not really.
In that case can I have your scavenged food? I'll give you a list of ingredients for my favorite recipes and you'll know what I need?
Oh, I guess that means I assume you scavenge. You do, don't you? Doesn't everyone? And then, if we set up a campfire I'll be able to cook my food.
Sure, I could do that.
Great. Here's the list of ingredients. I'll be happy to share the food I cook with you.
Set AWillow4a.PersonalCooking to 1 Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
Player.AddNote WillowsIngredientList
No, I don't want to do that. Why can't you scavenge your own ingredients?
Well, I can do that, I suppose. I don't know how much I'll be able to find following you around. There is an advantage to you sharing though.
I'll share what I cook with you, if you want it.
Alright. I'll do it. If I find ingredients you want I'll give them to you.
Great. Here's the list of ingredients. I'll be happy to share the food I cook with you.
Set AWillow4a.PersonalCooking to 1 Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
Player.AddNote WillowsIngredientList
No, I am not interested in doing that Willow.
Oh, fine.
Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
Set AWillow4a.PersonalCooking to 1
What will you do while you're following me and don't have much freedom to scavenge?
I've done different things in the past with different companions. With people who like to stay close together I expect to find less stuff.
While I'm with you I'll keep my eyes on the ground and look for caps, small things we can sell or cooking ingredients.
If I'm lucky I might find a small, special item here or there to add to my collection.
Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
AWDShoppingListChet
