Can I ask you about something else?
Okay.
Set AWillow4a.PersonalTopicOne to 1
Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
Did you say something about trading?
I'd like to do some trading. Do you think we could do that?
Sure, where do you want to go?
When I was at the Mojave Outpost I talked to Major Knight about where I should go. He game me three names.
Set AWillow4c.GoShopping to 1
No, I don't want to take you shopping. That sounds very boring to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: No, no quiero llevarte de compras. Suena muy aburrido.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if it means I'm cooking more food to share with you?
Yes, even then.
Okay, it's your choice.
SetStage AWillowShoppingQuest 110
Oh, well, when you put it like that I should say yes. Who do you want to go and see?
Okay.
Great! It has been too long since I've been to a trader.
Set AWillow4a.PlayerWillGoShopping to 1 StartQuest AWillowShoppingQuest SetStage AWillowShoppingQuest 1
Thank you, Willow, that's very sweet.
Oh, good. It'll be fun.
Set AWillow4a.BFFPresent to (AWillow4a.BFFPresent + 1)
DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 PipBoyRadioOff Set AWillowLPTimer2.Timer to 0 Set AWillowLPTimer2.KissPlayer to 1 StartQuest AWillowLPTimer2
Thank you. I like you too, Willow. I'm glad we're friends.
Maybe, one day, we'll be more than friends.
Set AWillow4a.BFFPresent to (AWillow4a.BFFPresent + 1)
DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 PipBoyRadioOff StartQuest AWillowLPTimer2 Set AWillowLPTimer2.Timer to 0 Set AWillowLPTimer2.KissPlayer to 1
Okay. Great. I might take you up on that sometime.
Oh, okay. I hope you decide to do it.
Set AWillow4a.BFFPresent to (AWillow4a.BFFPresent + 1)
DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 PipBoyRadioOff StartQuest AWillowLPTimer2 Set AWillowLPTimer2.Timer to 0 Set AWillowLPTimer2.KissPlayer to 1
AWDx1Nipton
Um, the...the crosses. Should we help those people?
Set AWillow4c.BackgroundPolitics to (AWillow4c.BackgroundPolitics +1) Set AWillow4c.NiptonChatter to ( AWillow4c.NiptonChatter + 1)
I thought you wanted to go shopping. What's going on?
Can I borrow 20 caps? I can't go shopping. I'm broke.
I have some gecko meat for you. I know you like to cook with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: Tengo algo de carne de geco para tí. Sé que te gusta usarla para cocinar.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you! How many do you have for me?
Set AWillow4a.GeckoSlayerChallengeUnlocked to 1
Set AWillow4a.InventoryGecko to 1
Thank you! How many do you have for me?
I have some gecko meat for you.
Yes! And I love having all the meat, but the best part is it feels like you've been avenging Big George's death.
I've found a couple of things that I'd like you to have as a thank you for what you've done. Here.
Set AWillow4a.InventoryGecko to 0 Set AWillow4a.InventoryGeckoCount to 0
Player.AddItemHealthPercent WillowWeapNV357RevolverUnique 1 0.85 Player.AddItemHealthPercent WillowRewardGeckoSlayerHat 1 0.85 Player.AddItem Ammo357Magnum 12 Set AWillow4a.GeckoSlayerReward to 1
Do you think I've finally brought you enough gecko meat?
Thank you! How many do you have for me?
I have some gecko meat for you.
Yes, I do. I'm glad to hear you can build us a campfire.
That'll be fun. We can cook together over my campfire. If I have the ingredients I cook something whenever I set it up.
Do you want to see what I use the most? Those are the ingredients I use for my favorite recipes. Maybe we could trade stuff we don't use.
Would you be willing to do that? I'm happy to give you things that I don't use. Would you do the same for me?
Player.AddNote WillowsIngredientList
Sometimes. It's not something I go out of my way to do.
Oh, that's too bad. I like it so much I cook something whenever I have the ingredients and can set up my campfire.
Since you don't like it too much, what if I gave you my list of ingredients?
Maybe, when you're scavenging, if you find some of them, you could give them to me, instead of doing something else with them. What do you say?
I'd be interested in buying J.T. from you for 250 caps if you'd be willing to discuss it.
Sure.
Would he follow me and obey my commands?
Sure.
Let me take him, huh? He knows Willow and she likes him. He'll be happy with us.
Alright.
SetEssential WillowsTheBigGuysDog 1

Player.RemoveItem Caps001 250 Player.AddItem WillowsJTBaseball 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PaidForJT to 1 JTref.SetPlayerTeammate 1 JTref.IgnoreCrime 1 JTREF.AddToFaction FollowerFaction 1 JTREF.SetFactionRank TeammateFaction 1 JTref.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 set JTREF.HasBeenHired to 1 set JTREF.Fired to 0 JTref.AddPerk CompanionSuite JTref.modav damagethreshold 10 JTref.modav health 50 JTREF.AddToFaction FollowerFaction 1 JTREF.RemoveFromFaction WillowsTBGFaction JTREF.SetFactionRank TeammateFaction 1 Set JTREF.CombatStyleMelee to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.JTAccompany to 0 Set JTREF.Waiting to 0 Set JTREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 JTref.evp
ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowJTBaseball
Alright.
If GWNNref.GetInCell MojaveOutpostBarracks01 == 0 Player.AddNote WillowsGWNNgoodbye endif Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.ReturnBuyJT to 1
I don't have the money with me. I'll have to come back to pay you.
I know about Jefferson and the bounty you've lost. You can use the money. Let me have him.
Alright.
SetEssential WillowsTheBigGuysDog 1

Player.RemoveItem Caps001 250 Player.AddItem WillowsJTBaseball 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PaidForJT to 1 JTref.SetPlayerTeammate 1 JTref.IgnoreCrime 1 JTREF.AddToFaction FollowerFaction 1 JTREF.SetFactionRank TeammateFaction 1 JTref.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 set JTREF.HasBeenHired to 1 set JTREF.Fired to 0 JTref.AddPerk CompanionSuite JTref.modav damagethreshold 10 JTref.modav health 50 JTREF.AddToFaction FollowerFaction 1 JTREF.RemoveFromFaction WillowsTBGFaction JTREF.SetFactionRank TeammateFaction 1 Set JTREF.CombatStyleMelee to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.JTAccompany to 0 Set JTREF.Waiting to 0 Set JTREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 JTref.evp

Alright.

I don't have the money with me. I'll have to come back to pay you.
You have Jessica now, you don't need J.T. any more, right? Let me take him.
Alright.
SetEssential WillowsTheBigGuysDog 1

Willow, I have a present for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: Willow, tengo un regalo para tí.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do? A present? I love presents!
A present? What is it?
Oh, no, I didn't. I'd like it if we could be more than friends one day. (Romance Quest)
I'm not ready to take that step yet, let's just see how things go.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.FriendsWithBenefits to 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 9 1
I'm flattered, Willow, but I'd like to stay friends with you. (Be friends with Willow. No Romance.)
ESP.TRADUIT: Me halagas, Willow, pero preferiría que siguiéramos siendo amigos (Mantén tu amistad con Willow. Sin romance)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. I'll be sure to save all my affection for special occasions.
SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 10 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.JustFriends to 1
WLPWillowtoPChugsThanks
smooch. That's a big hug and a kiss thank you.
Set AWillowLPTimer3.KissingSequence to 1
AWFx1vDeadSea
Wait! I have a question. Are you planning to kill those officers for that Legion guy?
;tell player she doesn't wanna do it!
Forget it. I don't want to do this afterall.
Later
No. I don't have either of them.
They didn't have them? Are you sure?
AWDGimmeThatJournal
Hey, I need that! I use it all the time. There are some loose pages you can read if you want, but hands off the book, okay?

I took your Cooking Supplies. Sorry.
Hey! I need that! It's going to be difficult for me to do any cooking without it.
Set AWillow4c.TookCS to (AWillow4c.TookCS + 1)
Player.RemoveItem WillowsCookingSupplies 1 WillowREF.AddItem WillowsCookingSupplies 1 If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsRifle WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsRifle 0 endif Set WillowREF.WeaponSwap to 1
Are you teasing me?
Player.RemoveItem WillowsCookingSupplies 1 WillowREF.AddItem WillowsCookingSupplies 1 If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsRifle WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsRifle 0 endif Set WillowREF.WeaponSwap to 1
Yeah, I have your Cooking Supplies again. Sorry.
You wanted some coffee? I have one to share. Do you want it?
Oh, it's coffee! Thank you.

Player.RemoveItem WillowsColeensFamousCoffee 1 WillowREF.AddItem WillowsColeensFamousCoffee 1 Set AWillow4c.WantsCoffee to 0 StartQuest AWillow1c Set AWillow1c.WillowThirstyChatter to 1 Set AWillow1c.DoOnce to 0 Set AWillow1.OnTheGoWaterUP to 1 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerFollowDrinkWillowsCoffee
Coffee? Oh, thanks!

Player.RemoveItem WillowsColeensFamousCoffee 1 WillowREF.AddItem WillowsColeensFamousCoffee 1 Set AWillow4c.WantsCoffee to 0 StartQuest AWillow1c Set AWillow1c.WillowThirstyChatter to 1 Set AWillow1c.DoOnce to 0 Set AWillow1.OnTheGoWaterUP to 1 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerFollowDrinkWillowsCoffee
I want to talk to you about your singing.
Oh, you hate it don't you? I know, I'm a terrible singer. I do it to pass the time. It keeps me occupied. It's fun.
Set AWillow4c.SingingDiscussed to 1 Set AWillow4c.PlayerHeardSinging to 2
Oh, do you have a request?
I want to talk to you about your singing.
Why?
I want to talk to you about your singing.
Here, they're colored pencils. I thought you might like them to use in your journal.
ESP.TRADUIT: Mira, son lápices de colores. Pensé que te podría gustar usarlos en tu diario.

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're amazing! Thank you so much!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasOnePresent to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowWaitingforNextPresent to GameDaysPassed

Player.RemoveItem WillowPresentsPencilCup 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem WillowPresentsPencilCup 1 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
Here you go, it's a Magic 8-Ball. I think it will answer questions.
Thank you so much. It's so special. I love it.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasOnePresent to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowWaitingforNextPresent to GameDaysPassed

Player.RemoveItem WillowPresentsMagic8Ball 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem WillowPresentsMagic8Ball 1 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
You've been unusually quiet. Everything okay?
Oh, I don't know, I just haven't felt much like singing lately, that's all.
Yes, that sounds like fun. I'm happy to share with you.
Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Genial! Está bien; espérame aquí un segundo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set AWillow4a.PersonalCooking to 1 Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
Player.AddNote WillowsIngredientList
No, I'm not too interested in sharing. Why don't you plan to take care of your own needs.
Oh, fine.
Set AWillow4a.PersonalCooking to 1
Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
Are you happy to have J.T. along with us?
I am! I missed him after The Big Guy and I split up. Thank you so much for buying him for us. I don't miss Big George as much when he's around.

Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.JTRewardGiven to 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 12 1
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowIsBFF == 0 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 16 1 endif
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +10) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
I have ten pieces for you! Do I get something special for that?
*laughs* I don't have anything special right now, but keep the meat coming and maybe I'll find something good, you never know!

If AWillow4a.GeckoSlayerReward == 0 Set AWillow4a.InventoryGeckoCount to (AWillow4a.InventoryGeckoCount + 10) Player.RemoveItem NVGeckoMeat 10 WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem NVGeckoMeat 10 RewardXP 5
elseif AWillow4a.GeckoSlayerReward Player.RemoveItem NVGeckoMeat 10 WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem NVGeckoMeat 10 RewardXP 10 endif

Thanks! Hey, let's have gecko for dinner.

If AWillow4a.GeckoSlayerReward == 0 Set AWillow4a.InventoryGeckoCount to (AWillow4a.InventoryGeckoCount + 10) Player.RemoveItem NVGeckoMeat 10 WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem NVGeckoMeat 10 RewardXP 5
elseif AWillow4a.GeckoSlayerReward Player.RemoveItem NVGeckoMeat 10 WillowHouseSortStoveCraftingREF.AddItem NVGeckoMeat 10 RewardXP 10 endif
If WillowGeckoChallengeMsg == 0 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowGeckoSlayerWheresTheBeef Set WillowGeckoChallengeMsg to 1 endif
Here's ten pieces for you!
My name's &PCName;
Thanks, again, for your help.

SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowMeetQuest 2 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowMeetQuest 3 1 SetStage AWillowMeetQuest 2
WillowREF.AddItem WillowsAuthorityGlasses 1 Set WillowREF.WeaponSwap to 1
I have no intention of working with him if that's what you're worried about.
ESP.TRADUIT: No tengo intención de trabajar con él si eso es lo que te preocupa.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm happy to hear it, but I didn't think you would. So, what did you think of him?
We work well together. I don't want to lose you over a political difference of opinion.
This is more than politics! The legion treats women like dirt and they're slavers! They take whatever they want without consideration for anyone.
I'd never feel safe is we were spending time around them.
Yes, because he's impressed with what I've done. I don't think he's lying about that.
Yeah, right. He's a lying killer! Did you see any women in charge? All I saw were female slaves!
ESP.TRADUIT: Sí, claro. ¡Es un asesino y un mentiroso! ¿Viste a alguna mujer al mando? Todas las que ví eran esclavas!

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you want me with you while you follow him? Why would I do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Y quieres que esté contigo mientras le sigues? ¿Por qué iba a hacer eso?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I am. Deal with it.
Are you telling me I have to accept Caesar and his legion if I'm going to stay with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Me estás diciendo que tengo que aceptar a Cesar y a su legión si quiero estar contigo?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [CherchezLaFemme] Because we're destined to be together. You've known it since you first saw me.
You're right...I, I can't leave you.
But, I came here to see New Vegas, not to get involved in a war and I don't want to get involved with the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: Pero yo vine a ver New Vegas, no a involucrarme en una guerra y no quiero tener nada que ver con la legión.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. You can follow me and shut up about it or leave.
I can't believe you're talking to me like this, but if you're interested in following Caesar I guess I shouldn't be surprised.
Look, I have no intention of shutting up about this. We can talk about it or I'm going to leave. Choose now.
Leave then. (Willow leaves your game forever; good riddance)
Alright. Fuck you. I am leaving and we are never, ever, ever getting back together.
ESP.TRADUIT: Bien. Que te jodan. Me largo, y nunca, nunca, nunca volvermos a estar juntos.

AWDPRESENTCookingForYou3
<kiss> I'm glad you found me that day.
ESP.TRADUIT: <beso> Me alegro de que me encontraras aquel día.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set AWillowLPTimer2.KissingSequence to 1
Alright, calm down. Let's talk about this. (negotiations commence; Willow will stay with you)
Okay, but why do I want to get involved in this war, and why on the side of the legion?
I'm not going to work with him, but he was much more reasonable than I expected him to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: No voy a trabajar para él, pero me pareció mucho más razonable de lo que me esperaba.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, right? I expected him to be a slobbering, yelling maniac, but he wasn't so bad.
Don't get me wrong, he didn't win me over. He just wasn't as bad, or scary, as I expected him to be.
He's smart and articulate. It was interesting to talk to him.
Interesting. I didn't expect that. Smart, yeah, but I expected you to tell me he's a raving monster.
He's a bossy motherfucker, that's for sure. I'd like to kill him.
That's a great idea! You'd be a hero!
[Strength] I'll protect you. You have nothing to be afraid of while I'm with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [Fuerza] Te protegeré. No tienes nada que temer mientras esté contigo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'll trust you to keep me safe.
But, I came here to see New Vegas, not to get involved in a war and I don't want to get involved with the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: Pero yo vine a ver New Vegas, no a involucrarme en una guerra y no quiero tener nada que ver con la legión.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Intelligence] And the NCR doesn't "take whatever it wants without consideration for anyone?"
How can you say that? They aren't like the legion. They don't turn people into slaves!
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Cómo puedes decir eso? No son como la legión. ¡No esclavizan a la gente!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe not. But they came into the Mojave and took what they wanted. They weren't invited.
ESP.TRADUIT: Tal vez no. Pero vinieron al Mojave y se llevaron lo que quisieron. Nadie los invitó.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand. How is coming into the Mojave the same as making someone a slave?
ESP.TRADUIT: No lo entiendo, ¿Como puedes decir que venir al Mojave es igual que esclavizar a alguien?

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR have forced themselves onto the Mojave. The Mojave didn't choose. Just like a slave doesn't.
I've never heard anyone compare the NCR to slavers before.
So will you stay?
Yeah, let's see how it goes. I like you a lot, and I'd rather be with you than argue about politics.
But, I came here to see New Vegas, not to get involved in a war and I don't want to get involved with the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: Pero yo vine a ver New Vegas, no a involucrarme en una guerra y no quiero tener nada que ver con la legión.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I will. I love you, and I'd rather be with you than argue about politics.
But, I came here to see New Vegas, not to get involved in a war and I don't want to get involved with the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: Pero yo vine a ver New Vegas, no a involucrarme en una guerra y no quiero tener nada que ver con la legión.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Willow, stay with me because you like me. That's more important than politics any day.
You're right. I do care more about friendship than politics and I don't want to fight about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: Tienes razón. Me importa más la amistad que la política y no quiero discutir sobre el tema.

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, I came here to see New Vegas, not to get involved in a war and I don't want to get involved with the legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: Pero yo vine a ver New Vegas, no a involucrarme en una guerra y no quiero tener nada que ver con la legión.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to hear more about where you grew up, Willow.
The trees around Jacobstown remind me of home. You already know about the caravans, but hunting's a big thing in Klamath too.
I didn't mind. It was fine.
Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Genial! Está bien; espérame aquí un segundo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say, yes!
Oh, yes! Absolutely!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PillowTalk to 1 Set AWillow1.GuardAlert to 0 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set AWillow1.Relaxin to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp

Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PillowTalk to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.LftbYes to 0 Set AWillow1.GuardAlert to 0 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set AWillow1.Relaxin to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp
Oh, not right now, honey, I'm not really in the mood. Soon, though, I promise.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.LftbNo to 0
You want to, don't you?
Say, yes!
Oh, yes! Absolutely!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.PillowTalk to 1 Set AWillow1.GuardAlert to 0 Set WillowREF.Waiting to 0 Set AWillow1.Relaxin to 0 Set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 WillowREF.evp

Oh, not right now, honey, I'm not really in the mood. Soon, though, I promise.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.LftbNo to 0
You want to, don't you?
This is just temporary, Willow. We'll go back.
Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Genial! Está bien; espérame aquí un segundo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: AWDGimmeMyStuff
Did you have fun going through my stuff? I hope so, but I need these things back.
Are you teasing me?
I want you to follow me again.
ESP.TRADUIT: Quiero que me sigas otra vez.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark!

That's for me, isn't it?
I have another present for you. I found it.
I'd love to hear how much you liked it, or didn't, so come back and tell me, okay?

Do you want to know how I liked my present?
Yes, I do. Tell me.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowCanScavenge to 2
I loved it! Thank you. Those exploding Teddy Bears were great. Do you know how I can get more?
I thought you'd like those, aren't they fun? I didn't tell you the scariest part. I made them! I thought you might not use them if I told you that.
I can give you this so you can make them and I'll keep looking for the parts you'll need. Oh, and I wanted to ask you something else.
Would you like to finally see my collection? I keep talking about it but I still haven't shown it to you.
Set AWillow4a.ShowedCollection to 1
AddNote SchematicsWillowsTeddyBearCharges WillowsFourthContainerREF.OpenTeammateContainer 1
I didn't like it at all. Sorry.
Oh, I got it that wrong. Hmm. Well, I have something else you might like. Here.
Would you like to see my collection, finally? I keep talking about it but still haven't shown it to you.

You definitely chose the right kind of thing. Thank you.

Would you like to see my collection, finally? I keep talking about it but still haven't shown it to you.

Do you have anything better to give me?

AWDftbTheApproach
I'm ready.
;defunct topic098 replaced this
Yes, Willow? Is this about us?
I'm ready.
I'm ready for us to be more than just friends.
Set AWillow4c.Flirting to 3
Now? Now's a terrible time! But, I want to! We'll have to do it later.
I'll be waiting for you.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.ReturnForFTB to 1
Yes! I've been waiting for you to come to me!
Well, I'm here now. I have a surprise for you and would love some privacy. Should we do it here or go some place else?
Let's do it here.
I'm so excited. I've been planning this for awhile. I hope you like it. Stay right there and don't move.
I'm going to do something for you and then to you.

I'm so excited. I've been planning this for awhile. I hope you like it. Stay right there and don't move.

Now that we're best friends do we have some things to talk about?
Yes, absolutely!
I want you to go home for awhile...
ESP.TRADUIT: Quiero que te vayas a casa un tiempo...

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's time for us to part ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: Es hora de que nos separemos.

ESP.ORIGINAL: <whine>
JTref.SetPlayerTeammate 0 JTref.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction JTref.RemoveFromFaction TeammateFaction JTref.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 0 JTref.IgnoreCrime 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: <whine>

ESP.TRADUIT: Quiero que vayas a la suite del Lucky 38 y me esperes allí.

ESP.ORIGINAL: <whine>
JTref.MoveToMarkerWithFade L38SuiteCompanionMarker01REF Set JTref.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set JTref.IsFollowingLong to 0 JTref.evp Set JTref.Waiting to 1 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowJTArrivedL38
AWDTimedzToB4thResp11
No, there's nothing bad waiting for you. No punishment. You're a good man. You deserve peace of mind and a good life. That's what you deserve.
Oh, no! Bethie got killed by Geckos!
No, only Big George got killed by Geckos.
So, what did happen to Bethie?
Yes, it's almost time to go. Let's talk now.
Are you worried at all about dying? I'm worried about you and me too. It's scary to think both of us might not make it through this.
I have some more work to do before we'll go to The Dam, can we talk later?
Okay.
I'm not too worried about it. I think we have the advantage of strength on our side.
I'm glad you're feeling confident about our chances, and you must feel committed to your cause to be risking your life.
Of course! It's scary as hell! But we'll be okay.
What do you mean?
I want to make sure you know how I feel about you, just in case one of us doesn't make it through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: Quiero asegurarme de que sepas lo que siento, por si acaso tú o yo no sobreviviéramos a esto.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been a great friend to me, like the sister I never had and I love you.
ESP.TRADUIT: Has sido una gran amiga, como la hermana que nunca tuve, y te quiero.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to make sure you know how I feel about you, just in case one of us doesn't make it through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: Quiero asegurarme de que sepas lo que siento, por si acaso tú o yo no sobreviviéramos a esto.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been a great friend to me and I love you very much.
I want to make sure you know how I feel about you, just in case one of us doesn't make it through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: Quiero asegurarme de que sepas lo que siento, por si acaso tú o yo no sobreviviéramos a esto.

ESP.ORIGINAL: And?
Well, when it occurred to me that you might die I got so sad!
I love you so much. I was thinking, if we both make it through this maybe we could talk about making our relationship a more serious one.
Maybe we could talk about staying together forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: Tal vez podamos hablar sobre quedarnos aquí para siempre.

ESP.ORIGINAL: But for now, I want you to take this and wear it. Maybe it'll keep you safe.
Think of it as my promise to you that I'll love you forever no matter what. Because I do and I will. I'll be wearing one too.

If Player.GetEquipped WillowPlayerPresentsKeyNecklace Player.AddItem WillowPlayerPresentsKeyRingNecklace 1 Else Player.AddItem WillowPlayerPresentsRingNecklace 1 endif
WillowREF.AddItem WillowsNecklaceRivenplusRing 1

I want to make sure you know I love you very much. You've been a wonderful friend to me. Thank you.
I do! Thanks for the ones you've given me so far.
You're welcome!
Well, you're spoiling me Willow. It's too much.
Do you want me to stop? I will if you want me to.
Yeah, that would be best. (turns gift giving in the mailbox off)
Okay.
Set AWillowFreeform.MailboxPresents to 8
No, please don't. It's a lot, but I like it. (Willow will continue to leave gifts in the mailbox)
Okay.
Now that we're best friends are you willing to change your clothes?
Okay, I don't know what all this fuss is about, but yes, if you're tired of seeing me in this outfit, I'm willing to change it. Happy?

You wanted to talk after we left The Fort. What is it?
I need to know how committed you are to Caesar.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnAdios to 1 If AWillow4b.KillCaesar == 1 Set AWillow4b.KillCaesar to 2 Elseif AWillow4b.KillCaesar == 2 Set AWillow4b.KillCaesar to 3 endif
We need to talk before you do anything to Caesar, but we can't talk here. Please talk to me before you do anything.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnAdios to 1 Set AWillow4b.KillCaesar to 2
Maybe we can. Let's find whoever's in charge around here and ask.
Great! I'd like that. Things are a mess around here.
ANPCBoonecombatshoutout
All mine!
What?
The memorial reminded me of my brother, Chuck. From the time he was little all he wanted to do was join the NCR and become a Ranger.
My dad wouldn't let him do it, though.
Why wouldn't your dad let him do it?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Por qué no le dejó tu padre hacerlo?

ESP.ORIGINAL: He didn't want Chuck to die fighting for the NCR. Dad wanted him safe at home, which it turns out he didn't get after all.
Chuck's a caravan guard now. He loves it. I think he thrives on danger.
He almost died a few years ago in a fight, but he has this big scar to show for it.
The thing is the scar's left him dangerous looking and he knows it so he plays it up and acts tough. He's a handful, but girls love him.
Heh. Willow you didn't stay home safe either!
Yeah, you're right. My dad did mention Chuck when I told him what I wanted to do.
I can understand why he wanted to protect Chuck. It'd be hard to lose a child.
Yeah, and if I ever have a baby, and I want to someday, I hope he or she won't do the crazy stuff Chuck and I do.
I'd worry myself sick.
Your dad should have let Chuck go fight. There's honor in fighting.
Yeah? And death? If I ever have kids, and I'd like to someday, I'd want to keep them safe too.
ANPCbTowResp01
Not my strong suit, but okay.
ANPCbTowResp02
Maybe some other time.
ANPCbTowResp03
I dunno, couldn't hurt.
ANPCbTowResp04
I'm met Carla while I was at the Strip on leave. She said I looked lost.
ANPCbTowResp05
Pointless.
ANPCbTowResp06
That's what I do best.
ANPCbTowResp07
We can do that.
ANPCbTowResp08
Yeah, I guess.
ANPCbTowResp09
No, sorry.
ANPCbTowResp10
We can do that.
ANPCbTowResp11
I've got bad things coming to me.
Is there something going on between you and Boone?
No, not at all. I'm just being nice to him because he's so sad and tortured. Poor guy.
Set AWillow4a.BoonieJealous to 2
Is there something going on between you and Boone?
Well, I do like him a lot. He's brave and handsome. I feel so sorry for him. He's so tortured. I just wish I could help him.
Set AWillow4a.BoonieJealous to 2
Yes, let's do it. The bungalow could use some work.
Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Genial! Está bien; espérame aquí un segundo.

What's with all the pencils? You've got about ten of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿A que viene eso de los lápices? Debes tener unos diez.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like pencils.
You like pencils?
I do write in my journal. But, have you noticed when you need one it's never there? Well, if you have ten, or more, there's never a problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: Suelo escribir en mi diario. ¿Te has fijado en que cuando necesitas uno nunca lo encuentras? Bueno, pues si tienes diez o más eso nunca será un problema.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set AWillow4a.PencilChallengeUnlocked to 1
I notice you have a lot of dog biscuits too. Why so many of those?
ESP.TRADUIT: Me he fijado en que también llevas galletitas para perros. ¿Para qué tantas?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love them! I made up the recipe for Big George, my dog, but they're so tasty I carry a bunch with me all the time. They're my favorite snack.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Me encantan! Inventé la receta para Big George, mi perro, pero están tan sabrosas que siempre llevo unas cuantas encima. Son mi snack favorito.

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're good, huh? Can I try one?
Oh, please do. We can always make more.
ESP.TRADUIT: Ah, claro, toma. Siempre puedo hacer más.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
WillowRef.RemoveItem WillowsDoggieTreats 1 Player.AddItem WillowsDoggieTreats 1
Hmm. Think I'll pass on the dog's food.
ESP.TRADUIT: Hmm. Creo que paso en lo de la comida de perro.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why? I cook them properly. I make them with Gecko meat, Blamco Mac & Cheese and flour. It's not like I make them with Salisbury Steak. Ugh.
Oh, well, that's alright then.
Thanks.
Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
You might want to consider a name change for them. Dog Biscuits isn't so appetizing, is it?
I think I'll leave it for now. In remembrance of Big George.
Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
It's a teddy bear. I hope you like it.
I do, thanks!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasOnePresent to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowWaitingforNextPresent to GameDaysPassed

Player.RemoveItem TeddyBear01 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem TeddyBear01 1 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
I found a garden gnome. Don't you think he'll go nicely with Moira and Chester?
Yes, I do! Thank you.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasOnePresent to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowWaitingforNextPresent to GameDaysPassed

Player.RemoveItem GardenGnome01 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem GardenGnome01 1 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
It's a Nuka Cola Quartz.
Thank you! I'm going to drink that right away!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasOnePresent to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowWaitingforNextPresent to GameDaysPassed

Player.RemoveItem NVNukaColaQuartz 1 StartQuest AWillow1c Set AWillow1c.WillowThirstyChatter to 1 Set AWillow1c.DoOnce to 0 Set AWillow1.OnTheGoWaterUP to 1 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerFollowDrinkWillowsCoffee
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
[Change mind] Um, oops, I guess I don't have something to give you after all. I'm sorry, Willow.
Oh. okay.
Uh-oh, am I in trouble?
May I please have my Lucky Figurine back? You know, I didn't show you my collection so you could ransack it.
Can I keep it? Please? I'll take good care of it. I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Puedo quedármelo? ¿Por favor? Lo cuidaré bien. Lo prometo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, you know, you can have it. I got it from a trader and it's never been especially dear to me. Maybe you'll like it more than I have.
I was just curious about it. You can have it back now. Where did you get it?
I got that from a trader. I don't find everything I have. Moira came from a caravaner who used to stay with us in the motel, but she was a gift.
Player.RemoveItem WillowsLuckyBobblehead 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem WillowsLuckyBobblehead 1
Thank you.
But, the lighter? I definitely want that. It was my grandfather's.
Player.RemoveItem WillowsAngelLighter 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem WillowsAngelLighter 1
AWDTentComments
Oh, there's our tent! We should camp there some night. I'll cook us dinner. It'd be fun.
Set AWillow4a.WillowHeardCliff to 1 ;The next time player goes into tent and asks ;her to cook she'll set the table for a celebration
Look! It's where you first found me! It looks so boring for such a special place.
Set AWillow4c.DoOnce9 to 1; toggle variable
I have some to share. Here, have one of mine.
Thanks!
Player.RemoveItem WillowsDoggieTreats 1
That sounds good. I don't want to stop right now.
Okay, fine.
Yes, I want you gone. (This choice removes her from your game forever in prep for removing mod)
ESP.TRADUIT: Sí, quiero que te largues. (esta opción la elimina del juego para siempre, en preparación para desinstalar el mod)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, goodbye. I don't know what else to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: Pues adiós. No sé que más puedo decir.

endif
Maybe later.
Great! I'd like that. Things are a mess around here.
No, Willow, I don't want to help the NCR troops.
Okay, it's up to you.
Do you know exactly what you want or do you plan to just wander around? The Mojave's a big place.
Oh, I know what I want and where we should go to get it. When I was at the Mojave Outpost I picked up a NCR pamphlet.
It talks about the flora and fauna of the Mojave and where to find stuff. It's very informative.
I've planned our little mission based on what I've read in the pamphlet. Hopefully it won't send us on a wild goose chase.
The first place we're headed to is Ruby Hill Mine to get a couple of Banana Yucca plants.
SetStage AWillowFreeform 1
I've got the Banana Yucca plants. Where to now?
The next place on my list is Silver Peak Mine. It's up the road a ways. We should find Xander Root plants there.
Set AWillow4a.DoOnce9 to 2 SetStage AWillowFreeform 2
Got the Xander Root Plants. What's next?
I've been thinking I'd like to have some Cave Fungus inside the bungalow where it'd be all glowy. The pamphlet says there's some in Charleston Cave.
Set AWillow4a.DoOnce10 to 2 SetStage AWillowFreeform 3
I've got the Cave Fungus. Where are we headed to now?
We're going after Broc Flower plants. It's quite a long way; south of a trainyard according to the pamphlet.
Too bad we can't grow our own pinyon nuts, huh? That'd make life easier.
Set AWillow4a.DoOnce12 to 2 SetStage AWillowFreeform 4
Are we going to be carrying much else? Those broc flower plants are big.
Well, that's it for plants. The last thing I want is a mailbox. You never know, if we have one, maybe we'll get some mail!
I know that probably sounds really silly.
But when I was little me and my friends would leave each other notes and presents in our mailboxes. I can't imagine having a house without one.
Set AWillow4a.DoOnce13 to 2 SetStage AWillowFreeform 5
AWFFreeformQuestStage6
Look at the pink bird! We have to take that, don't you think? It would look great next to the planters!
Okay, I got the pink bird for you.
I think that's it! I'm not sure we could carry much more than this.
Wanna go back to the bungalow now? We can get everything set up.
Set AWillow4a.DoOnce9 to 2 SetStage AWillowFreeform 7
AWFFreeformQuestStage100comp
Look at the cave fungus! It looks great, doesn't it?
Okay, I got the pink bird for you.
AWFStarBottleCapsSSHQ
Is this it? Do you think this is the treasure? Disappointing, right? Don't get me wrong, the gnome's cute, but its not what I'd hoped we'd find.
But, you know, the trip doesn't have to be a total waste.
If you pick up a couple of those badges and bring me some duct tape I'll turn them into something we can wear.
You can do that?
Sure, I stuck the flower on my hat and it's stayed there for months. So, if you're interested bring me two badges and a roll of duct tape.
Here are the badges and duct tape. Can you make us badges now?
Sure! This is so easy to do I can do it right now.
It'll just take me a second, so hold on.
ESP.TRADUIT: Sólo me llevará un segundo, espera.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem SSHQDeputyBadge 2 Player.RemoveItem DuctTape 1 ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX
PlaySound WillowTape Set WillowSSGnomePickup to 4
AWDJTDied
Oh, no! J.T.! No! He's dead!
ANPCbTowResp12
Alright.
Yeah, that's a great idea.
Thank you!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasOnePresent to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowWaitingforNextPresent to GameDaysPassed

If RaulREF.GetItemCount FancyLadsSnackCakes > 0 Set AWillow4a.RaulFLSC to RaulREF.GetItemCount FancyLadsSnackCakes endif

No, I want you to have it Willow.
Okay. Thank you!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasOnePresent to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowWaitingforNextPresent to GameDaysPassed

Player.RemoveItem FancyLadsSnackCakes 1 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
ANPCRaulSweetGiftResponse
How did you know I had a sweet tooth, boss?
Sounds great.
It will be. I promise.

Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.FTBisOn to 1 If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsRifle WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsRifle 0 endif WillowREF.RemoveAllTypedItems WillowsFU2weaponsBoxREF 0 1 40 Set WillowREF.WeaponSwap to 1 If AWillowLPftbTimer.NoDance == 0 PlaySound WillowFTB endif PipBoyRadioOff StartQuest AWillowLPftbTimer
Two months? That long, huh?
We've been together for two months now! I got you a present to celebrate. It's in the kitchen on the counter.
Set AWillowFreeform.SixtyDays to 2
Thank you, Willow.
I want you to know. I love you very much. More every day.
WillowHouse90PresentBoxREF.Enable 0
ANPCbTowResp13
I'd really like my beret back, please.
Don't worry about it, Willow. I can handle Red Lucy.
Are you sure? I don't trust her.
Oh, come on Willow it'd be fun!
No, I don't want to join you in a threesome with her! What I want to do is go home. I thought you loved me!
AWDx1Prostitutes
You know there are girls here, right? Ones you can pay for sex. You wouldn't do that would you?
You wouldn't have a problem with that would you? It's not like we're married.
Fine. You're right, we're not married. Go ahead and keep sleeping with whoever you want, you should be happy.
It's just, you know, I thought we had something special.
I like my freedom, Willow. You should go on home,
Fine. I'm going home.
Set AWillow4a.RedLucySexBreak to 3 Set AWillow4a.FirstDaySexBreak to GameDaysPassed Set AWillow4a.PCsexpartners to 1

Elseif vNPCFollowers.bSuiteAvailable
WillowREF.MoveToMarkerWithFade L38SuiteCompanionMarker01REF set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1.GuardAlert to 0 Set AWillow1.Relaxin to 1 WillowREF.evp Set WillowREF.Waiting to 1 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowGoneL38
Else

endif
Willow, I didn't realize it was so important to you. I don't need anyone but you. Okay?
Why?
Because he's evil and if the legion wins the war they'll destroy everything that's good in the Mojave. You can stop it.
If you kill Caesar now you will destroy the legion. You have to consider it.
No, way!
It's the best option for the Mojave. The legion will destroy everything here. You know that's the truth.
Remember that chatty robot in the closet in Benny's room? He offered to help you take over New Vegas and make it your own.
If you do that you can make things right for New Vegas and the Mojave. You'd be a hero.
It's the best option for the Mojave. The legion will destroy everything here. You know that's the truth.
If you do that you can make things right for New Vegas and the Mojave. You'd be a hero.
No, way!
What? Why would I do that?
Killing Caesar won't destroy the legion.
Okay, maybe it won't destroy it, but it will weaken it, and you can leave them, and if you must fight in this war fight it another way.
Remember that chatty robot? The one in the closet in Benny's room? He offered to help you take over New Vegas and make it your own.
If you do that you can make things right for New Vegas and the entire Mojave. You'd be a hero.
Okay, maybe it won't destroy it, but it will weaken it, and you can leave them, and if you must fight in this war fight it another way.
If you do that you can make things right for New Vegas and the entire Mojave. You'd be a hero.
Killing Caesar won't destroy the legion.
ANPCRaulcombatshoutout
Yeah, yeah, time for more fighting, I know.
That's it! You've gone too far! I should tell you to leave and never come back!
Oh, I'm sorry! Don't make me go! I love you! I take it back!
Oh, I'm sorry! Please, don't make me go! I take it back!
You've gone too far and you're going to pay the price! (kill her)
What?
SetEssential Willow 0
I'll think about it.
Thank you.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnAdios to 1
You're so unhappy, just go. I do love you, but this will be better for both of us. (leaves forever)
Okay. You know, I could never leave you on my own, but, you're right, it's probably for the best.
I do love you.

Okay, which one?

Sure, I'd love to.

Nothing, I just thought you might like to talk about your problems. Willow warned me you were quiet.
Yeah.
Let's talk about what you do for me when we fight together, okay?
Sure.
Are you trying to tell me something? You've been flirting with me for awhile now.
It's true, I have been flirting.
You are not making this easy for me! You know I want you, right?
Yes, I know. I feel the same way.
You must know by now how much I like you. And if you don't know, let me say it again. I do like you.
You do? I'm so glad. You'd said so before, and you've done so many nice things for me, that, I'd hoped you still did. But, I wasn't sure.
You do know, as soon as you give me the ok, I'm going to be all over you. And I mean, ALL over you.
Oh. Maybe we should do something about that. Soon.
How soon Willow? Now? Because I want it to be now. Come here.
Soon is good, but I want you to be ready. I'll be here when you decide to come to me.
I'll come to you when I'm ready, I promise.
Set AWillow4c.Flirting to 2
Yes, I still do like you. Will you come here and let me show you how much?
Yes! I've been thinking about this for a long, long time.
And because I've been thinking about it for so long I've had time to plan something special for you.
I'd like to do it somewhere private. But, you choose. Should we do it here or go somewhere else?
I do still like you, a lot, but I want you to come to me. Whenever you're ready I'll be here.
I'll come to you when I'm ready, I promise.
Set AWillow4c.Flirting to 2
Are we going to do something about it or are you going to keep flirting forever?
I'm not ready yet. When I am I'll come to you, I promise.
Set AWillow4c.Flirting to 2
Great. Let's do something about it. Come here and let me show you how much I want you.
Let's go somewhere else. Come on.
Lead the way, Lover.

Player.RemoveItem WillowTeddyBearsSouthwest 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem WillowTeddyBearsSouthwest 1
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
I'd like to rent the deluxe bungalow.
Well, I think that's a fine idea. I'll give you a good flat rate, and you can stay as long as you like. Least till the busy season comes. Sound good?
Here's 150 caps.
I'm glad you can stay with us.
Player.AddItem WillowNovacBungalowKey 1 Player.RemoveItem Caps001 150 Set AWillow4a.JMbungalow to 1
I can't afford 150 caps right now.
Well that's nothing to be ashamed of. We all have money troubles from time to time.
You just come on back when you can afford it, and that room's all yours.
Nevermind.
Oh. Well, all right.
I'd like to rent the deluxe bungalow on the end.
That's a great idea.
Here's 150 caps.
Great! Here ya go.
Player.AddItem WillowNovacBungalowKey 1 Player.RemoveItem Caps001 150 Set AWillow4a.Cliffbungalow to 2
I can't afford 150 caps right now.
Need anything else?
Nevermind.
Need anything else?
Willow, are you coming on to me?
Yeah, I..yeah, I guess I am.
Yeah, I want to help him every way I can.
I just can't get over it. That you believe in him.
I'm getting tired of you complaining about it. Why don't you leave already?
Do you want me to go?
Yes, forever. (Willow leaves your game. You can't get her back).
Alright. Fuck you. I am leaving and we are never, ever, ever getting back together.
ESP.TRADUIT: Bien. Que te jodan. Me largo, y nunca, nunca, nunca volvermos a estar juntos.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
WillowREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 WillowREF.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction WillowREF.RemoveFromFaction PlayerFaction WillowREF.RemoveFromFaction TeammateFaction Player.RemoveFromFaction WillowsTentFaction Player.RemovePerk SilverTongue WillowREF.removeperk CompanionSuite WillowREF.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 0 WillowREF.IgnoreCrime 0 Set WillowREF.HasBeenHired to 0 Set AWillowCoffee.FiredOnce to 1 Set WillowREF.Fired to 1

;;;; Fails Beauty And The Toys If GetStageDone AWillowMeetQuest 7 == 0 SetStage AWillowMeetQuest 110 endif
;;;; Fails She Likes Me, She Likes Me Not... If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 9 == 0 || GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 10 == 0 SetStage AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 110 endif
;;;; Fails Rock 'Em, Sock 'Em Willow If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 6 == 1 CompleteAllObjectives AWillowUnarmedTraining CompleteQuest AWillowUnarmedTraining StopQuest AWillowUnarmedTraining ElseIf GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowUnarmedTraining 6 == 0 SetStage AWillowUnarmedTraining 110 endif
;;;; Fails Coffee Quest If GetQuestRunning AWillowCoffee If GetObjectiveCompleted AWillowCoffee 10 == 0 SetStage AWillowCoffee 110 endif endif
;;;; Fails Shopping Quest If GetQuestRunning AWillowShoppingQuest SetStage AWillowShoppingQuest 110 endif
;;;; Fails Freeform Quest If GetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowFreeform 1 == 0 || GetObjectiveDisplayed AWillowFreeform 1 == 1 If GetQuestCompleted AWillowFreeform == 0 SetStage AWillowShoppingQuest 110 endif endif
Yes, go home. I'll catch up with you later.
Alright. I'll see you there later.
No, but I could stand less complaining from you about the Legion.
I'm sorry. I did tell you I wasn't thrilled about being involved with Caesar. Don't forget I love you, okay? It's why I'm here.
No, I want you to stay with me.
I want that too.
Well, I do. Follow me, follow him. That's the way it's going to be.
Okay, don't forget I love you. That's why I stay.
Yes, why?
I don't want to have anything to do with that. It's one thing to kill people who are trying to kill us, but to go in cold...
I'm gonna sit this one out. I'll be waiting for you at home.

WillowREF.MoveToMarkerWithFade WillowsHouseMarkerREF set WillowREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 set WillowREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set AWillow1.GuardAlert to 0 Set AWillow1.SleepOnBedroll to 0 Set AWillow1.GoHome to 1 Set AWillow1.Relaxin to 1 WillowREF.evp Set WillowREF.Waiting to 1 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowGoneHOME
No.
Oh, okay.
Hunting?
Yeah, geckos, mostly. That's why my dad taught me to shoot as soon as I could handle a weapon. He was looking to train us to be hunters.
He didn't really like doing all the hunting for the motel himself so he was looking for help from us kids.
I didn't like hunting all the time though, I preferred hanging out and working with my mom in the motel so that was my job.
Dad got his wish though, two of my brothers really took to hunting. That's Sam and Dean.
What about your other brothers?
Val's a doctor, Chuck's a caravan guard and my little brother, Bobby? He's probably running around still being useless most of the time.
Do you ever get lonely traveling by yourself?
Yes, I do, even though I'm rarely alone. I had hoped to meet someone special. Maybe someone who would want to come with me on the road.
Or maybe someone would like me enough to want me stay with them. But even though I've met and traveled with a lot of people in the last two years,
I have been unlucky in love and friendship.
I'm sorry. I'm sure it will happen for you someday.
Yeah? I hope so.
Set AWillow4a.PersonalRonery to 1
Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
Maybe you'll get lucky sooner than you think.
Yeah? Ya, think?
Set AWillow4a.PersonalRonery to 1
Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
What? Sorry, I got distracted by something over there behind you. You were saying?
Oh, nevermind. I was just rambling. It wasn't important.
Set AWillow4a.PersonalRonery to 1
Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 1)
You're welcome.
So you're serious about having me stay here in the Mojave with you?
Yes, I am, very much.
This means a lot to me. Thank you.

Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.HouseMarkerBFF to 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 12 1
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowIsBFF == 0 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 15 1 endif
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +10) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
This means a lot to me. Thank you.
And I love the bungalow. It reminds me of home so much. I know I'm going to be very happy here.

Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.HouseMarkerBFF to 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 12 1
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowIsBFF == 0 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 15 1 endif
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +10) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
If AWillowFreeform.BungalowMarked == 0 Set AWillowFreeform.BungalowMarked to 1 endif
Yes, I am, very much.
Sure. If you want to stay that would be fine with me. I'm happy to have you share my house with me.
Thank you.

Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.HouseMarkerBFF to 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 12 1
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowIsBFF == 0 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 15 1 endif
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +10) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
Thank you.
And I love the bungalow. It reminds me of home so much. I know I'm going to be very happy here.

Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.HouseMarkerBFF to 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 12 1
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowIsBFF == 0 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 15 1 endif
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +10) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
If AWillowFreeform.BungalowMarked == 0 Set AWillowFreeform.BungalowMarked to 1 endif
Sure. If you want to stay that would be fine with me. I'm happy to have you share my house with me.
Having you here will make things easier for me while we're traveling together.
Oh. Well, thanks.

Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.HouseMarkerBFF to 1 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 12 1
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowIsBFF == 0 SetObjectiveCompleted AWillowLikesPlayerQuest 15 1 endif

Thank you.
And I love the bungalow. It reminds me of home so much. I know I'm going to be very happy here.

If AWillowFreeform.BungalowMarked == 0 Set AWillowFreeform.BungalowMarked to 1 endif
Having you here will make things easier for me while we're traveling together.
AWDTimedGoodsprings
You don't seem to mind coming back here at all. But if I'd been shot, and buried, and left for dead somewhere I don't think I'd go back.
Are you going to show me where you were buried? Oh, sorry I could have said that better. I'm just really curious.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Vas a enseñarme donde te enterraron? Oh, lo siento, ha sonado algo mal. Es que tengo curiosidad.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set AWillow4c.BurialSite to 1
I'd like to go see Chet and do some shopping while we're here.
If we're gonna go see Chet, I'm gonna need to borrow some caps.
Want to take me out for a drink or a bite to eat in the Saloon? What do you say?
Wanna go by the Saloon for a drink? I bet Sunny'd like to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Quieres tomar algo en el Saloon? Seguro que a Sunny le gustaría.

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a nice little town, but you know what it needs? A motel. Everything's better with a motel.
ESP.TRADUIT: Este pueblecito está bien, pero ¿sabes qué le hace falta? Un motel. Todo es mejor con un motel.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Waiting, watching the stars above. Hoping that I could win back your love.
Set AWillow4c.PlayerHeardSinging to 1
*hums*
I'm so blue without you, thought our love was true, then you found someone new.
Set AWillow4c.PlayerHeardSinging to 1
*sings with no words*
Like a fella once said, ain't that a kick in the head.
Set AWillow4c.PlayerHeardSinging to 1
AWDBurialSite
He buried you in the cemetery. Ouch.
AWDTimedTheFort
I can't be the only one wondering if we're going to come out of this okay. We could end up dead. Or worse.
Set AWillow4b.CaesarFirstTalk to (AWillow4b.CaesarFirstTalk + 1)
Huh. Well, if this camp is any indication, Caesar's the monster I've always heard he is. Look at this place.
Set AWillow4b.CaesarFirstTalk to (AWillow4b.CaesarFirstTalk + 1)
Those poor girls.
Can't say I like how they treat their women around here.
I'm not taking anything out of here...these guys and their crosses? I'm not messing with them.
*nervous humming*
Be nice to get back out on the road again.
Wow! Look at those legs! Ugh! But he's just a slaving s- I can't wait to get out of here.
You know, if I ever build a fort, the first thing I'm going to put up is some crucified bodies. They're just so...welcoming.
A month? That long, huh?
Yes! We've been together for a month now and I have a present for you to celebrate!
Set AWillowFreeform.ThirtyDays to 2
Well, it's been a month since we sealed our friendship! And I have a present for you to celebrate! I hope you like it!
Set AWillowFreeform.ThirtyDays to 2 Player.AddItem WillowPlayerPresentBracelet 1
Thank you, Willow.
It's kind of corny and romantic.
Hopefully you'll like it enough to wear it because I want you to think of me every time you do and remember this:
You hold the key to my heart and I love you very much.
Player.AddItem WillowPlayerPresentsKeyNecklace 1
Thank you, Willow.
You're welcome. I hope you like it.
AWFMQEndgameOthers
We're almost to the end aren't we? I mean to the battle at The Dam. I want to talk to you before we go.
Set AWillow4a.SolemnAdios to 1
Here, it's a little toy horse. When I saw it, I thought of you. I hope you like it.
Ah! That's amazing! Thank you so much!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasOnePresent to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowWaitingforNextPresent to GameDaysPassed

Player.RemoveItem WillowPresentsWWButtercup 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem WillowPresentsWWButtercup 1 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
I don't know if we'll go back or not, Willow. We'll see.
Oh, okay.
This is for you. It's a lacey teddy bear.
Thank you so much. It's so special. I love it!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasOnePresent to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowWaitingforNextPresent to GameDaysPassed

Player.RemoveItem WillowPresentsTeddyBearLaceNovac 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem WillowPresentsTeddyBearLaceNovac 1 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
Look! It's a tiny teddy bear!
Thank you so much. It's so special. I love it!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasOnePresent to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowWaitingforNextPresent to GameDaysPassed

Player.RemoveItem WillowPresentsTeddyTinyFuzzy 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem WillowPresentsTeddyTinyFuzzy 1 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
Here you go, it's a red toaster. Do you like it?
Thank you so much. It's so special. I love it!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasOnePresent to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowWaitingforNextPresent to GameDaysPassed

Player.RemoveItem WillowPresentsToaster 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem WillowPresentsToaster 1 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
Here, it's a bottle of perfume. I hope you like it.
Thank you so much. It's so special. I love it!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasOnePresent to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowWaitingforNextPresent to GameDaysPassed

Player.RemoveItem WillowPresentsPerfume 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem WillowPresentsPerfume 1 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
Look! It's a giant panda bear!
Ah! That's amazing! Thank you so much!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasOnePresent to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowWaitingforNextPresent to GameDaysPassed

Player.RemoveItem WillowPresentsV34Teddy 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem WillowPresentsV34Teddy 1 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
Here you go, it's the Sunset Sarsaparilla garden gnome. I want you to have it.
Thank you so much. It's so special. I love it!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasOnePresent to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowWaitingforNextPresent to GameDaysPassed

Player.RemoveItem WillowPresentsSSGardenGnome 1 WillowsFourthContainerREF.AddItem WillowPresentsSSGardenGnome 1 If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
[Charisma] You're my girl, Willow, I won't forget you for one moment. Say you'll do it.
Alright, you sweet talker, I'll do it. This might turn out to be fun for both of us. I hope you know I'd only ever do something like this for you.

If Player.GetInCell OVWestSewers03d Set AWillow4b.Threesome to 1 Set AWillow4b.ThreesomeRLucy to 1 Elseif Player.GetInCell 2EOVault21 Set AWillow4b.Threesome to 1 Set AWillow4b.ThreesomeSarah to 1 endif
I have a special present for you. I think you're going to really love this!
A present? What is it?
I have a special present for you. I think you're going to really love this!
Sure, I'll give you some caps for that.
Thanks!

If Player.GetItemCount Caps001 >= 20 Player.RemoveItem Caps001 20 WillowREF.AddItem Caps001 20
If WillowREF.GetInCell WestsideCoop Set AWillow4c.IsBuying to 1 Set AWillow4a.ShoppingWestsideCoop to 1 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerShoppingWestsideCoop
ElseIf WillowREF.GetInCell GSGeneralStore Set AWillow4c.IsBuyingChet to 1 Set AWillow4a.ShoppingChetGS to 1 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerShoppingChetGS
ElseIf WillowREF.GetDistance NVBlakeREF <= 1000 Set AWillow4c.IsBuyingBlake to 1 Set AWillow4a.ShoppingBlake to 1 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerShoppingCCBlake endif
endif
Sorry, Willow, not right now.
Oh. Okay.
AWDx1Silus
Here, this might help when you go in with him. It's up to you, but I find talking is sometimes better than whacking.
AWDTimedTheStrip
This place looks exactly like I imagined it would: drunks, lights, hookers. It's perfect.
You know, New Vegas is why I came to the Mojave, I've been hearing stories about it for years.
We're going to go to a casino, aren't we?
The lights are gorgeous.
Interested in taking me out for a drink in one the casinos? That might be fun.
Come on, let's have some fun. What do you say? Let's go jump in the fountain.
I can't believe you stuck one of us in that freezer. That was heartless. I hope I don't have to worry about what you'll do to me.
Set AWillow4c.FreezerCompanion to 1
Hey, want to go get a drink? I'm thirsty and Cass can always use more whiskey.
Everyone's talking about you, did you notice? Well, maybe they don't know it was you that did it, but they're talking about Mr. House.
If Veronica gets a dress I want one too. Or maybe new shoes or a new hat. I don't know, something pretty. Please?
Set AWillow4c.VeronicaDress to 1
Hey, did you hear that? Somebody's talking about Caesar being dead. You're a hero, just like I told you!
What do you say, Boone? Let's have some fun while we're here.
CraigBooneREF.SayTo CraigBooneREF ANPCbTowResp12
AWDTimedCaesarsTent
*nervous humming*
Hmpf.
Willow, would you consider changing your clothes?
Change my clothes? Do you know I killed the geckos that were used to make my jacket? I think that makes it pretty special.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Cambiar mi ropa? ¿Sabías que maté los geckos que se usaron para hacer mi chaqueta? Creo que eso la hace bastante especial.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do, I'm confident the NCR can win this.
You know, I was never excited about getting involved in this war, but after everything we've seen...
Driving the legion out of the Mojave is the right thing to do. If I die, doing it, it would be for something worthwhile.
Yes, I want to see a Mojave free of both the Legion and the NCR. A truly independent New Vegas.
I've never been excited about getting involved in this war. But, I'm committed to supporting you. I'll do whatever it takes.
I've never been excited about getting involved in this war. But, I'm committed to supporting you. I'll do whatever it takes.
I am committed. I think Mr. House is the right choice for the Mojave.
Let's hope it doesn't come to that.
Oh, I do! I don't want to die. But I do want to talk to you about the possibility.
Even against the NCR?
Yeah, that is hard for me, but after everything we've seen? I agree, they shouldn't be here.
But, this isn't what I want to talk to you about.
No, I haven't decided that, you don't need to worry about it. Why do you ask?
Well, I'm from the NCR! I don't want to be shooting them and I don't want them to be shooting at me!
And, oh my gosh, if family knew I was fighting against the NCR they would be so mad at me!
Yeah, I am. Why?
Well, I'm from the NCR! I don't want to be shooting them and I don't want them to be shooting at me!
And, oh my gosh, if family knew I was fighting against the NCR they would be so mad at me! But at the same time, I've seen how things are here.
And, the NCR probably doesn't belong here, and I trust you, but I don't really want to get tangled up in this war.
...please just tell me everything's going to be okay and that I'm not a bad person.
Willow, you need a drink! Let's go get you one.
Yes! A drink. Let's do that. Have I ever told you I like whiskey?
Willow, everything is going to be okay and you aren't a bad person.
Thank you. I...I just needed to hear that. You're so sweet. My parents! The thought of them is just haunting me.
Willow, we all have to make hard choices sometimes, this is yours to make. I can't make it for you.
Oh, okay.
No, I'm just working with them for a while, why?
Yes, why?
Well, I'm not excited about getting involved in this war, and I wish we didn't have to do it.
And I probably don't even need to say this, but if we have to get involved I'd rather fight for the NCR.
Let's talk about something else (Let's you skip personal topics and unlocks items from them for you)
Okay.
Set AWillow4a.LetsCheat to 2 Set AWillow4a.PersonalAlone to (AWillow4a.PersonalAlone + 7)

Set AWillow4a.PersonalTopicOne to 1 Set AWillow4a.PersonalGecko to 1 Set AWillow4a.PersonalRonery to 1 Set AWillow4a.PersonalGS to 1 Set AWillow4c.BennyCoat to 1 Set AWillow4a.PersonalScanvenging to 1 Set AWillow1.PlayerAsksForCampfire to 1 Set AWillow4a.PersonalCooking to 1 Player.AddNote WillowsIngredientList Set AWillow4a.PencilChallengeUnlocked to 1
You should ask Veronica to train you. She loves punching things. I'm sure she could teach you a lot.
I'm going to go ask her about it right now.
Yes, I'm sure.
Alright, I'll try to behave. It'll be hard, though. I really don't like her.
Why are you standing there frozen like that? Let's get a move on!
Sorry!
If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsRifle WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsRifle 0 endif Set WillowREF.WeaponSwap to 1 WillowREF.evp
AWDTimedRadsDialogue
Radiation! Great.
Set AWillow1.RadsDialogueLevel to (AWillow1.RadsDialogueLevel + 1)
You doing okay? Radiation! What a pain in the butt.
Set AWillow1.RadsDialogueLevel to (AWillow1.RadsDialogueLevel + 1)
Uh, getting a little worried here. Am I starting to glow?
Set AWillow1.RadsDialogueLevel to (AWillow1.RadsDialogueLevel + 1)
So, you know, I always wondered what it would feel like to be a ghoul...Um, I think we might find out soon.
Set AWillow1.RadsDialogueLevel to 0
ANPCvTOwChatter
Your leg?
Would you look at it for me? I don't think it's healing right. It's still bothering me a lot.
Set AWillow4a.FixedLeg to 2
Sure, I'll look at it for you.
ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowFixMyLeg
Set AWillow4a.FixedLeg to 2
No, I don't think I can do it.
Oh, okay.
Set AWillow4a.FixedLeg to 2
That should do it.
Thank you so much!
Alright. Go do it now.
Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Genial! Está bien; espérame aquí un segundo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickExtendedISFX
Set AWillow4c.GonnaAskVeronica to 1 SetStage AWillowUnarmedTraining 4
Wait. Now's not a good time. Do it later.
Okay.
I didn't like them very much. Sorry.
Oh, I got it that wrong. Hmm. Well, I have something else you might like. Here.
Would you like to see my collection, finally? I keep talking about it but still haven't shown it to you.
Set AWillow4a.ShowedCollection to 1 Player.AddItemHealthPercent WillowsNVCombatShotty 1 .5 Player.AddItem Ammo12Ga 50
WillowsFourthContainerREF.OpenTeammateContainer 1
There's nothing to be afraid of, Willow. I've got your back.
That does make me feel better, but I'm worried about you too.
If you want me with you I'll come.
Do you want to grab a bite to eat?
Oh, that's a great idea.

If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsLeatherBackpack WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsLeatherBackpack Set AWillow1l.EatNoBackpack to 1 endif

Will you join me? It's not as much fun eating alone.

If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsLeatherBackpack WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsLeatherBackpack Set AWillow1l.EatNoBackpack to 1 endif

Of course! I'm always hungry.

I do want you with me. Come on.
Alright. Let's get this over with. I hope we make it out of this free and alive.
Set AWillow4c.CaesarsTentInside to 1
Why don't you wait for me here.
Okay, I'll do that. I would have come with you gladly if that's what you'd wanted, but honestly it's a relief to stay out here.
Set WillowREF.Waiting to 1 WillowREF.evp
I'm glad you got that off your chest, but I wasn't planning to go in there just yet.
AWDTimedNCROther
*nervous humming*
I'll keep my hands to myself while we're here. Even if there was anything good to pick up, I couldn't do it. They need everything they've got.
I'm glad we're helping out around here.
Hey, you gonna be okay?
CraigBooneREF.SayTo CraigBooneREF ANPCbTowResp05
NCR as far as the eye can see. You know, I feel right at home here.
You're jealous!
Of course I am!
No, I'm not. But I don't like her and I'm concerned for you. She's a bitch !
ESP.TRADUIT: No, no lo estoy. Pero ella no me gusta y me preocupas. ¡Es una zorra!

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're jealous!
AWDResptoMajorKnight
Hi, Major Knight! How ya doin?
Hi, Major, good to see ya.
Hi, How are you today?
AWDCaesarsTentOpening
Listen, I do not like being out here and I don't trust Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: Escucha. No me gusta estar aquí y no confío en Cesar.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think we should go in there. This cannot be a good idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: No creo que debamos ir ahí. No puede ser buena idea.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set AWillow4c.TalkCaesarsTent to 2 WillowREF.RemoveScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerCaesarsTentFG
AWDTimedzToV1stline
Hi, I'm Willow. It looks like we'll be spending a lot of time together.
AWDTimedzToBooneGeneral
I bet you miss your Dinky...oh, oops.
If you could do anything at all right now what would it be? I'd take a shower. Doesn't that sound good?
Do you think you'll ever marry again, Boone? Maybe have kids? You'd make a great father.
Are you thirsty? I have an extra Nuka Cola if you want it.
I'm glad you're with us Boone. I feel so safe with you here.
AWDTimedzToB1stline
Hi, I'm Willow. It looks like we're going to be spending a lot of time together. I hope we can be friends.
Yep.
Are you planning to keep working with the legion or are you done with them?
You're a hero! I'm so proud of you!
I'm done with them.
I'm so proud of you.
Um, I plan to keep working with them.
Oh.
No, why?
Well, like I said, you don't need to worry about it.
Okay, I trust you.
AWDBennyAsshole
It's the asshole! He's here!
AWDBennySeduction
Oh, you are not really going to sleep with him! Just don't make me watch, okay?
Set AWillow4a.SolemnGreeting to 1
I know he wears a checkered coat and that I should look for him in Novac. That's about it.
I see a trip to Novac in our future.
Set AWillow4c.BennyNovac to 1
I know he wears a checkered coat and I've heard he's in New Vegas.
New Vegas! We could kick his ass and then go see the sights!
Set AWillow4c.BennyVegas to 1
I know he wears a checkered coat. That's about it.
I'll help all I can. What an asshole. Him, not you.
Set AWillow4c.BennyCoat to 1
ANPCbTowResp14
What is it?
ANPCbTowResp15
What is it?
It's not the hat, Willow.
It is! I'm sure it helps. But I still need my hat. I do have another one just like it to give you, though.
I want you to take it and try it out, okay?
Player.AddItem WillowRewardExtraCowboyHat 1
Why are carrying two identical hats?
Huh, well, that's a long story. I don't know that I want to tell it or that you want to hear it.
Okay, I'll try it.
Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Genial! Está bien; espérame aquí un segundo.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever.
Okay, do whatever you want. But, I'd try the hat if I were you.
Oh, come on, Willow, we're best friends. Tell me.
It started before I left home. I wasn't supposed to come to New Vegas alone. My best friend Bethie, she was supposed to be here with me.
We spent months getting ready to go. My dad made us the radios, we collected gear we wanted to take, we talked to caravan guards about routes.
And that's when things went wrong.
Something happened with one of the caravans?
Brian, one of the guards we talked to, liked Bethie right away and started coming 'round to see her. She never said anything about it.
So I kept talking about our trip, finishing up plans and getting ready to go. About two weeks before we were supposed to leave Bethie disappeared.
Poof! She was just...gone.
She ran off and left you? What a terrible thing to do!
Yeah, I was devastated. She'd been my best friend since we were little kids. I couldn't believe she'd leave without any kind of goodbye.
She took off with Brian didn't she?
Yeah, she left with Brian on one of his caravan routes.
So, what did you do?
I decided to chase her. It took me about a week to finish getting ready and then I left.
I knew where Brian's caravan was headed so that's where I went, but he left the caravan and I never did find her.
The second hat was supposed to be hers. We thought matching hats would be fun.
But, the hats aren't really that identical anymore. The one I've given you is nice and clean.
It hasn't been torn up by geckos or gunshots.

If WillowREF.GetDistance NVBlakeREF <= 1500 Set AWillow4a.ShoppingBlake to 1 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerShoppingCCBlake SetStage AWillowShoppingQuest 15 Set AWillow4a.SolemnAdios to 1 Else SetStage AWillowShoppingQuest 15 Set AWillow4a.SolemnAdios to 1 endif
You have a new recipe for me?
Yes! This one's more complex. I call it Willow's Mantis Casserole. The only new ingredient it uses is Mantis Leg.
The Mantis meat gives it a very rich flavor. It's tasty. I think you're going to like it a lot.
Set AWillowFreeform.RecipeUnlock02 to 1 AddNote WillowsRecipeMantis
You have another new recipe for me? How many are you planning to create?
I think this will be last one, but I've had a lot of fun making up the new recipes for us.
Although, the new ingredient I'm adding isn't so fun to gather, but it tastes so great it's going to be worth it. It requires Cazador eggs.
I know, I know, but they taste so good. I'm calling it Willow's Cazador Egg Puff.
Set AWillowFreeform.RecipeUnlock03 to 1 AddNote WillowsRecipeCazador
Things are going to get tough around here, really Hardcore. Be prepared. (Set Essential)
Bark, bark!
SetEssential WillowsTheBigGuysDog 1 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowJTEssential
Whine.
SetEssential WillowsTheBigGuysDog 0 ShowMessage FollowerMessageWillowJTUnEssential
Watch yourself, J.T. Things are going to get tough. You could get hurt. (Set Unessential)
Look, Fancy Lad Snack Cakes. One of your favorites.
Thank you!

I know that Raul likes sweets a lot and he seems so sad, would you consider giving it to him instead? It would mean a lot to me.
I have some GumDrops for you.
Thank you!
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasOnePresent to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowWaitingforNextPresent to GameDaysPassed

Player.RemoveItem RadioactiveGumDrops 1
If AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer >= 150 Else Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood endif
I got you some Bubblegum.
Thank you!

I found some Junk Food. You want it, don't you?
Of course I do. Thank you.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowHasOnePresent to 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowWaitingforNextPresent to GameDaysPassed Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.CrunchyPresent to 1
Player.RemoveItem JunkFood 1 Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer to (AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.WillowLikesPlayer +5) PlaySound WillowPlayerGood
That's a good looking dog you have.
I suppose.
Huh. That's an odd response. Most people are proud of their animals. You do like him don't you?
Sure.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.TalkAboutJT to 1
Is he smart? He seems well trained.
Yeah.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.TalkAboutJT to 1
Yeah. What's going on?
I told you when we first started traveling together that it wouldn't be for very long, but I'm having so much fun with you.
And, you've become very special to me. I think of you as a friend, as a best friend actually, and I don't want to leave you or the Mojave.
So, what do you say? Should we make it official? Shall I stay and keep following you around?
Now's a bad time, Willow. We'll have to do it later.
Okay, but don't forget.
Set AWillowLikesPlayerQuest.TalkAboutBFF to 1
You have something important to talk about?
I told you when we first started traveling together that it wouldn't be for very long, but I'm having so much fun with you.
And, you've become very special to me. I think of you as a friend, as a best friend actually, and I don't want to leave you or the Mojave.
So, what do you say? Should we make it official? Shall I stay and keep following you around?
Yes. Why don't you stay. It's working out well for me too.
Great! We'll be best friends forever!

AWDTimedzToB2ndline
I was very sorry to hear about your wife, Boone. If you ever feel like talking to someone or ever need anything I'd love to help.
AWDTimedzToB3rdline
Boone, I was born and raised in the NCR; in Klamath. I'm guessing you're going to keep quiet and not tell me anything about yourself. Right?
AWDTimedzToB4thline
You're awful good, Boone. I can see why they wanted you in the 1st Recon. Maybe if we get a chance sometime you could give me some tips?
AWDTimedzToB5thline
Okay, Boone, you are just too quiet. If I confess to you that I hate Caesar and his legion will you talk to me? Because it's true. I do hate him.
I have a surprise for you, Willow!
Oh, what is it?
ANPCbTowResp01a
Not my strong suit, but okay.
ANPCbTowResp02a
Maybe some other time.
ANPCbTowResp06a
That's what I do best.
ANPCbTowResp07a
We can do that.
ANPCbTowResp08a
Yeah, I guess.
Look! I've been doing some scavenging myself and I've got 50 pencils for you. You'll never run out!
Oh! Thank you so much! I love them. It's one of the best presents I have ever gotten.
It reminds me of my twelfth birthday, when my best friend, Bethie, went all over town and found me 12 bottles of Wonderglue.
It must have taken you so long to find all of these. I appreciate it so much. You'll just never know how much. I love them.
Player.RemoveItem Pencil01 50 WillowREF.AddItem Pencil01 50 If WillowREF.GetEquipped WillowsRifle WillowREF.UnequipItem WillowsRifle 0 endif Set WillowREF.WeaponSwap to 1

Forget it. You're good.
Bark!
(Lord Death Perk) You'd make an easy kill, that's why. You should be wearing proper armor.
Oh, okay.

Yes, it's what I really want.
Well, goodbye. I don't know what else to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: Pues adiós. No sé que más puedo decir.

No, I'm sorry. I don't want you to go. Please stay.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll stay. Please don't do that again. I don't want to leave you...ever.
ESP.TRADUIT: Vale, me quedaré. No vuelvas a hacer eso, por favor. No quiero dejarte... nunca.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, it's what I really want.
Okay, well, thanks for helping me find Beauty, and goodbye.

No, I don't want you to go. Please stay.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. I'll stay.
Okay, tell me what you want me to do and we'll see.
I want enough supplies to make enough coffee to last me for a month. Here. I'd already written up the list in case you showed up.
So, will you do it?
Sure. You'll see me again when I have everything on that list.
Okay.

Forget it! I'm not getting all that stuff for you.
I might still be here if you change your mind.
Set AWillowCoffee.KnowsAboutQuest to 1
I've got all the ingredients you wanted.
Wow! Look at that! Well, I guess you were serious then, so I'll come with you like I promised I would.

Willow, come here...
Sure.
I love you.
I love you.
