DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 PipBoyRadioOff Set AWillowLPTimer4.Timer to 0 Set AWillowLPTimer4.WillowKissPlayer to 1 StartQuest AWillowLPTimer4
I found something for you to put into your collection. I think it's pretty special.
Thank you so much!
WillowsFourthContainerREF.OpenTeammateContainer 1
I have a surprise for you! Remember you asked for a dress like Veronica or something pretty?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Tengo una sorpresa para tí! ¿Recuerdas cuando pediste un vestido como el de Veronica o algo así de bonito?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! You have something for me?
Set AWillow4c.VeronicaDress to 2 Set AWillow4c.GiveTrinket to 1
I have a new outfit for you to try on if you want. I think it will look great on you.
That sounds fun. Let's do it.
Set AWillow4c.GiveTrinket to 1
Sure, but I might need a hand getting into it. You up for that?
Set AWillow4c.GiveTrinket to 1
I've got something for you. I saw it and immediately thought of you.
Thank you. That's so thoughtful!
Set AWillow4c.GiveTrinket to 1
I hope you're done eating. I'm ready to go.
Okay.
That was just what I needed.

WillowREF.OpenTeammateContainer

Alright. This is it.

Here it is.

ANPCvTOwResp01
Guess we have that in common then.
AWDTimedzToVeronicaResp01
Heck no, Veronica! Punch everything that gets in our way.
Feeling guilty? Did you punch one of us by mistake?
No Veronica, I like you just the way your are.
Nope, not today.
Set AWillow4c.VeronicaChatter to (AWillow4c.VeronicaChatter + 1)
blah
AWDTimedzToVeronicaResp02
Klamath. In Oregon.
Klamath. I traveled through California to get here. It took me about two years. I stopped a lot along the way.
AWDTimedzToVeronicaResp03
Oh, me too!
And somewhere to go in the dress! That'd be so great!
Ooh, and maybe some pretty shoes to go with it! And maybe a great hat.
blah
ANPCvTowResp03
Why does everyone always say that?
AWDTimedzToV3rdResp2
Because it's true. We should do something about it. Get you something that feels and looks good. Right?
I'd like you to keep quiet when we're walking around. I like the peace and quiet.
Oh...okay.
Set AWillow4d.STFU to 1
Okay, sure.
Set AWillow4d.STFU to 0
You can chatter while we're walking around if you like. It's kind of quiet around here.
AWDSQwestsideFG
I've been thinking I'd like to create a couple of new recipes based on critters from here in the Mojave. Good idea, huh?
I'll want to keep cooking if I'm going to be creating new recipes, so that would mean regular shopping trips. That'd be up to you.
Set AWillow4a.ShoppingWestsideCoop to 1 WillowREF.AddScriptPackage FollowersWillowFollowPlayerShoppingWestsideCoop SetStage AWillowShoppingQuest 10
We can't turn back now. I have to go in. You can wait out here if you want to.
I hate to do that. I'm no coward, but I don't trust him, not at all. If you want me with you I'll come.
You have a new recipe for me?
Thanks to you taking me shopping so much I've been able to do some experimenting and I've created a new recipe!
I've only used one new ingredient though, because we have to keep track of so many already. It's Ant Stew!
I know, it sounds kind of boring, but this is the first time I've tried to make something up on my own. I think it came out pretty good.

Set AWillowFreeform.RecipeUnlock01 to 1 AddNote WillowsRecipeAntStew
If AWillowFreeform.HasHunter == 0 Player.AddItem WillowArmorReinforcedLight 1 Set AWillowFreeform.HasHunter to 1 endif If AWillowFreeform.HasHunter Player.AddItem WillowArmorReinforcedMed 1 endif
I would like you to stop singing for awhile.
ESP.TRADUIT: Me gustaría que dejaras de cantar un rato.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I can do that.
Set AWillow4d.StopSinging to 1
Great! I'd love to!
Set AWillow4d.StopSinging to 0
I'd like you to start singing again.
ESP.TRADUIT: Me gustaría que volvieras a cantar.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you cook something for us at the stove?
Sure, I'd love to.

Sure, I'd love to.

AWDCookingCampfire
AWDShoppingLeave
I'm ready. Let's go.
J.T. while you are following me I don't want you to attack anything. At all. Understood?
<whine>

Bark, bark!
Set JTref.NoAttackToggle to 0 JTref.SetGhost 0 JTref.SetAV Confidence 3 JTref.SetAV Perception 6
J.T. I'd like you to fight with me again.
AWDResptoOldLadies
Hi!
Hi, how are you today?
AWDResptoHiThere
Hi,how ya doin?
Hi, how are you today?
Hi!
AWDCookingCampfireAlertNo
I didn't cook anything. We don't have what I need.
Set AWillow9c.DoOnce1 to 0
Can I see what you've scavenged lately?
Sure, take a look.
WillowsFifthContainerREF.OpenTeammateContainer 1
AWDTimedzToB4thResp01
Boone, you still look lost. If I can help at all, just say the word.
AWDHouseCookingSinging
<humming>
AWDx1HVLaserEyes
Oh! I bet this is where they test the eye lasers.
AWDTimedNovac
What's not to like about a place that has a giant statue to greet people when they come into town?
Set AWillow4a.NovacChatter to ( AWillow4a.NovacChatter + 1)
I'm worried about those legion guys out in Nelson. What if they attack Novac? It'll be awful!
Thank you so much for helping to get the legion out of Nelson. I'm sure all of Novac is grateful.
So now that the NCR is occupying Nelson, Novac should be safe, right?
Maybe Boone could come with us when you're done helping him. He's so depressed. It'd probably be good for him to get away from here.
I like it here. Maybe it's because I grew up in a motel.
ESP.TRADUIT: Me gusta este sitio. Tal vez sea porque me crié en un motel.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love it here. I know, I know. It's dumpy and little. But it's so cozy and homey. Plus it's got a giant dinosaur. It's hard to top that.
I wonder if No-bark's around today. He's always fun to talk to.
Can we go up in Dinky sometime just to look at the view?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¿Podemos subirnos a Dinky alguna vez para admirar las vistas?

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, our motel sign it had a couple of pine trees on it. We didn't have anything as interesting as a big dinky.
ESP.TRADUIT: El cartel de nuestro motel tenía un par de pinos. No teníamos nada tan interesante como un dinky enorme.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe after I've seen the Mojave I'll come back here to live for awhile. Wouldn't it be fun to stay in one of the little bungalows at the motel?
I wanna have some fun! Wanna go Brahmin tipping? You'll have to do the tipping though, I can never get the Brahmin to fall over.
I'm so glad we fixed up the bungalow. I love that pink bird we found.
Why don't you do right, like some other men do. Get out of here, give me some money too.
*sings with no words*
*hums*
How lucky can one girl be? I kissed him and he kissed me.
Set AWillow4c.PlayerHeardSinging to 1
How lucky can one girl be? I kissed her and she kissed me.
Set AWillow4c.PlayerHeardSinging to 1
AWDx1McCarranBounties
Heads? You're going after heads? Actual human heads. I hope that's something you're planning to carry yourself.
AWDx1Novac2
Oh, I like it here! It reminds me of my family's motel back home. Maybe we could stay in one of the bungalows?
ESP.TRADUIT: ¡Me gusta este sitio! Me recuerda al motel de mi familia. ¿Tal vez podríamos quedarnos en uno de los bungalows?

ESP.ORIGINAL: AWDTimedLegate
This is...impressive.
Looks like the legion might actually be able to win, doesn't it?
*Hmm.
AWDx1RamosGreeting
Pfft. And people think the NCR is difficult!
AWDTimedzToVeronicaResp05
After seeing Nipton there is no way I will ever think of the legion as silly.
Veronica, you have been underground too long.
Veronica, I'm sorry, I can't laugh with you about the legion. I don't find them very funny. Okay, maybe those skirts are funny.
ESP.TRADUIT: Verónica, lo siento, pero no puedo reirme de la legión contigo. No les veo la gracia. Bueno, las falditas sí son graciosas.

ESP.ORIGINAL: AWDx1RepConnCrazy
I wonder what's next. This place is crazy. So far we've seen a ghoul in a wig, a human who's convinced he's a ghoul and now, demons!
I thought the other guy was the crazy one, but demons? He can't be serious.
AWDx1Rex
I sure hope we can do something to help Rex.
AWDTimedzToVeronicaResp06
Hmm. Nope, can't think of anything interesting.
I grew up with a big family too. I have five brothers. We lived above ground though.
I really like Boone, but he's still so sad about his wife. I don't think he'll ever notice me. Don't say anything to him, though, okay?
Hmm. Nope, can't think of anything interesting. Oh, wait, Cass has been drinking again.
Raul seems kinda depressed. I wish we could do something for him. I think he needs a woman, but maybe he'd take some Fancy Lad Snack Cakes.
Me and the Courier. We finally...you know. I'm so in love.
You know Red Lucy at the Thorn, right? Ugh, I can't stand her, but don't tell, okay?
You know Red Lucy at the Thorn, right? She's so sexy. I'm really worried about it, but don't tell, okay?
Mr. House is a computer! Well, okay, maybe not, but when you talk to him he's just a picture on a screen. There's no way to tell if he's real or not.
;Willow has seen computer screen House ;but hasn't seen in the flesh House
Turns out Mr. House was just this helpless old guy crammed inside a box. We found him tucked away inside the Lucky 38. It was kind of sad.
;Willow has seen computer screen House ;has seen in the flesh House
AWDx1Anders
He's still alive! Can we help him?
AWDx1RepConnCrazyDavison
Okay, this one is definitely the craziest. Too bad he and Antler can't come with us. They'd be interesting travel companions.
I like him, and Antler too. They're crazy, but it's too bad they can't come with us, huh?

Get Willow to like you so much that she wants to be your best friend forever (BFF). This point is reached when you've done a few specific tasks for her and have gained 100 points towards making her happy.
Talk further to Willow about Chester.
Go to the Novac area to find Chester. A ghoul Willow calls "The Big Guy" may have him and is there searching for a group of ghouls. The Big Guy is tall and wears a cowboy hat with a feather.
You want more from Willow than just her friendship. Continue making her happy and you may get your wish.
Just being friends with Willow has its rewards. Be nice to her and nice things may happen to you.

To move on to BFFs, you must also complete one special task that will show Willow how much you like her. There are three choices available to you. You may also give her gifts. See note in your Pipboy for details.
You should be able to figure out the task by thinking about the things you've learned about her so far through dialogue with her and others and by reading her journal.
You should expect to be friends with Willow for a couple of days before you become BFFs with her.

Pencil Challenge Unlocked!
Willow would love to have a backpack full of pencils. Are you up to the challenge of finding 50 pencils for her?
Beware! If you pursue this challenge you will be rewarded with both quest points from Willow and a perk.
***If you have pencils in your inventory at the start of the challenge and you don't receive update messages at 10, 20, etc like you should drop the pencils and pick them up again in order for the game to count them correctly. Also, be sure to take all 50 pencils to Willow at one time at the end of the challenge.***
ESP.TRADUIT:
¡Desafío de los lápices desbloqueado!
A Willow le encantaría tener la mochila llena de lápices. ¿Estás preparado para el desafío de encontrar 50 lápices para ella?
¡Atención!

Congratulations! You are now the proud owner of a bear from the Nevada Bear Company's prestigious Gold Label Collection. This limited edition collection of seven bears was created exclusively for the Nevada Bear Company by our designers in consultation with many of today's most highly acclaimed experts and designers from fields as unlikely and diverse as Science, Architecture, Fashion Design, and the Military. We bring you this most unusual line hoping that you, the most discriminating collector, will enjoy them for years to come. You can gift the bears to Willow. If you mark the bungalow as Willow's home they may be displayed there from her inventory. You may display them at any time. At the end of the challenge, they can be turned into nonquest items.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Explorer Collectible Challenge Unlocked!
There are 9 items spread throughout the gameworld for you to find which are tracked by this challenge. They are distinguished by a present icon and a special sound when you pick them up. (There is a tenth untracked item available if you have the Wild Wasteland trait).
You may keep these items for yourself or gift them to Willow. If you choose to mark the bungalow as Willow's home they may be displayed there from her inventory, you may display them at any time. At the end of the challenge, if you prefer to keep them, you can turn them into nonquest items.
You've received 5 Willow Happy Points.

Congratulations! You and Willow are Best Friends Forever! She will never leave you unless you fire her. She will follow you regardless of which faction you support. She is completely loyal and devoted to you.
In addition to that, several benefits of being friends will now be unlocked which you will discover in dialogue with her.
Plus there's more to come if you continue to gain points with her.
Have fun!

Willow watched you and Lucius while he taught you the Legion Assault special move. Her Unarmed skill is high enough that she was able to learn quite a bit more from your session with him. Her Unarmed skill has increased by 15.

You will need to have of each of the following items in your inventory in order to make three cups of refreshing coffee with the in-room brewing machine:
Broc Flower, Nuka Cola, Pinyon Nuts, Purified Water, Sunset Sarsaparilla, Xander Root and three coffee mugs

1) Willow will sleep/wait for you if you leave her while she sleeps. Her location will be marked on your Pipboy. You can wake her any time by talking to her otherwise she will sleep for approximately five ingame hours. 2) You must use her special wake up dialogue to get her to follow you again. The companion wheel dialogue will not work to do this. The wake up dialogue is a greeting she will give you if you enter dialogue from the companion wheel. If you use her radio to call her when sleeping use this dialogue to get her dressed again. 3) You must clean up the bedroll after she gets up or you will get bloated save games.
Don't forget to clean up her bedroll and have fun!

You must clean up Willow's Campfire after she has set it up. If you leave it in the gameworld, your saved games will get bloated.
Also, when Willow sets out her campfire she will automatically remove her ingredients from your inventory so she can cook with them.
Have fun and don't forget to clean up the campfires!
Clean up the meal whenever you like.

Welcome to Willow's Gold Plated Cheater's Edition! I'd suggest you don't cheat and play through properly if you haven't played the mod before. However, if you choose to cheat, containers and a terminal will appear to help you. First take Beauty, Moira and Chester from the gold ammo container next to the shelves and give them to Willow through dialogue. Once that's done use the terminal to move to BFFs, talk to her again about being best friends and be sure to go back into dialogue after the fade to black kiss to choose the Romance or Friends path and then return to the terminal to choose what else to do (you won't be able to choose to skip ahead to finish the quest until you've made that decision). The Shopping Quest and Unarmed Quest can be completed at the terminal after you have received them in dialogue from Willow.
I want to cheat! You can cheat other quests besides the main one (enables items necessary to do so)
I changed my mind! I do not want to cheat! (PERMANENTLY disables opportunity to cheat)
I won't decide right now...

Congratulations! You've completed Willow's shopping quest!
If you decide to take Willow shopping in the future she will need to have caps when she enters the store or approaches the trader. She needs 20 caps in each location. If she doesn't have the caps she will not approach the trader. If that happens, you will find a dialogue topic when you are in those locations, when she has insufficient caps, and you can use it to give her caps. It prompts her to go talk to the trader.

Firing Willow is serious business. You can only fire her once and get her back again. After that she will not return to you. She doesn't like being fired; you are rejecting her when you do it.
If you need to adventure without her have her wait for you somewhere. She will wait forever because she doesn't have a wait timer like the vanilla companions.
It is certain

Put CLOTHING/ARMOR for Willow inside this wardrobe via this menu. Once you have put items into the "drawers" you will be able to manage them in a topic in Willow's dialogue. PERMANENT OUTFIT: You MUST do the following to set it up: Dress Willow ONLY in the clothing items you want her to wear at all times. Use this menu & select Permanent Outfit. When you want to change it repeat that process. The script will return the old outfit to your inventory.
